Selected as the foundation for enterprise logging, the Elastic Stack satisfied enterprise-wide mission needs. Today, the GDIT Elastic cluster entails a multi-petabyte, highly available cluster that dramatically improves search speeds from hours to seconds.Learn about the project's evaluation factors, which included cloud-native support, performant ingest and search, ease of use, scalability, and cost. Plus, hear about best practices and lessons learned from running at scale.

video:video.video:title: SEEKing Truth Amongst 10 Billion Logs
video:video.video:description: SEEK Limited is a global leader in employment, education, and volunteer opportunities in 17 countries, hosting 100 million job seeker profiles and over 3 million available job opportunities at any given time. With websites attracting over 375 million monthly visits, SEEK needed to build a mechanism to centralize logs from multiple sources, simplify search across all of them, and generate timely results with visual presentation.

video:video.video:title: Monitor Your Cloud Environment with the Logstash Azure Monitoring Module
video:video.video:description: Have you ever wanted to monitor your Azure infrastructure with the Elastic Stack? Now you can with the Logstash Azure Monitoring module.Take a deep dive tour into the shiny new Logstash Azure Monitoring module which offers turnkey health monitoring for the various layers of your Azure environment. Learn how to deploy, configure, and gain immediate insights on your Azure infrastructure using the built-in monitoring capabilities of Azure Monitor alongside Logstash, Elasticsearch, and Kibana. In just a few minutes, youll have full access to a rich, extensible Kibana monitoring experience for analyzing overall service health and auditing infrastructure changes through automated digestion of Azure activity and diagnostic logs.

video:video.video:title: How Elasticsearch is SPARKing Our Geospatial Analysis: An Esri Story
video:video.video:description: Explore how Esri applies geospatial analytics on high-velocity streaming (data-in-motion) and high-volume batch (data-at-rest) using Elasticsearch and Apache Spark. Also watch demonstrations that were performed throughout the presentation to cement these concepts for the attendees.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ E*Trade
video:video.video:description: The Elastic Stack has been integral to the growth of E*Trades real-time operational intelligence pipeline. Hear their journey to adopting Elastic machine learning features and see firsthand how theyre using them to identify anomalies using full-text aggregations and performance data.

video:video.video:title: The Journey from Zero to SOC: How Citadel built its Security Operations from the Ground Up on Elastic
video:video.video:description: When Sean Lengyel joined Australia-based Citadel Group, he found himself working with security conscious cloud engineers, developers, and sysadmins who were using a monitoring tool that severely lacked intrusion detection and cyber monitoring capabilities. See how Sean and his team worked to replace their previous IT ops infrastructure monitoring tool with Elastic Security and Elastic Cloud Enterprise and how it positively impacted their enterprise software and services offerings for their end customers across the world.

video:video.video:title: Introduction to the Elastic platform: Enterprise search, observability, security, cloud
video:video.video:description:
Elastic construit des solutions de recherche, d'observabilit et de scurit d'entreprise en temps rel et volutives sur une seule stack technologique open source qui peut tre dploye partout. Des milliers d'organisations dans le monde utilisent Elastic pour trouver instantanment des informations exploitables partir de n'importe quel type de donnes et alimenter des systmes critiques.Ces courtes vidos dmontrent la valeur de chaque solution Elastic par le biais d'exemples concrets afin que vous puissiez acqurir les connaissances de base dont vous avez besoin avant de vous lancer avec Elastic.Introduction Elastic Observability : Transformation numrique et adoption du cloud en toute confiance Tendances du march de l'observabilitPrsentation de la solution d'observabilit holistique et complte d'Elastic.Une seule interface utilisateur pour toutes les sources de donnesVisualisation moderneInformations exploitables grce la dtection des anomalies par l'IA  Introduction Elastic Security : Modernisation des oprations de scurit Tendances du march de la scuritPrsentation de Limitless XDR : SIEM, scurit des points d'extrmit et scurit du cloud computingFonctions de prvention, de dtection et de rponse Introduction Elastic Enterprise Search : Recherchez tout, partout
Tendances du march Enteprise SearchPrsentation de la solution de recherche unifie et moderne d'ElasticAmliorez les taux de conversion et fidlisez vos clients Connectez toutes vos applications et sources de contenu l'aide d'une plateforme unique et volutive. Introduction Elastic Cloud : Un cloud rapide, simple et scuris pour vos applications critiques.Introduction Elastic Stack en tant que service gr sur Elastic CloudAvantages par modle de dploiement : Cloud ou sur sitePartenaires Cloud : Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud et Microsoft Azure Introduction l'Elastic Stack : Dcouvrez les principaux produits open sourceIntro

video:video.video:title: How YellowPages improves its digital services with Search Elastic
video:video.video:description: Les services numriques que vous proposez ont une problmatique de recherche, mais vous ne savez pas comment ladresser ? Profitez de toute la puissance dun outil de recherche simple mettre en place et customisable linfini ! Avec Elasticsearch vous pouvez intgrer une fonction de recherche prrgle sur votre site web, votre application ou votre lieu de travail. Tout devient accessible et simple.C'est avec plaisir que nous vous invitons a une matinale ddie  Elasticsearch. Olivier Galliet, Scrum Master Squad Search de Solocal et Ludovic Boutros, Data Architecte et formateur chez Zenika prsentent leur retour d'exprience sur la refonte de la rfrence franaise des moteurs de recherche de professionnels locaux : PagesJaunes (21M de vues par mois). Huage Chen, Principal Solutions Architect chez Elastic, prsentera d'avantage de cas dusages concrets de la solution Elasticsearch et comment limplmenter dans vos services numriques.Apportez vos clients et utilisateurs finaux une exprience de recherche aussi innovante que puissante :Quelques bnfices pour vos utilisateurs finaux = tout rechercher, quelle que soit leur localisationQuelques bnfices pour vos clients / annonceurs = profiter de lexprience des communauts (avis, recommandations) pour faire remonter les rsultats les plus pertinents

video:video.video:title: Standardising APM with Elastic and OpenTelemetry
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez comment avec Elastic et OpenTelemetry vous permettent de rapidement analyser les traces et les mtriques distribues afin de vous aider surveiller les KPI mtier et les composants techniques avec Elastic Stack.Les points forts de la session :Avantages de la normalisation de l'observabilitQu'est-ce que OpenTelemetry ?Comment intgrer OpenTelemetry ?Standardisation de l'APM avec OpenTelemetry et ElasticMeilleures pratiques pour Elastic et OpenTelemetryDmo

video:video.video:title: Builiding great search experiences with Elastic and Zenika
video:video.video:description: Elastic et Zenika ont le plaisir de vous proposer le replay de la matinale ddie : Elasticsearch, bien plus qu'un moteur de recherche ! Les services numriques que vous proposez ont une problmatique de recherche, mais vous ne savez pas comment ladresser ? Profitez de toute la puissance dun outil de recherche simple mettre en place et customisable linfini !Avec Elasticsearch vous pouvez intgrer une fonction de recherche prrgle sur votre site web, votre application ou votre lieu de travail. Tout devient accessible et simple.Apportez vos clients et utilisateurs finaux une exprience de recherche aussi innovante que puissante :Quelques bnfices pour vos utilisateurs finaux = tout rechercher, quelle que soit leur localisationQuelques bnfices pour vos clients / annonceurs = profiter de lexprience des communauts (avis, recommandations) pour faire remonter les rsultats les plus pertinentsLors de cette matinale, Huage Chen, Principal Solutions Architect chez Elastic, vous prsente des cas dusages concrets de la solution Elasticsearch et comment limplmenter dans vos services numriques.Olivier Galliet, Scrum Master Squad Search de Solocal et Ludovic Boutros, Data Architecte et formateur chez Zenika prsentent leur retour d'exprience sur la refonte de la rfrence franaise des moteurs de recherche de professionnels locaux : PagesJaunes (21M de vues par mois).

video:video.video:title: Discover Elastic Cloud Enterprise to deploy a data sink and provide access to data from different IS
video:video.video:description: Pour russir sa transformation digitale et accompagner les volutions du march, la MAIF doit compter sur un systme dinformation (SI) sr, performant et ouvert. Composant phare de la trajectoire, le projet NORA (Nouvel Outil pour une Relation Attentionne) sinscrit dans un processus damlioration continue et incarne la nouvelle vision mtier des conseillers et gestionnaires. Ce projet ncessitait la monte en puissance du puits de donnes bas sur la solution Elasticsearch qui contient limage des donnes des diffrents SI (CRM, IARD, partenaires...) en temps rel.Ce retour dexprience par Bertrand Goubot, du Ple Oprations et Services SI la MAIF, permettra de comprendre pourquoi la solution Elastic Cloud Enterprise a permis de rpondre aux impratifs mtiers et dcouvrir le contexte et limplmentation en place.Bertrand partagera les initiatives court, moyen et long terme pour acclrer linnovation technologique et optimiser les parcours des conseillers et gestionnaires tout en enrichissant la relation client (micro services, kafka, machine learning)Les points forts de la session :Introduction Elastic - Vinciane Negrier, Account ExecutiveRetour dexprience de la MAIF - Bertrand Goubot, Ple Oprations et ServicesQuestions / RponsesConclusion

video:video.video:title: Log Categorization with Elastic Machine Learning
video:video.video:description: Aujourdhui Elastic Observability est de plus en plus utilise pour superviser et unifier le monitoring de votre rseau en permettant dagrger les donnes provenant de diffrents outils de supervision dj en place au sein de votre entreprise ou provenant encore de vos routeurs, switchs, ou solutions de monitoring rseau.Si bien souvent le monitoring rseau consiste surveiller la bande passante du trafic rseau transitant par les quipements ci-dessus mentionns ou recueillir ces mtriques via snmp ou encore des flows records via Netflow/IPFix, il est galement trs intressant danalyser les logs systmes provenant de ces mmes quipements.Et ce, des fins de maintenance en condition oprationnelle, de dtection et danticipation des anomalies de fonctionnement, ou pour signaler des accs et des changements de configuration inopins et bien dautres encore.Dans cette optique, Dan Abitbol, Solutions Architect, vous prsentera la meilleure manire dutiliser lapplication Logs de la Solution Elastic Observability et comment personnaliser la vtre.

video:video.video:title: Grid Monitoring at CERN with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Learn how CERN uses the Elastic Stack for five different use cases for the Worldwide LHC Computing Grid: Messaging, Job Monitoring, Data Monitoring, Infrastructure Monitoring, and Cloud Benchmarking.

video:video.video:title: Reinventing Fermilab's Scientific Computing Grid Accounting with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: In 2017, Fermilab launched a project to re-engineer an aging MySQL-based grid accounting system in their scientific computing division to a distributed system based around Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, and Grafana. Leveraging this suite of open source tools, Fermilab was able to deploy a more flexible, scalable, and responsive system, all while saving resources and man hours.Today, their scientific computing division is using the Elastic Stack to collect, search through, and analyze data on the state and usage of their distributed computing system that connects thousands of researchers with hundreds of computing resources around the world. Discover what motivated this huge change, get details on the migration, and hear lessons learned along the way.

video:video.video:title: Life after Google Search Appliance: A Better Way to Crawl and Search with Elastic Site Search
video:video.video:description: Comme vous le savez certainement, Google Search Appliance (GSA) arrive en fin de vie en 2019. Si vous ntes pas encore sr(e) des options qui permettent de remplacer GSA pour votre site web, inscrivez-vous ce webinar la demande. Vous apprendrez comment migrer votre moteur de recherche depuis GSA, sans heurt, et amliorer lexprience de recherche de vos utilisateurs actuels avec Elastic Site Search. En mettant votre disposition un crawler web puissant et des API pour indexer vos donnes, Elastic Site Search (propuls par Elasticsearch) rend votre migration depuis GSA simplissime. Vous pourrez personnaliser vos paramtres de recherche facilement depuis sa console dadministration intuitive et bnficier de notre support chaque tape.Ce webinar vous montrera comment :Ajouter un moteur de recherche propuls par Elasticsearch en quelques minutes Indexer des donnes avec le crawler web ou les API dElastic Site Search Paramtrer la pertinence, amliorer la vitesse et redimensionner au besoin Ajuster les rsultats de recherche grce une interface intuitive Utiliser les fonctionnalits de recherche standards comme autocompltion, vrification orthographique, synonymes, et plus encore

video:video.video:title: Exploiter les donnees du Grand Debat avec Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Exploiter les donnes du Grand Dbat avec ElasticsearchLes dfis de l'exploitation des donnes du Grand DbatPourquoi utiliser Elasticsearch ?Pr-traitement et ingestion dans ESAnalyzers et agrgationsDmo de loutilLien vers la plateforme democratie.appEnregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #37 chez Talan Labs.

video:video.video:title: Powering Customer Experiences with Elastic
video:video.video:description: For more than a decade Jeremy has been fascinated with the use of search-based technologies as the primary driver of customer experiences. In this talk, he will reflect on his experience with two live projects for major publishers taking this approach with the Elastic Stack. Lead Developer Matt Frater will then demonstrate the concepts being used at Fairfax Media in new applications such as the well-known GoodFood app and site.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch at Dailymotion - Paris Meetup June 2014 (FR)
video:video.video:description: This is a short presentation on the Elasticsearch architecture and use case at Dailymotion. It also touches on the difficulties Dailymotion has faced and how they have overcome these challenges.

video:video.video:title: Connecter Elasticsearch avec Excel via SQL et ODBC
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez comment utiliser les outils de BI tels que Microsoft Excel ou PowerBI sur Elasticsearch grce au langage SQL et au driver ODBC !Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #36 chez Aircall.

video:video.video:title: MLT et Search chez Doctrine.fr
video:video.video:description: Comment Doctrine utilise la fonction More like This pour proposer des recommandations bases sur le contenu, personnalises pour l'utilisateur et la demande.Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #40 chez Doctrine.

video:video.video:title: CCS (5min)
video:video.video:description: Decouvrez comment implmenter des recherches et aggrgations depuis des clusters distants.

video:video.video:title: All Quiet on the Digital Front: Security Analytics @ USAA
video:video.video:description: Find out how USAA remediates security incidents by analyzing 3-4 billion security events a day, running Python scripts, building custom applications to mine the data, and utilizing Watcher, the Elasticsearch alerting and notification extension, to make their lives easier and more enjoyable!

video:video.video:title: How the Elastic Stack Changed Goldman Sachs
video:video.video:description: See how Goldman Sachs leverages Elasticsearch to solve business problems and manages Elasticsearch usages centrally. Deep dive into a business use case that tracks trade flow across multiple systems in real time.

video:video.video:title: Question Answering vs. Search at Night Shift Development, Inc
video:video.video:description: When people hear Elasticsearch, there is a natural inclination to think only about search. But Elasticsearch is not just about search. At its core, its designed to help users converse with their data and tell stories with it. Every query a user writes originates from a business question. In this session, youll learn some powerful ways to use Elasticsearch for question answering and hear how ClearQuery can be used to expose intelligence and actionable insights.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch 7.x et scoring best practices
video:video.video:description: Aprs une revue des dernires nouveauts de la stack Elastic, Adrien Grand nous parlera de Lucene 8, Elasticsearch 7.x et des bonnes pratiques en terme de scoring.Adrien fait parti de l'quipe de dveloppement Elasticsearch core et est commiter Lucene depuis plusieurs annes. N'hsitez pas venir poser des questions sur les algorithmes dans Lucene ou Elasticsearch !Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Rennes #3 chez ISTIC.

video:video.video:title: Reezocar, facilite la recherche de vhicules d'occasion en Europe (FR)
video:video.video:description: Reezocar est un site qui facilite la recherche de vhicules d'occasion en Europe et scurise son achat. Le site est aliment par plusieurs crawlers utilisant le framework Scrapy, qui mettent jour quotidiennement plus de 5 milions d'annonces qualifis. Nous utilisons une base Elasticsearch alimente grce a l'API officiel Elasticsearch-py largement retravaill pour nos besoins et exploitons le moteur d'indexation Lucene.

video:video.video:title: Comment DataDome manage son cluster forte charge en criture et lecture avec rollover et ILM
video:video.video:description: DataDome est une socit de cyberscurit internationale qui dlivre une solution SaaS qui a pour but de protger les sites internets et API des menaces automatises OWASP: credential stuffing, layer 7 DDoS attaques, SQL injection et intensive scraping. DataDome protge tous les points de vulnrabilits de ses clients (web, mobile apps & APIs) grce sa technologie d'intelligence artificielle qui dlivre une protection temps rel de bot protection.DataDome utilise Elasticsearch pour stocker toutes les requtes des utilisateurs finaux de ses clients. En quelques chiffres, le cluster Elasticsearch stocke plus de 150To de donnes, 60 milliards de documents rpartis en 3000 index et 15000 shards sur 80 nodes.Nous allons pendant ce talk voquer les problmes que DataDome a rencontr, relatif la forte charge en criture et comment l'quipe a russi les rsoudre en partie grce au rollover et l'index lifecycle management.Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #40 chez Doctrine.

video:video.video:title: KISS: Retour dexprience sur lutilisation dElasticsearch chez Canal+ (FR)
video:video.video:description: Nous parlerons search-as-you-type, indexation multi-source, supervision, micro-service, devops, cloud, et autres buzz-words. Nous aborderons certaines des problmatiques rencontres et les solutions mises en place.

video:video.video:title: Curiosity or How to Easily Explore Data From an Elasticsearch Cluster, Meetup Paris November 2014 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Curiosity - or how to easily explore data from an Elasticsearch cluster.

video:video.video:title: Mise en place d'une recherche "a la google" dans une base cliente
video:video.video:description: Les clients souhaitent souvent une recherche la google dans leur application.Pour un cas simple, Elasticsearch s'en sort facilement. Mais quand a se complexifie, avec notamment des objets imbriqus et des poids diffrents selon les critres, c'est moins vident.Je vous ferai un retour d'exprience sur la mise en place de ce type de recherche sur une base de 30 millions d'enregistrements.Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #37 chez Talan Labs.

video:video.video:title: La BI sur Elasticsearch, c'est possible ! (8 min)
video:video.video:description:
Dcouvrez comment utiliser les outils de BI tels que Microsoft Excel ou PowerBI sur Elasticsearch grce au langage SQL et au driver ODBC !
Requtage dans Elasticsearch avec le langage SQL Utilisation du driver ODBC Visualisation de donnes de Elasticsearch dans Excel et PowerBI

video:video.video:title: Beyond plain text: elasticsearchs annotated text field type
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch has a new field type which allows structured data to be added into the text of documents as annotations. Mark will demonstrate some of the powerful new search features this offers and how NER (Named Entity Recognition) tools like OpenNLP and Spacy can be used to tag people, places and organisations mentioned in text.Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #40 chez Doctrine.

video:video.video:title: Migrer vers Elasticsearch et classifier des donnees
video:video.video:description: Vous avez un moteur de recherche qui ne vous satisfait pas, vous ne matrisez pas sa technologie ou pire elle a atteint ses limites ? Venez dcouvrir les raisons qui feront qu'une migration vers Elasticsearch sera une russite pour votre projet. #GettingStartedChez ByPath on classifie des gros volumes de donnes non-structures, comme par exemple des intituls de poste ou partir d'informations gographiques partielles ? Je vous propose de dcouvrir comment nous avons astucieusement segment nos donnes pour les utiliser dans des recherches complexes mais ultra-rapides. #CustomizeSi le temps le permet, on verra comment s'est pass notre monte de version 2.4.5 vers 6.6.1, et comment il est possible d'intgrer la suite ELK dans une application.Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #37 chez Talan Labs.

video:video.video:title: Les Security Roles dans Kibana (5min)
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez comment mettre en place des droits d'accs au sein de Kibana.

video:video.video:title: Kibana Spaces (5 min)
video:video.video:description:
Dcouvrez les nouvelles fonctionnalits de Kibana, Kibana Spaces. Comment organiser, structurer vos visualisations et tableaux de bord ainsi que scuriser leur accs.
Creation d'un Kibana spaces Creation role et utilsateur Import-export d'un dashboard

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch sur Kubernetes : comment a marche ?
video:video.video:description: Introduction rapide Kubernetes, ses avantages, ses inconvnients Elasticsearch dans Kubernetes : pourquoi? Analyse macro de larchitecture dun cluster Elasticsearch dploy sur Kubernetes Dmo live : Dployons un cluster Elasticsearch Utilisation au quotidien, dun point de vue DevOps / SRE et dun point de vue dveloppeur / data engineer Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #36 chez Aircall.

video:video.video:title: Advanced Search for your Legacy Application (FR)
video:video.video:description: Comment mixer SQL et NoSQL sans faire la rvolution ?Dans cette session sous forme de "live coding", David vous montrera comment ajouter Elasticsearch votre application existante sans changer vos habitudes. Vous aurez des fonctions de recherche avances sans avoir crire du SQL complexe !David partira d'une application RestX, Hibernate et MySQL et ajoutera progressivement Elasticsearch afin de fournir dans une premier temps une fonction recherche quivalente fonctionnellement la prcdente puis montrera comment aller plus loin en tirant parti des performances du moteur de recherche !

video:video.video:title: ELK Chez Sexylog (FR)
video:video.video:description: SexiLog est une appliance VMware de la suite ELK spcialement configure et optimise pour les logs dESXi. Limportante configuration de Logstash et les nombreux dashboard Kibana embarqus vous permettent de surveiller la sant de votre infrastructure vSphere en temps rel et de prendre le recul ncessaire pour traiter vos incidents. En cas de problmes, Logstash transfert Riemann qui vous enverra un rsum des alertes par mail.

video:video.video:title: ML categorization (5min)
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez comment le Machine Learning d'Elastic catgorise automatiquement les logs non structurs pour identifier des anomaliesUtilisation du Data Visualizer pour charger un /var/log/secure, Catgorisation automatique des logs, Identification d'anomalie d'authentification

video:video.video:title: 'Elasticsearch as a Service' at eBay
video:video.video:description: With countless business-critical text search and analytics use cases that utilize Elasticsearch as the backbone, eBay has created a custom 'Elasticsearch as Service' platform to allow easy Elasticsearch cluster provisioning on their internal OpenStack-based cloud platform. In this talk, Sudeep will walk through each stage of the Elasticsearch-as-a-service lifecycle process which includes sizing, provisioning, configuring, maintaining, auto-scaling, and decommissioning states for every Elasticsearch cluster managed within eBay.

video:video.video:title: Hands-on with data visualization in Kibana
video:video.video:description: Interested in learning how to build charts, maps, dashboards, and reports in Kibana using Elasticsearch data? Learn how to get started with Kibana Lens, use Elastic Maps for detailed geospatial analysis, and create dashboards and PDF reports. We will show you how to get from data to insights with just a few clicks. After the session is complete, you'll have access to a hands-on lab environment so you can try it yourself.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch and Ciscos next-gen customer experience
video:video.video:description: Cisco provides high-end post-sale support to its partners and customers with a self-service platform for analytics and insights on their product entitlements. Learn how Cisco implemented Elasticsearch as the primary component of its technical stack to achieve sub-second response, high availability, and scale on more than two billion assets, and how Logstash helps ingest and collate 20 to 40 million change events per day in near real time.

video:video.video:title: From Dashboard to PDF: Generate Reports with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Get a step-by-step walkthrough of how to turn a dashboard into a report. And as a bonus, learn how you can schedule automated delivery of reports.

video:video.video:title: Powering monitoring as a service with Elastic at Socit Gnrale
video:video.video:description: Socit Gnrale wanted to evolve to a monitoring solution that bridged technical and functional vision to create more business value. To achieve this, they used a hybrid deployment with Elastic Cloud Enterprise to build an observability-focused solution. Learn how Socit Gnrale uses features like machine learning and Canvas with their observability data to track website activity, analyze API consumption and backend usage, and better detect fraud.

video:video.video:title: Why Contain Yourself? Official Elastic Stack for Docker
video:video.video:description: With the 5.X release of the Elastic Stack comes official support for the Docker container platform. The Elastic Docker team will discuss running the Elastic Stack in container environments using the official images they maintain and publish. Dimitrios and Toby will cover configuration techniques for the images and share tips on performance optimization, show how Elasticsearch's distributed nature aligns with container orchestration, and discuss the quality automation that ensures the Elastic Stack is always Docker-ready, whether on a laptop or across a fleet.

video:video.video:title: Schema on read with runtime fields
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch has always been fast, but required structuring and indexing your data up front. We're changing that with the introduction of runtime fields, which enable you to extract, calculate, and transform fields at query time. They can be defined after data is indexed or provided with your query, enabling new cost/storage/performance tradeoffs, and letting analysts gradually define fields over time.

video:video.video:title: Log Monitoring and Anomaly Detection at Scale at ORNL
video:video.video:description: As a cybersecurity provider for the nation's largest multi-program science and technology laboratory, home to the fastest supercomputer in the world, and the world's top scientists, ORNL cybersecurity group could not afford complacency. See how ORNL transitioned from using COTS toolset to a more cost-effective and flexible open source model by employing NiFi, Kafka, and the Elastic Stack. Learn how ORNL moved beyond the traditional SIEM architecture to a centralized data hub for security related information, providing better opportunities for collaboration between researchers and operations.

video:video.video:title: Lightning Talk: Automated Root Cause Analysis with Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: This 20-minute practical session will give you an idea of how you can advance on the road to AIOps by automating root cause analysis with the Elastic Stack. How to save time and effort when dealing with multiple alerts, systems or applications, how to quickly identify false positives and ultimately address more precisely the causes of issues in your IT environment? By analyzing events from the Elastic Stack and applying a supervised Machine Learning algorithm, we can pinpoint root causes with higher accuracy and respond better and faster.

video:video.video:title: Democratizing your data with Elastic on Microsoft Azure
video:video.video:description:
Elastic dmocratise l'accs aux donnes grce la puissance de la recherche, tout en rendant l'IA accessible tous. Dcouvrez comment. Restez l'afft ! Dcouvrez comment tirer le meilleur de vos donnes avec Elastic sur Microsoft Azure. Promis, pas besoin d'avoir un master en maths pour y arriver ! C'est tout simple !
Vous dcouvrirez entre autres :
Aperu du partenariat d'Elastic et d'Azure Nos solutions en matire de recherche d'entreprise, d'observabilit et de scurit Machine Learning Dmo de lancement
Autres ressources :
Dcouvrez pourquoi et comment Miles & More a migr vers Elastic Cloud sur Microsoft Azure Lancez-vous avec Elastic Cloud sur Microsoft Azure Apprenez crer un dploiement l'aide de votre compte Azure existant
Veuillez noter que cette prsentation est en Anglais.

video:video.video:title: Search made simple with Elastic SaaS-based solutions
video:video.video:description: Dployer et grer votre moteur de recherche personnalis n'a jamais t aussi simple, que vous ayez une quipe de dveloppeurs ou non. Avec Elastic App Search et Elastic Site Search, vous obtiendrez un moteur de recherche puissant et fonctionnel, adapt vos besoins, en seulement quelques minutes que ce soit pour votre site web, votre portail de support ou une application que vous avez dvelopp.Au-del de la recherche, nos solutions SaaS incluent de puissants outils d'analyse et d'optimisation qui permettent d'offrir la meilleure exprience de recherche possible vos utilisateurs. travers ce webinar, nos Solutions Architects vous montrerons comment concevoir un moteur de recherche performant qui rponde vos besoins et ceux de vos utilisateurs, et comment sa console d'administration vous permet d'accrotre sa pertinence en temps rel. Le webinar couvre les points suivants :Dmarrer en quelques clics avec les solutions SaaS d'Elasticsearch Utiliser le web crawler d'Elastic Site Search Ingrer des donnes avec Elastic App Search Optimiser la pertinence et acclrer les recherches R-indexer sans interruptions de service Prendre de bonnes dcisions grce aux fonctionnalits d'analyses

video:video.video:title: The Seven Deadly Sins of Elasticsearch Benchmarking
video:video.video:description: Benchmarking is a tricky business. Pitfalls await at every corner: What is your workload and how do you model it correctly? Which hardware do you choose? How do you avoid accidentally creating bottlenecks?We discuss common "gotchas" in benchmarking and provide tips and tricks to help you evaluate performance correctly.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020: Case Study: Via Varejo
video:video.video:description: Neste estudo de caso ser apresentado como a Via Varejo implementou as solues Elastic para a consolidao de dados de infraestrutura do ambiente de lojas, seus logs e aplicaes. Ser abordado o estgio atual e a expectativa de utilizao dos produtos Elastic para atender s demandas de negcio.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cloud keynote
video:video.video:description: Learn why Elastic Cloud is the best place to run everything Elastic. You will hear about our commitment to the cloud, the benefits of using managed services, and the optimizations weve made for running in public clouds. Listen as IST Research discusses their success with Elastic and see an end-to-end demo showing how easy it is to get started.

video:video.video:title: A new framework for alerts and actions in Kibana
video:video.video:description: See our exciting vision for reimagined alerts and actions. The new Kibana alerting framework, available in Elastic solutions and the Elastic Stack, amplifies the signal and reduces the noise. It also enables you to act by channeling notifications and workflow items to the systems that matter the most to you all through a friendly UX and improved performance.

video:video.video:title: Americas East (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Learn about features with demos and announcements, from cross-cluster replication and frozen indices in Elasticsearch to Kibana Spaces and the ever-growing set of data integrations in Beats and Logstash.

video:video.video:title: CSX: Real-time Business Discovery with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: CSX technology is a company invested in democratizing data for enterprise users. CSX was dealing with operational data that was constrained by silos, duplicated, and offering different perspectives. To solve their issues, they turned to the Elastic Stack. Discover how CSX is leveraging the Elastic Stack as a tour guide for business discovery, accelerating discovery with Kibana visuals, and using Elastic products to create a better, shared understanding with their business partners.

video:video.video:title: Public sector keynote
video:video.video:description: See the vision for the future of Elastic solutions, from new features to GovCloud availability and FedRAMP authorization. Find out whats in store for Elastic Enterprise Search, Observability, and Security and see how theyre evolving to help users better mitigate risk, reduce costs, and modernize infrastructures. Plus, see the honorees for this years Elastic Search Public Sector Awards and learn about their projects.

video:video.video:title: Monitor multi-cloud deployments with Elastic Observability
video:video.video:description: Enterprises are adopting multi-cloud or hybrid infrastructures to avoid vendor lock-in, reduce latencies, maximize ROI, and add redundancy. While these new deployment patterns have many benefits, centrally monitoring such a mixed system is challenging. Learn how the Elastic Stack can provide a single pane of glass to monitor applications and services deployed across multiple public clouds such as Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud.

video:video.video:title: Centralized logging in a changing environment at the UKs DVLA
video:video.video:description: The UK's Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency (DVLA) maintains more than 80 million driver and vehicle records and collects billions a year in Vehicle Excise Duty. Hear how Elastic plays a critical role in the agencys self-service developer platform that runs alongside Kubernetes and leverages machine learning and alerting capabilities. Youll also learn about their migration to Elastic Cloud and their goals for SIEM.

video:video.video:title: Concept to Flight: Engineering Software for Systems Engineers at JPL
video:video.video:description: JPL systems engineers are responsible for the system design across the lifecycle of a flight project, and capturing the complexity of this decision-making process is a difficult task. See the software approach that allows system engineers to document, query and perform analysis on highly structured data. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Streamline search with Elasticsearch Service on Microsoft Azure
video:video.video:description: Join Microsoft and learn about the best practices of running Elasticsearch Service in the Azure cloud, and how the partnership with Elastic makes it easier for you to deploy powerful search experiences in your Azure environment. You will also see joint service demos and hear about shared enterprise customer success stories.

video:video.video:title: Application Infrastructure Monitoring at Citigroup
video:video.video:description: With the evolving trend of cloud automation and containers, monitoring of application deployment environments is becoming increasingly complex. The rate of change and the amount of collected monitoring data is increasing rapidly, requiring a new paradigm for monitoring of business applications and associated infrastructure. In short, infrastructure monitoring is becoming a big data problem.In this presentation architecture and design principles of Citi's application infrastructure monitoring solution will be covered, addressing some of the key cloud monitoring challenges. Learn how Citi is leveraging advanced data search capabilities for monitoring data management, addressing both operations and business requirements.

video:video.video:title: Keynote - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Hear directly from the creators of the Elastic Stack on the importance of our community, the future of Elasticsearch and Kibana, new features, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Automating the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Developers use the Elastic API, CLI, and SDK to automate deployment provisioning, operations, and programmatic scaling. If you're looking to embed these functions into your CI/CD pipelines, applications, shell scripts, infrastructure as code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, or even configuration management tools like Ansible, Chef, and Puppet this session is for you.

video:video.video:title: Finding relevant results faster with Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: With today's growing amounts of information, it's critical to be able to efficiently retrieve the most relevant results for a query. Learn how Elasticsearch finds top hits for a query so quickly by building inverted indexes and using the Block-MAX WAND algorithm, as well as how you can tune Elasticsearch to make it even more efficient for your own use cases.

video:video.video:title: Integrating advanced analytics with Elasticsearch - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: Learn how Deloitte is integrating machine learning with native Elasticsearch functionality to help a large federal agency expedite document review for a variety of eDiscovery use cases. This talk will focus on integrating machine learning (ML)/natural language processing (NLP) into ingest pipelines to add metadata to an index and how Deloitte uses Elasticsearch queries to dynamically sort documents based on an iterative user feedback loop.

video:video.video:title: Building great search experiences
video:video.video:description: When building a search experience, there are many factors to consider in the data modeling, underlying logic, overall design, and user experience. Explore how to bring search to any application by learning how to build React-based search using Elastics open source Search UI library. After the session, you'll have access to a hands-on lab environment to practice these skills.

video:video.video:title: Monitor every app, in every stage, with free and open Elastic APM
video:video.video:description: Elastic APM helps you deliver better digital experiences by providing complete visibility into the health of your apps no matter how they are built, where they run, or which dev stage theyre in. Learn about the evolution of Elastic APM, the problems it solves, and where its headed. See how it connects traces, logs, and metrics to help you quickly get to the root cause. Plus, hear from customers using Elastic APM to improve their applications.

video:video.video:title: 'Users: WE KNOW THEM' The ELF @ Salesforce
video:video.video:description: Salesforce built a plugin to the Elastic Stack called ELF that enables the collection of Salesforce log data. Come learn how it allows businesses to easily report on user activity in Salesforce and gain insights into organizational usage trends and user behavior.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security in action - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: Elastics Mike Nichols and John Harmon will facilitate a conversation including product and mission perspectives from three Elastic Security users NGA, Maryland Innovation Security Institute, and Valiant.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - San Francisco 2020
video:video.video:description: See the vision behind changes coming to Elastic products, from new features and solutions to whats to come after joining forces with endpoint security company Endgame. Hear directly from the creators of the Elastic Stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Security Events Logging at Bell Canada
video:video.video:description: One of Canadas largest telecommunications company is using Elastic to drive improved security analysis in their SOC. With a need to ingest all security logs, build threat detection models, and normalize many new types of logs, the Bell security team turned to Elastic. Learn how theyve streamlined alerts, deepened log analysis, and addressed challenges unique to being an ISP.

video:video.video:title: Opening keynote | Americas
video:video.video:description: Kick off ElasticON Global with Elastic Founder and CEO Shay Banon. Learn how we've evolved from the Elastic Stack to three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security. Hear about our latest features and products as well as what's on the horizon. See how our solutions are driving customer success and innovation with live demos from Elastic product and engineering experts. Shay will be joined by the CEO of Google Cloud to talk about Elastic's partnership with Google Cloud. Then hear from the Director of Infrastructure Engineering at Cerner and VP Engineering Senior Manager at Wells Fargo as they share how the Elastic Stack has helped them innovate and implement solutions that solve their most complex, mission-critical problems.

video:video.video:title: Deliver great user experiences with RUM and synthetic monitoring
video:video.video:description: Is your site up? Are visitors bouncing due to load times? How is your latest code push impacting the user experience? Can you proactively catch issues through simulated tests? Preview how the upcoming synthetic monitoring and real user monitoring (RUM) features in Elastic Observability can help you answer these questions and more. See real-world scenarios where you can bring synthetic and RUM together for enhanced digital experience monitoring.

video:video.video:title: The Hotel NERSC Data Collect: Where Data Checks In, But Never Checks Out
video:video.video:description: The NERSC data collect system is designed to provide access to 30TB of logs and time-series data generated by the supercomputers at Berkeley Lab. This talk will cover the life of an index inside the cluster, from initial tagging, node routing, snapshot/restore, use of aliases to combine indexes, and archiving on high disk capacity nodes using generic hardware. Additionally, Thomas and Cary will highlight several aspects of using Elasticsearch as a large, long term data storage engine, including index allocation tagging, use of index aliases, Curator and scripts to generate snapshots, long term archiving of these snapshots, and restoration.

video:video.video:title: The Elastic Evolution of CenturyLinks Network Management System
video:video.video:description: Its all about finding the right data at the right time for CenturyLink, creators of one of the largest networks in the world. See how CenturyLink has evolved their Network Management System and how Elastic plays a big part in their evolving platform. Learn how they address issues like volume, variety, and velocity of data being generated by disparate network devices and how they are creating simple yet scalable solutions to find the right data at the right time.

video:video.video:title: Optimizing Elastic for Search at McQueen Solutions
video:video.video:description: Learn best practices for squeezing every last drop of performance out of Elasticsearch queries and aggregations -- all based off of real-world production clusters. From small clusters to hundred-node clusters, learn which knobs and dials to consider when optimizing for search. Youll get insight into indexing and sharding strategies, index and mapping settings, query and aggregation types as well as basic profiling, and benchmark methodologies and knowing when to scale up.

video:video.video:title: Advanced correlations for threat detection and more
video:video.video:description: Learn how to perform correlations and create rules to detect malicious activity and identify and correlate behaviors. Event Query Language (EQL) provides robust data processing and analysis capabilities that are ideal for hunting threats, investigating suspicious activity, and scoping incidents.

video:video.video:title: The Nuts and Bolts of Product Search How Fastenal Refreshes Large Indexes Nightly
video:video.video:description: Fastenal is the largest distributor of fasteners in North America with nearly 500,000 products on their websites. Their various public websites contain only a small subset of the entire product lists used by employees and commercial customers. Their entire product line and related details are indexed and stored in Elasticsearch to support search across their complete catalog.See an in-depth demo of their product search, learn how Fastenal builds their indexes nightly, and learn how their IT team uses the Elastic Stack to build a better customer experience.

video:video.video:title: Elastic, DevSecOps, and the DOD software factory
video:video.video:description: The Department of Defense (DoD) and many other organizations are moving towards Agile and infrastructure as code (IaC). This shift improves efficiency and provides more robust security, leading to capabilities such as continuous monitoring and shortened authorization to operate timeframes. Learn more about the DoD software factory and how Elastic fits in.

video:video.video:title: Opening keynote | EMEA
video:video.video:description: Kick off ElasticON Global with Elastic Founder and CEO Shay Banon. Learn how we've evolved from the Elastic Stack to three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security. Hear about our latest features and products as well as what's on the horizon. See how our solutions are driving customer success and innovation with live demos from Elastic product and engineering experts. Shay will be joined by the CEO of Google Cloud to talk about Elastic's partnership with Google Cloud. Then hear from the GM Digital Emerging Technologies and VP of IT Innovation at Shell International as he shares how the Elastic Stack has helped them innovate and implement solutions for today and tomorrow.

video:video.video:title: Integrating Human Genetic Data to Help Drive Drug Discovery: Elastic @ Merck
video:video.video:description: As genome sequencings costs have dramatically fallen, scientists have been awash in genetic data for novel research but the existing tools and methods for analysis were not scaling well in terms of data size and harmonization, and they are also tedious, manual, and require a significant amount of expert integration. Daniel and Bhasker will share Mercks journey with Elasticsearch, which has enabled them to harmonize a data ingestion pipeline and create a universal coordinate system for genetic variants as a backbone to help scientists uncover new insights on human genetics across a broad spectrum of diseases (from cancers, alzheimers, diabetes), and to aid in the discovery and validation of new therapies.

video:video.video:title: How to Make the Business Case for the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Concerned about justifying the money spent on open source technology to management? Want to know how to build and present a case for related expenses? Need help communicating the value these tools will bring back to the business?Because the Elastic Stack is open source, its not always obvious how to make the case to upper management about the benefits of a commercial relationship with Elastic. We will talk about approaches to answering all of the above questions and more.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: Visibility into your infrastructure is critical, and the Elastic (ELK) Stack, brings its logging strengths to your metrics use case. Discover how simplified data onboarding with hundreds of prebuilt integrations, automated insights with alerting and machine learning, and new visual tools built for exploring infrastructure metrics are streamlining the monitoring use case.

video:video.video:title: Securing network operations at University of Nevada - Reno
video:video.video:description: The University of Nevada - Reno uses Elastic to ingest, analyze, and act upon insights derived from their log, metric, and SIEM data. This interview-style session will explore how the network operations team controls costs, reduces risk, and increases efficiency as they secure their data and their network with Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Yale: The Search for Cancers Causes and Cures
video:video.video:description: As a physician and software developer, Dr. Schulz manages the informatics related to next generation sequencing of cancer at the Yale Department of Laboratory Medicine. This talk will focus on how their team uses Elasticsearch to power their research database that is used by clinicians and researchers to identify novel causes of cancer, potential therapeutic targets, and determine if patients are eligible for clinical trials.

video:video.video:title: Realising the value of search - EON Public Sector Europe
video:video.video:description: Why do customers continue to invest in Elastic? Hear from a panel of public sector partners on how they adopted Elastic, how they use Elastic today, what they've learned along the way, and their plans for Elastic in the future.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability is helping organisations drive their mean time to resolution toward zero with end-to-end visibility in a single platform. Hear about the latest features and capabilities at all layers from ingest to insight and get a glimpse into the future straight from the product leaders who are building it.

video:video.video:title: Securing the Elastic Stack for free
video:video.video:description: Learn how to secure your Elastic Stack deployment for free using capabilities such as TLS encryption, role-based access control, and multi-tenancy features to support your organizations needs. Elasticsearch and Kibana product management leaders will outline how to approach Elastic Stack security from a holistic perspective and share guidance as well as lessons learned.

video:video.video:title: Localizing Kibana for the Global Language Landscape
video:video.video:description: IBM and their customers identified the support for multiple languages localization as a key capability needed in Kibana in all visualization dashboards. In this talk, Martin and Shikha will describe the key aspects of Kibana globalization from design to capability delivered, as well as some of the design journey they took to get there. They will also provide the integration points for localization engineers who wish to add support for a particular language and plug-in authors adding or modifying Kibana plug-ins. It is an exciting journey not to be missed in the growth of Kibana and the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Better together: How the Elastic solutions work in tandem
video:video.video:description: The Elastic Stack has always powered a wide variety of search use cases. Get a closer look at how some of the broader Elastic capabilities, such as machine learning anomaly detection and alerting, can be combined with Elastic Enterprise Search to enable powerful, customizable search projects.

video:video.video:title: Lessons learned from Elastic customers
video:video.video:description: Why do customers continue to invest in Elastic? Hear from a panel of public sector customers on how they adopted Elastic, how they use Elastic today, what theyve learned along the way, and their plans for Elastic in the future.

video:video.video:title: KeyBank on their Elastic-powered observability platform
video:video.video:description: Join Steve Mayzak, Elastic Field CTO, and Norm Alfano, Senior Architect at KeyBank, for a fireside chat as they walk through the multiyear journey KeyBank took in completely redesigning their end-to-end enterprise monitoring systems. Learn how KeyBank has consolidated their 25+ point solutions into a single Elastic-powered observability platform, what the operational and opportunity costs have been, and how they are looking to further leverage and scale the platform going forward.

video:video.video:title: The importance of normalizing your security data to ECS
video:video.video:description: The Elastic Common Schema (ECS) can be used for SIEM, logging, APM, and more. See the different paths to adopting ECS for security and why data normalization is so critical. Learn how to map custom sources so they can be used by Elastic Security and how to implement custom pipelines that may require additional fields. We'll provide concrete examples and give pointers to relevant resources to help you get going.

video:video.video:title: Security thought leadership in education
video:video.video:description: Join leaders from all levels of education, from K-12 school districts to private and public higher education, as they discuss how security challenges have changed over time and how their institutions have adopted Elastic to help respond to the increasing threats. Panelists will join us from Birdville ISD, Tufts University, and Indiana University.

video:video.video:title: The Usual Suspects: Automatic Alerts to Monitor your Cluster
video:video.video:description: When monitoring met alerting, the average time spent to troubleshoot went down and the average sleep time went up. True story.X-Pack, which made its first debut with the 5.0 release of the Elastic Stack, brings monitoring and alerting features together to enable built-in cluster alerts. Chris and Bohyun will go over the latest in monitoring and management in the first portion of the talk, then Antonio will talk about how to solve real-world problems using monitoring data based on customer scenarios he's helped with as part of the Elastic support team.

video:video.video:title: Diving In The Deep End: Logging and Metrics at DigitalOcean
video:video.video:description: From server health checks to network monitoring to customer activity events logs are everywhere at DigitalOcean. In a single day, we collect more than a terabyte of real-time log data over our entire operations infrastructure. Buried in that non-stop stream of data is everything we need to know to keep DigitalOcean's cloud services up and running. This talk covers how we collect, parse, route, store, and make this data available to operations and engineers while keeping things simple enough for a small team to manage.

video:video.video:title: Sipping from the Firehose: Scalable Endpoint Data for Incident Response
video:video.video:description: From the technical talent behind some of the on-screen hacks on USA Networks Mr. Robot, this talk covers how to improve incident response by combining technologies like Elasticsearch with distributed, on-endpoint analysis for comprehensive, high-speed and efficient visibility at any scale.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security: Unified protection for everyone - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Prevent, detect, and respond to threats with Elastic Security, free and open for analysts everywhere. Built on the Elastic Stack, Elastic Security powers the SOC by eliminating blind spots, stopping threats at scale, and arming every analyst. Join this fast-moving session to see it in action.

video:video.video:title: Atlassian: Unleashing Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Atlassian is using Elasticsearch to power its internal logging platform, depended on by dozens of internal product teams. Find out how a small team is delivering big wins by choosing to build on top of Elasticsearch and AWS, and where they're taking Elasticsearch next.

video:video.video:title: Building Elastic into security operations
video:video.video:description: Learn how Optiv took foundational ideas around optimization of data ingestion, automation, and search to build world-class managed cybersecurity services with Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Using Elastic @ Elastic: Fast-tracking support search
video:video.video:description: Learn how an internal team at Elastic used Search UI, Elastic App Search, and Elastic Cloud to speed up development of a customer support portal search experience, reducing the time and effort needed to deliver an enhanced customer experience.

video:video.video:title: Shaping insight into results with Elastic App Search
video:video.video:description: Analyze, adapt. Rinse, repeat. Learn how to leverage the prebuilt search analytics in Elastic App Search and custom visualizations in Kibana to gain business insights. Then discover how to easily tune search relevance and results to create a better customer experience and drive ROI with minimal technical effort.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight
video:video.video:description: Visibility into your infrastructure is critical and the Elastic Stack brings its logging strengths to your metrics use case. Discover how simplified data onboarding with hundreds of prebuilt integrations, automated insights with alerting and machine learning, and new visual tools built for exploring infrastructure metrics are streamlining the monitoring use case.

video:video.video:title: Securing the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: From recent developments with TLS everywhere to what's on the horizon with encrypted settings and authentication protocols such as SAML and oAuth, the security world of the Elastic Stack is robust. Learn about existing Elastic Stack security features and plan ahead for developments coming in the future. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Forever free and open Enterprise Search
video:video.video:description: There's always a budget for free. Join our engineering team leads as they take you through some of the free features they are most excited about. Explore all the no-cost capabilities you can use in Elastic App Search and Workplace Search to create rich search experiences for your customers and teams.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture
video:video.video:description: No matter where you are in your journey to cloud native, Elastic APM can help you deliver better customer experiences by spotting performance bottlenecks sooner and identifying regressions from new deployments faster. Learn how to get a complete view of the services that power your applications from frontend to backend to keep them running smoothly.

video:video.video:title: Reliable by Design: Applying Formal Methods to Distributed Systems
video:video.video:description: Building fast, scalable, and robust distributed systems such as Elasticsearch requires choosing the right algorithms for the right tasks. While many algorithms are readily available, often they need to be extended or adapted to fit the requirements of a real-world implementation. For instance, customizing or combining algorithms in non-trivial ways can easily break safety properties. Using formal methods in the development process of a distributed system helps to catch bugs in the design phase and reveal fundamental issues that testing might not easily uncover.Learn how the Elasticsearch team is making use of formal methods in the design of distributed algorithms. They'll discuss their specification methodology, toolset, and their experiences applying it to the data replication and cluster consensus algorithms in Elasticsearch. In particular, they'll focus on their recent work on these two core algorithms using the TLA+ toolbox (based on Lamport's Temporal Logic of Actions) and the Isabelle/HOL theorem prover system.

video:video.video:title: Faster business decisions and collaboration with Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: With a dizzying array of productivity and collaboration tools available on the market, learning how to maximize their usefulness and your investment in them is paramount. A unified search experience across all those sources of content ensures that your teams consistently see and share the right docs and data. See how less time spent searching means more time spent strategizing.

video:video.video:title: AsperTI: Technological data management for the Judiciary of Brazil
video:video.video:description: Saiba como a Asper e a Elastic desenharam uma soluo para disponibilizar um projeto de armazenamento e busca de dados processuais com alta performance, segurana e objetividade.

video:video.video:title: What's the 411? Building Alerts on Elasticsearch @ Etsy
video:video.video:description: When working with a web application, you may find yourself drowning in logs. Some of this data is vital for debugging your application, and some can be a rich source of data for alerting. This talk will cover how Etsy constructs and responds to alert queries, as well as offer up ideas for additional types of alerts.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues
video:video.video:description: Learn key practices in data collection and normalization to expand visibility into your environment. See how you can use Elastic Security to quickly and accurately triage, verify, and scope issues.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch Data Journey: Life of a Document in Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Ever wondered about the lifecycle of a single document in Elasticsearch? What happens when you index it? How does Elasticsearch ensure a document is replicated and found across the whole cluster reliably? Does deleting a document really physically remove the document from disk? How do we get from a blob of text and keywords to near real-time search and analytics?This talk will explain the when, where and why of your document's life inside of Elasticsearch. Alex and Boaz will take you through the journey of a document across a cluster, taking off with JSON and the curly braces, travelling through the network into the memory and all the analysis chains, heading further onto storage when writing into the transaction logs and Apache Lucene index, being read back by executing searches, all the way until the document is finally deleted.Even though this talk will cover a lot of different aspects, it's a talk for those who may be less familiar with core searchfunctionality. You do not need to be an Apache Lucene wizard to follow along and find this session useful.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2016 Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic Founder & CEO Steven Schuurman, Elastic Founder & CTO Shay Banon, and other members of the Elastic engineering team kick off Elastic{ON} 2016 with company and product highlights from the past year as well as what to expect with the upcoming 5.0 release. You'll hear about updates coming to the Elastic Stack, learn about what the heck a Pack is, and see some awesome live demos of the new Kibana interface and Graph API. Jason McGee, VP and CTO of the IBM Cloud Platform, also shares how IBM leverages the Elastic Stack within its organization.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring the COVID-19 outbreak using the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: The outbreak of the COVID-19 has surprised a lot of different countries all over the world. In this virtual meetup we are going to see how easy it is to put data from the World Health Organization regarding COVID-19 in Elasticsearch and visualize them in Kibana.Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #44 virtuel.

video:video.video:title: Machine learning and the Elastic Stack: Everywhere you need it
video:video.video:description: From security detection rules to log categorization, machine learning capabilities in the Elastic Stack are tightly integrated to support a wide number of use cases. Learn how machine learning is both a differentiating horizontal capability within the Elastic Stack as well as a force multiplier within the Elastic Observability and Elastic Security solutions.

video:video.video:title: Stop attacks with Elastic's signatureless anti-malware model
video:video.video:description: Hear the data science perspective on malware protection, including a historical overview of key milestones in the development of MalwareScore, Elastic's machine learning-powered malware protection. Learn how MalwareScore distinguishes malicious from benign and how it is regularly retrained to combat advanced threats. You'll also learn about EMBER, an open source malware model and dataset.

video:video.video:title: Power and privilege in technology
video:video.video:description: In a landscape where many feel hindered by institutional bias, endeavoring for progress can feel insurmountable. This panel explores personal and professional experiences that have informed each panelists life, how theyve overcome hurdles in the quest to establish their own spheres of influence, and how individuals, managers, and organizations can use their privilege to craft just, equitable, inclusive, and diverse cultures.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring Oranges applications with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Le dfi dOrange concernait la construction dune architecture scalable mme de support le volume croissant de trafic. Orange a intgr pour cela la Suite Elastic au sein de leur solution hberge sur le cloud, Erable. Cette solution aide surveiller les applications de divertissement et de gestion de la relation client qui sont utilises par prs de 18 millions d'utilisateurs. La Suite Elastic est maintenant utilise pour grer la fois les logs et les mtriques. Aujourdhui cest un outil cl pour les utilisateurs et la prochaine tape sera lexpansion du cas dusage au reste de  leur programme Cloud pour garantir lobservabilit de lensemble de lcosystme dOrange France.

video:video.video:title: Keeping Your Data From Getting Swiped Right Away: Security Analytics at Tinder
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch has been the core of Tinder's infrastructure since the beginning. The goal of connecting users around the world, with 1.4 billion swipes and 26 million matches daily, is powered by the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: What's Brewing in Beats? (2017)
video:video.video:description: Beats are a family of lightweight shippers that send data from edge machines to Elasticsearch. They started with a single Beat Packetbeat for network data, and have since expanded to four additional Elastic Beats for log files, metrics, windows event logs, and availability monitoring, and more than 30 community-created Beats for all kinds of operational data.In this session, Monica and Tudor will walk you through the latest Beats and their features. You will learn about the new Filebeat modules, which simplify the collection and parsing of common log files down to a single command. You will also see Heartbeat in action, our newest Beat responsible for uptime monitoring.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines
video:video.video:description: See how Elastic gives your security team customized visualizations and workflows you need to improve efficiency, streamline collaboration, and truly operationalize your security insights.

video:video.video:title: Streamline search with Elasticsearch Service on Microsoft Azure - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Join Microsoft and learn about the best practices of running Elasticsearch Service in the Azure cloud, and how the partnership with Elastic makes it easier for you to deploy powerful search experiences in your Azure environment. You will also see joint service demos and hear about shared enterprise customer success stories.

video:video.video:title: Transforming SmartSOC services with Elastic Security
video:video.video:description: Durante esta sesin presentaremos cmo los servicios del SmartSOC de Entelgy Innotec Security se han transformado apoyados en la tecnologa de Elastic Security, permitiendo ofrecer un modelo de servicio eficiente y modular, integrando en un mismo stack nuestras soluciones de SIEM, EDR y Threathunting as a Service, adems, la flexibilidad de esta plataforma nos ha permitido generar mtricas e indicadores operativos de los servicios y hacer seguimiento de los SLAs de los clientes. Adems como partner de Elastic ponemos a disposicin de nuestros clientes este conocimiento para quienes quieren de forma independiente desplegar estas capacidades internamente o a travs de servicios gestionados.

video:video.video:title: Cybersecurity: Intelligence, innovation, and information warfare
video:video.video:description: Companies and governments are increasingly dependent upon innovations in digital technologies to achieve their missions. But as the digital world becomes increasingly complex and interconnected, cybercriminals and nation-state adversaries are taking advantage of the same technological advances and innovating at a rapid pace. If security depends on staying a step ahead, then how should we think about this new world, and how can we succeed in it?

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (Americas)
video:video.video:description: Successful observability initiatives hinge on the platform teams that manage centralized tooling and frameworks. See how Elastic Observability empowers them to create centers of excellence (and deliver on observability as a service) with features like central management for agents, automated log categorization, index lifecycle management, and searchable snapshots.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability helps organizations drive their mean time to resolution toward zero with end-to-end visibility in a single platform. Hear about the latest features and capabilities at all layers from ingest to insight and get a glimpse into the future straight from the product leaders who are building it.

video:video.video:title: Tackling Cyber with RockNSM
video:video.video:description: Cyber is a human versus human problem. RockNSM covers your data gaps and delivers information to your humans so they can find the adversary.

video:video.video:title: Connecting the Dots with Elasticsearch...Tracing of Events within ING
video:video.video:description: Leaving behind a world of isolated departments and applications, ING has now embraced the omnichannel approach. Teams are working closely together, but are lacking the visibility needed across systems. This is how ING solves the problem of tracing events in a complex software environment.

video:video.video:title: Managing the Elastic Stack at Scale
video:video.video:description: Get tips directly from the experts at Elastic about planning for, monitoring, and troubleshooting the Elastic Stack at scale. Elastic experts will share the tools, strategies, and architectures that can be used to ensure cluster health and performance. Learn about using tools like automated alerting to identify and remediate issues rapidly. Walk away armed with best practices for how to ensure both cluster and data resiliency.

video:video.video:title: Why you should use Elastic for infrastructure metrics
video:video.video:description: Widely known for full-text search and logging, the Elastic Stack has evolved into a compelling solution for infrastructure metrics use cases. From fast and efficient time series datastore to integrations for onboarding common service metrics and dedicated UIs for visual exploration, see the many reasons to start using Elastic for your infrastructure metrics use case today.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elastic Security has evolved to help SecOps teams take a broader, more inclusive approach to security and set their organizations up for success.

video:video.video:title: IBM Bluemix Platform Logging with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: IBM Bluemix platform logs to the Elastic stack. Learn about the flexibility of our logging solutions in microservice environments. See Docker and Cloud Foundry logging no user configuration necessary. Runtime logs are easily added. In this session, Charlie and Ray will show an example logging from a Watson service. They'll also share details on their capabilities as well as how they deliver cloud scale logging built on the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: What's new at Elastic: Update on major initiatives and releases - EON Public Sector US State & Federal
video:video.video:description: The first technical talk of the event will highlight the latest releases at Elastic with specific insight into how those changes impact public sector projects. See the inside view of the most important capabilities and hear predictions on the developments that will be most applicable in our industry.

video:video.video:title: Operationally useful anomaly detection systems
video:video.video:description: Learn about the key system and data modeling challenges for performing anomaly detection on large complex systems in near real time. You'll see how Elastic approaches these problems as we illustrate how the specific modeling choices affect the quality of results. We'll also briefly survey other popular time series modeling techniques and assess their suitability for anomaly detection.

video:video.video:title: Opening keynote | Asia Pacific
video:video.video:description: Kick off ElasticON Global with Elastic Founder and CEO Shay Banon. Learn how we've evolved from the Elastic Stack to three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security. Hear about our latest features and products as well as what's on the horizon. See how our solutions are driving customer success and innovation with live demos from Elastic product and engineering experts. Shay will be joined by the CEO of Google Cloud to talk about Elastic's partnership with Google Cloud. Then hear from the Head of Information Security for King & Wood Mallesons as he shares how the Elastic Stack has helped them innovate and implement solutions for today and tomorrow.

video:video.video:title: Modernizing deployment in any environment with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Many government organizations were already in various stages of adopting cloud strategies, but with recent global events this movement has dramatically accelerated. Find out how Elastic is helping with this shift by providing agencies with seamless and flexible deployment options that allow them to choose among on-prem, private VPCs, and public SaaS (authorized FedRAMP Moderate on GovCloud) to deploy the right workload in the right place.

video:video.video:title: Migrating to Elasticsearch Service on Elastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: Learn how to get started with migrating your cluster to Elastic Cloud. Hear about the best practices and strategies for migrating your clusters and data to Elastic Cloud. The topics we'll cover include deployment sizing, indexing your data, restoring from snapshots, and more.

video:video.video:title: What's new at Elastic: Update on major initiatives and releases - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: The first technical talk of the event will highlight the latest releases at Elastic with specific insight into how those changes impact public sector projects. See the inside view of the most important capabilities and hear predictions on the developments that will be most applicable in our industry.

video:video.video:title: Reinventing enterprise defense with the Elastic Stack - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: In 2020 Uber's security team landed on a search and discovery platform heavily dependent on the Elastic Stack. While the security engineering challenges Uber faces on a day-to-day basis span far and wide, they're certainly not all unique to Uber from correlating behaviors across data sources to building interfaces for examining security logs and crafting detection logic to surface malicious behaviors, to name a few. Hear the most impactful lessons learned from Uber's security journey, and how security practitioners everywhere can tackle pervasive enterprise security challenges using the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Faster business decisions and collaboration with Elastic Workplace Search - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: With a dizzying array of productivity and collaboration tools available on the market, learning how to maximize their usefulness and your investment in them is paramount. A unified search experience across all those sources of content ensures that your teams consistently see and share the right docs and data. See how less time spent searching means more time spent strategizing.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Eliminar puntos ciegos significa que ahora tendras suficiente contexto. Pero podras obtener informacin importante de ese contexto cuando la necesites? Conoce cmo detectar amenazas (y evitar la interferencia de los falsos positivos) con el motor de deteccin en Elastic Security. Vers cmo automatizar la deteccin de amenazas a travs de correlaciones y Machine Learning, con ejemplos del mundo real de ambos.

video:video.video:title: Fast and effective correlation of events and threats at CODERE
video:video.video:description: CODERE es una multinacional espaola, con una experiencia de ms de 35 aos, referente en el sector del juego privado en Europa y Latinoamrica.
