Dentro del proceso de transformacin de CODERE la ciberseguridad es clave, siendo uno de los pilares la visibilidad de la informacin, as como la rpida y efectiva correlacin de los eventos y el hunting de amenazas. Elastic Security ha ofrecido una versatilidad y rendimiento excepcional para manejar estos volmenes de informacin y es el primer paso de un proyecto ambicioso de creacin de un datalake para prevencin del fraude, ciberseguridad y la monitorizacin inteligente de la red e infraestructura.

video:video.video:title: Advanced Threat Monitoring using Elastic
video:video.video:description: Conozca el caso de estudio de Digiware donde conoceremos el reto de hacer una gestin de monitoreo avanzado de amenazas de ciberseguridad, con el fin de identificar eventos relevantes de ataque y utilizando algunos motores de Machine Learning para dicho efecto, todo procesado con la tecnologa de Elastic. As mismo, el proceso de migracin de una plataforma SIEM a Elastic e integrado a los dems componentes de operacin de un SOC usando mecanismos de MDR.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Ajusta tus procesos de respuesta ante incidentes monitoreando la falta de cumplimiento, alertando sobre actividad atpica y personalizando exploraciones para automatizar las acciones de respuesta. Ve cmo Elastic le brinda a tu equipo de seguridad las visualizaciones y flujos de trabajo personalizados que necesitas para mejorar la eficiencia, optimizar la colaboracin y poner realmente en funcionamiento la informacin de seguridad.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Cuando incluso las amenazas bsicas pueden tener varias etapas y ser complejas, la visibilidad limitada de los datos de seguridad no ser suficiente. Ya sea que estes realizando investigaciones o buscando amenazas, necesitaras todo el contexto relevante para la seguridad. Aprende prcticas clave de recopilacin y normalizacin de datos y ve cmo puedes usar Elastic Security para priorizar, verificar e incluir problemas con rapidez y precisin.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision - EON Security Latin America 2021
video:video.video:description: Los equipos de SecOps asumen ms responsabilidad que nunca para aumentar actividad desde una fuerza de trabajo recientemente remota, lo que acelera la necesidad de la transformacin digital. Conoce cmo evolucion Elastic Security para ayudar a los equipos de SecOps tomar un enfoque ms amplio e inclusivo en base a la seguridad y preparar a sus organizaciones para el xito. Adems, conoce la visin de lo que vendr.

video:video.video:title: CYBERSOCs holistic approach to cybersecurity
video:video.video:description: Tener la posibilidad de centralizar el anlisis y correlacionamiento de datos, la gestin de la seguridad de la informacin, la auditoria y monitoreo de polticas, la cacera e inteligencia de amenazas y el cumplimiento normativo soportado por un enfoque de bigdata de ciberseguridad que potencializa el anlisis de los casos de uso de mquinas de aprendizaje e inteligencia de agentes, nos ha permitido prevenir, detectar y responder ante las amenazas cibernticas ms letales y recientes.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Los equipos de SecOps asumen ahora ms responsabilidades que nunca, ya que la actividad en lnea aumenta a raz  de una nueva fuerza de trabajo remota, lo que acelera la necesidad de transformacin digital. Descubre cmo Elastic Security ha evolucionado para ayudar a los equipos de SecOps a adoptar un enfoque de seguridad ms amplio e inclusivo y preparar a sus organizaciones para el xito. Adems, escucha la visin de lo que sigue.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Aun las amenazas bsicas pueden ser mltiples y complejas, y la visibilidad limitada de tus datos de seguridad simplemente no es suficiente. Ya sea que realices investigaciones o busques amenazas, necesitas todo el contexto relevante para la seguridad. Aprende las prcticas clave en la recopilacin y normalizacin de datos y ve cmo puedes usar Elastic Security para clasificar, verificar y abordar problemas de forma rpida y precisa.

video:video.video:title: Live-Interview mit Audi (DE)
video:video.video:description: Wie Audi Elasticsearch in deren Suchprojekt "Share42tomorrow" einsetzt, um damit Millionen von Dokumenten zu prozessieren und durchsuchen.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring modern applications using Elastic
video:video.video:description: Explore how Elastic can help you monitor and troubleshoot your applications in real time. Learn how to leverage the Elastic Stack to monitor multiple deployments and resolve challenges in your environment. After the session, you'll have access to a hands-on lab environment to practice these skills.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic solutions are built on the Elastic Stack (Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash, and Beats). The power of building on a single stack is that every innovation delivered on the Elastic Stack benefits all Elastic solutions. And the more you do on the Elastic Stack, the more value you get out of your investment. Hear about the key focus areas for development in Elasticsearch and Kibana, what we have delivered recently, and where we are headed.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security keynote
video:video.video:description: Openness is important at Elastic we code in the open, communicate directly with our users, and offer free, powerful software that can be deployed across major cloud providers or through self-managed downloads. Learn how Elastic Security delivers on our free and open philosophy to help SecOps teams take a broader, more inclusive approach to security and set their organizations up for success.

video:video.video:title: Empowering agencies using Elastic as a Service inside Government - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: It has now been four years since the beta release of Elastic Cloud Enterprise which kicked off a wave of the Elastic public sector community running Elastic as a service within Government rather than utilizing purely hosted solutions. Fast forward to 2021 and we have multiple options for multiple mission needs. Learn top tips from Elastic architects and their experience enabling their teams with the automation and provisioning of Elastic tech to change the game in how government delivers solutions.

video:video.video:title: Using machine learning to detect DGA with >99.9% accuracy
video:video.video:description: Accurately detect domain generation algorithm (DGA) activity using the Elastic Stack by deploying a pre-trained supervised machine learning model to enrich Packetbeat data at ingest and anomaly detection to improve accuracy and pinpoint malicious hosts. We will walk through the configuration and then deep dive into what each component is doing, how the model was trained, and how the model can detect real-world malware activity.

video:video.video:title: How we built this: Data tiering, snapshots, and asynchronous search
video:video.video:description: What goes into a major roadmap investment at Elastic? Take a closer look at the technical capabilities that come together to help us deliver on our data tier vision from asynchronous search to searchable S3/blob store/Google storage, new cold and frozen storage tiers, and more.

video:video.video:title: Replacing Legacy Product Search with Elasticsearch at IEEE GlobalSpec
video:video.video:description: In 2017, IEEE GlobalSpec replaced their legacy product search with an Elasticsearch cluster. Starting with an index of approximately 20 million product documents and an eye toward scaling, the team leveraged built-in Elasticsearch functionalities to solve their unique search challenges. Today their backend environment consists of seven Elasticsearch nodes with a gateway service sitting in the front to analyze user requests and add business logic.Learn why IEEE GlobalSpec chose Elasticsearch, see the topology of their cluster, and learn how they're combining aggregations to solve diversification issues and searching across vastly different types of reference content to deliver the very best results at search time.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch for .NET Developers: A Whirlwind Dive into the Strongly-Typed Client for .NET
video:video.video:description:
Elasticsearch for .NET Developers: A whirlwind dive into the strongly-typed client for .NET Elasticsearch offers a simple REST interface that exposes JSON, so a .NET developer might be tempted to simply use HttpClient and Json.NET to talk with Elasticsearch.
In this talk we'll showcase some of the features that outline how NEST plays to C# strengths and helps you write terser code, all just one line of code away: new ElasticClient(). A few of the topics that we'll cover:
- Strongly-typed requests and responses
- Inference
- Query DSL
- Aggregations- Covariant result sets
- Connection pooling and failover
Attendees will leave this talk knowing how to fully tame Elasticsearch from .NET

video:video.video:title: Safehouse: Monitoring and anomaly detection with smart sensors for safe environments - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: Safehouse IoT smart sensors are designed to improve the health and well being of individuals who wish to live independently in their own homes through later life. To enhance the affordability of their solution with its rapidly growing data set and implement fast data extraction tools, Safehouse turned to Mobilise Cloud based on the ELK stack to integrate into their award-winning flagship VIPER product. With extremely low latency, they can now monitor large volumes of environmental data captured on a millisecond by millisecond basis over extended periods providing a critical, often life-saving service to their users.

video:video.video:title: Operationalizing Elastic Security for practitioners
video:video.video:description: Fine-tune your incident response processes by monitoring non-compliance, alerting on outlier activity, and customizing drilldowns to automate response actions. See how Elastic gives your security team the customized visualizations and workflows you need to improve efficiency, streamline collaboration, and truly operationalize your security insights.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security under the hood
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security, powered by one of the biggest engineering groups inside Elastic today, is operationalizing the speed, scale, and relevance of the Elastic Stack for security use cases. Get an inside look into how Elastic Security works under the hood so you can learn how to make the most of the Elastic Stack for security. Well cover the main technical decisions for the detection engine, our endpoint protection, Fleet, data ingestion, and more.

video:video.video:title: Cost-effective data storage with data tiers
video:video.video:description: From data lifecycle management to hot-warm-cold-frozen data tiers, learn how to manage data in Elastic. Well provide best practices and examples to help you leave with an understanding of how to optimize Elastic Stack to meet your specific needs across cost, performance, and data duration.

video:video.video:title: SIEM, malware protection, deep data visibility for free
video:video.video:description: Are you a SIEM user who needs endpoint detection and correlation for complex multi-stage attacks across your environment? Elastic has launched a free and open endpoint security offering, directly integrated into the Elastic Stack. This offering is part of the free distribution tier and is available to every Elastic user. Learn how Elastic Security can help you protect your environment and why this advancement is so significant to security visibility.

video:video.video:title: Saving money with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Does your technology spending keep you up at night? Are you looking for ways to save money? Learn best practices for saving money with Elastic. We will answer questions such as: When does it make sense to commit to an annual contract, and how much will I save? How can I manage shards and snapshots to decrease storage spending? You will leave this session with prescriptive guidance you can immediately apply to optimize your Elastic spending.

video:video.video:title: Nativo ELK to Elastic Stack: A Production Journey of 3+ Years
video:video.video:description: In 2014, the small engineering team at Nativo had zero visibility into system performance and inadequate monitoring in place. Today, the Elastic Stack is a mission-critical system at Nativo, ingesting data from more than 30 applications, generating 150 million documents, and consuming 225 GB each day across four Amazon Web Services regions.Hear how the team and their implementation of the Elastic Stack evolved over the past three years. Learn best practices such as enriching logs before leaving the instance and standardizing applications logs as JSON that have contributed to the team's success. Plus, see how they're addressing new challenges like improving index management.

video:video.video:title: Enterprise search and unstructured data with CGI and Elastic - EON Public Sector Europe
video:video.video:description: Hear how CGI and Elastic are partnering to deliver search and analytics solutions for government organisations.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack: Using data for insight and action - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Learn about the latest innovations for managing data storage costs while balancing performance with Elasticsearch. See how to use new visualization and alerting capabilities to turn data insights into decisive action.

video:video.video:title: Observability at scale: Hear from the Elastic Cloud SRE team
video:video.video:description: 3 Cloud Providers. 38 Global Regions. 1,000+ VMs. 100,000s of containers. That's just part of the scope of Elastic's planetary-scale cloud offering. Hear how the Elastic Cloud SRE team uses Elastic Observability to get the full picture of the health and performance of our SaaS platform, complete with a real-life use case.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Observability keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability is helping organizations drive their mean time to resolution toward zero with end-to-end visibility in a single platform. Hear about the latest features and capabilities at all layers from ingest to insight and get a glimpse into where we are headed.

video:video.video:title: Combining logs, metrics, and traces for unified observability - EON North America 2021
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: What's new at Elastic: Update on major initiatives and releases - EON Public Sector Europe
video:video.video:description: The first technical talk of the event will highlight the latest releases at Elastic with specific insight into how those changes impact public sector projects. See the inside view of the most important capabilities and hear predictions on the developments that will be most applicable in our industry.

video:video.video:title: Advanced tips for visualizing and presenting data in Kibana
video:video.video:description: Data analysis is rarely a linear start-to-finish process no matter how much we wish it was. Good data analysis always prompts additional questions. Supporting the questions-and-answers cycle is something Kibana was built to do. Learn protips for how to use Kibanas latest capabilities to rapidly move from data questions to beautifully formatted answers in the form of dashboards and interactive reports in Canvas.

video:video.video:title: Thomson Reuters, Research, Journalism, Finance, & Elastic
video:video.video:description: From log analysis to ensure systems are functioning, to a search platform for insight into financial trends and journalism assets the Elastic Stack is an integral part of Thomson Reuters. Learn about how they customize it to fit their needs through tooling, custom plugins, predictive monitoring, and more.

video:video.video:title: Searching anything, anywhere with Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Struggling to find that one document on your FTP server? Forgot where you saved your draft slide deck? Learn how to use the Custom Source API in Elastic Workplace Search to index your content. See how to use Workplace Search's flexible schemas, configurable display preferences, and access controls when paired with the community FSCrawler project to help find everything in your filesystem.

video:video.video:title: Grab: Building a Healthy Elasticsearch Ecosystem
video:video.video:description: Grab began developing with Elasticsearch to help arrange team user access privileges. Discover how, through trial and error, Grab was able to go further to build a flexible and scalable Elasticsearch ecosystem.

video:video.video:title: From Data to Action with TV 2
video:video.video:description: TV 2 is one of the largest streaming service in Norway. Theyre working toward a more consumer-centric approach in order to enhance the product and customer experience. Learn how they have built both a customer-focused company culture and an analytics platform using the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Customer Success @ Elastic: Elastic Stack + Salesforce = <3
video:video.video:description: Come and see the folks behind the Elastic curtain, and we'll show you how Elastic uses the Elastic Stack to enhance our internal technology stack. A.J., Kristina, and Pius will discuss Elastic's Customer Success programs, showing you start to finish how they query and expose license data, how they use the Elastic Stack to enhance the Support Engineers experience in their support console, and how they bring all that information together in Salesforce to provide a predictive and holistic system for customer health.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture - EON Observability Europe 2021
video:video.video:description: No matter where you are in your journey to cloud native, Elastic APM can help you deliver better customer experiences by spotting performance bottlenecks sooner and identifying regressions from new deployments faster. Learn how to get a complete view of the services that power your applications from frontend to backend to keep them running smoothly.

video:video.video:title: The best way to run Elastic on Kubernetes
video:video.video:description: Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK) automates the deployment and orchestration of the Elastic Stack on Kubernetes. Learn about the available options for underlying storage and the tradeoffs between local disks and network-attached volumes.

video:video.video:title: Deploy the Elastic stack on Kubernetes with ECK
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrons comment Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK) s'appuie sur le concept d'operator Kubernetes pour orchestrer Elasticsearch, Kibana et APM Server sur Kubernetes.Au programme:Dmo et tour d'horizon des fonctionnalits d'ECK Nouveauts de la version 1.1 Y'a quoi dans le moteur ? Fonctionnement d'un operator K8s Orchestration d'applications "stateful" Fonctionnalits avances Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #49 virtuel.

video:video.video:title: Starting an observability journey at ING
video:video.video:description: La industria bancaria se enfrenta a un gran desafo: evolucionar su tecnologa al ritmo de las big tech. En ING han decidido afrontar este reto usando Elastic Stack. nete a Ignacio Suarez, Spain country manager en Elastic y a Marcos Peate, DevOps Engineer en ING, para entender cmo ING ha mejorado su fiabilidad y su disponibilidad con Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Using a risk based approach to provide cost-effective security - EON Public Sector US State & Federal
video:video.video:description: The State of Arizona Enterprise Security team undertook a proof of concept to increase the automation and reporting capabilities of its risk assessment and threat intelligence process. The goal is to analyze large amounts of data using Elastic to produce more accurate risk assessments with prevention, detection, response capabilities, and accurately model the cybersecurity threats the state is facing. This enables the State of Arizona to validate its security posture, be agile to continuously improve and respond to evolving cyber threats, and improve the cost effectiveness of security tools.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Looping through data, insight, and action - EON Public Sector US Federal
video:video.video:description: General Manager of Elastic Security Solutions Nate Fick explains how Elastic is helping mission-oriented organizations stay agile by allowing users to do more with their data more affordably and faster than ever before.

video:video.video:title: Tales from a security specialist at Salt Lake County - EON Public Sector US State & Federal
video:video.video:description: Jared Pane interviews Chris Adamson, Information Security Engineer with Salt Lake County, about how he uses Elastic to protect his IT.

video:video.video:title: Whats new with data visualization in Kibana
video:video.video:description: Exploring and visualizing semistructured data like logs, metrics, and APM traces in Kibana is as easy as clicking and dragging your mouse. Get a rapid primer on how to approach Kibana for data analytics and hear about updates designed to help you move from data discovery to decision at light speed.

video:video.video:title: How to become an Elastic contributor
video:video.video:description: Learn how to start contributing to Elastic projects, including the popular Elastic UI Framework (EUI) the foundation of all Elastic UIs. Well dive into licensing, contributor agreements, useful tips around Git, and feature proposals. Youll also get an overview of the setup, builds, and testing in EUI.

video:video.video:title: Orange Business Services: Better SIEM infrastructure with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez comment Orange Business Services utilise la Suite Elastic pour refondre et moderniser leur infrastructure SIEM et amliorer davantage leurs mthodes de dtection danomalies et dintrusions.

video:video.video:title: How eStruxture Data Centers is Using ECE to Rapidly Scale Their Business
video:video.video:description: Machines do the boring, repetitive tasks and humans solve the problems is the motto behind eStruxtures next generation monitoring solution. ECE has been the key component behind the rapid scaling of eStruxtures business. Eric Charpentier will share how Elastic is helping eStruxture unify millions of divergent data points and transforming them into human readable and actionable items. See how eStruxture Data Centers are able to build a new model for alarming and alerting using diverse pipelines for multiple types of equipment, and how they provide their teams with the data they need to solve problems.

video:video.video:title: Getting Your Data Graph-Ready
video:video.video:description: Knowing what sort of data makes sense to put in Graph and how to prepare it is often a challenge for new users. This session will walk through examples of how to model your data in order to start exploring the interesting connections it contains. Learn about models for wisdom of crowd style applications and configurations to support forensic style investigations.

video:video.video:title: Autoscaling: From zero to production seamlessly
video:video.video:description: Have you ever wanted to seamlessly scale up and down the size of your Elastic deployment? Autoscaling is coming to Elastic. Learn how this upcoming feature will help simplify the management of your deployments and how you can automatically scale up and down as demand increases or decreases. Well describe how Elasticsearch determines when it is time to scale up or down, and how that information is communicated through the platform.

video:video.video:title: Whats Cooking in Kibana? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Rashid Khan and Chris Cowan present all the news you need to know about Kibana at Elastic{ON}16 on February 17, 2016, in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Eliminar los puntos ciegos significa que tienes suficiente contexto. Pero puedes obtener informacin importante de ese contexto cuando lo necesitas? Aprende a detectar amenazas, mientras evitas el ruido de falsos positivos, con el motor de deteccin de Elastic Security. Vers cmo automatizar la deteccin de amenazas mediante correlaciones y Machine Learning, con ejemplos reales de cada uno.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ H-E-B: Providing a better shopping experience at Central Market
video:video.video:description: The H-E-B grocery chain has grown from a store to so much more, including the Central Market specialty food stores, where Elasticsearch has played a key role in the development of search across their extensive product catalog. Learn how H-E-B uses Elasticsearch to power several applications for Central Market, across their omnichannel experience, to provide a faster, more relevant search experience for customers. Plus, see how theyre using the Elastic Stack to better understand customer behavior and buying patterns to drive more revenue, personalize merchandising real-time, and create a better user experience.

video:video.video:title: Explore relve les dfis Big Data avec Elastic Cloud - EON Solution Series: EMEA
video:video.video:description: Spcialise dans le dveloppement et la gestion de solutions de veille documentaire et commerciale, Explore offre ses clients une lecture prcise et organise de lactualits des marchs et projets sur leurs territoires d'intervention. Afin de rendre leur offre plus agile et performante, Explore a choisi loffre Elastic Cloud hberge sur Microsoft Azure. Dcouvrez comment les quipes de production et de dveloppement sont dsormais en mesure de mieux exploiter les donnes pour les clients dExplore et gagnent du temps sur la gestion de leur infrastructure.

video:video.video:title: Yves Rocher - garder un oeil sur les points de vente et dtecter les anomalies avec Elastic - EON Solution Series: EMEA
video:video.video:description: Au cours de cette session, Yves Rocher expliquera comment la solution Elastic Observability est utilise pour surveiller les points de vente et dtecter les anomalies dans leur systme.

video:video.video:title: Moving from On-Prem to Managed Services with Elastic on Azure
video:video.video:description:
Dans ce webinar, vous apprendrez tout ce qu'il y a savoir pour vous lancer avec Elastic Cloud (le service gr d'Elasticsearch) sur Microsoft Azure. Dcouvrez comment dployer et grer des clusters Elasticsearch, migrer d'un cluster sur site vers Azure, et utiliser votre dploiement pour monitorer les services Azure avec des intgrations prtes l'emploi.
Voici les sujets qui seront abords :
Configurer un cluster sur site, l'hydrater avec un ensemble de donnes de vol et prendre des snapshots Dployer dans Azure Restaurer un snapshot stock Vrifier que votre migration a russi
Autres ressources :
Dcouvrez pourquoi et comment Miles & More a migr vers Elastic Cloud sur Microsoft Azure Lancez-vous avec Elastic Cloud sur Microsoft Azure Apprenez crer un dploiement l'aide de votre compte Azure existant
Veuillez noter que cette prsentation est en Anglais.

video:video.video:title: Aldara: Powering social network with Elastic Cloud - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Conoce a Aldara, una herramienta inteligente para redes sociales desarrollada por la filial de ciberseguridad de Telefonica, ElevenPaths. Descubre como ElevenPaths usa el servicio Elasticsearch en Elastic Cloud para llevar a cabo anlisis de conversaciones complejas, evaluar riesgos de crisis y ataques relativos a la reputacin, identificar a las personas ms influyentes en las redes y realizar estudios de mercado.

video:video.video:title: Visibility against cybercrime - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: La seguridad de una empresa est determinada por la velocidad con la que obtiene y procesa los datos que afectan a sus competencias clave del negocio. En esta charla, GMV, empresa lder en ciberseguridad, presenta un caso de uso de la tecnologa Elastic para reducir de horas a segundos los tiempos de bsqueda, impactando directamente en la seguridad de los entornos crticos.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines (FR)
video:video.video:description: Optimisez vos processus de rponse aux incidents en monitorant les non-conformits, en crant des alertes sur les activits anormales et en personnalisant l'exploration pour automatiser les actions de rponse. Avec Elastic, votre quipe de scurit bnficie des visualisations personnalises et des workflows dont elle a besoin pour gagner en efficacit, rationaliser la collaboration et rendre vos perspectives de scurit vritablement oprationnelles.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives (FR)
video:video.video:description: En liminant les angles morts, vous disposez prsent d'un contexte suffisant. Mais cela signifie-t-il pour autant que vous pouvez tirer des informations importantes quand vous en avez besoin ? Dcouvrez comment dtecter les menaces, tout en vitant les faux positifs, avec le moteur de dtection d'Elastic Security. Vous apprendrez automatiser la dtection des menaces en exploitant les corrlations et le Machine Learning l'aide d'exemples rels.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues (FR)
video:video.video:description: Mme les menaces basiques peuvent s'avrer complexes avec plusieurs niveaux. Pour y faire face, vous devez avoir une visibilit non limite sur vos donnes. Que vous enqutiez sur des menaces ou que vous les traquiez, vous devez avoir votre disposition l'ensemble du contexte relatif la scurit. Dcouvrez des bonnes pratiques de collecte et de normalisation des donnes, et apprenez utiliser Elastic Security pour trier, vrifier et classer les problmes avec rapidit et prcision.

video:video.video:title: Credit Agricole: Powering banking apps with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Crdit Agricole Corporate & Investment Bank  utilise la Suite Elastic pour leurs quipes de banque de financement et d'investissement. Dcouvrez comment la Suite est utilise pour venir en support la stratgie de Market Risk management et de Cash Management.

video:video.video:title: Advanced Operation with Elastic Stack at NTT Communications
video:video.video:description: NTTElastic Stack

video:video.video:title: How M4U uses Elastic Cloud to monitor a platform with 180 million transactions per month
video:video.video:description: Nessa apresentao voc ver como a equipe de recargas da M4U saiu de 3 monlitos para dezenas de microsservios e migraram todos seus logs de uma soluo Elastic on premise para o Elastic Cloud. Alm disso, ser demonstrado como eles organizaram seus logs, volumetria de eventos e as mtricas e alarmes que so geradas partir deles.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines - EON Security Spain 2021
video:video.video:description: Afina tus procesos de respuesta a incidentes mediante el monitoreo del incumplimiento al alertar sobre actividades atpicas y personalizar desgloses para automatizar las acciones de respuesta. Ve cmo Elastic le brinda a tu equipo de seguridad visualizaciones personalizadas y flujos de trabajo que necesitas para mejorar la eficiencia, agilizar la colaboracin y realmente poner en funcionamiento tus conocimientos de seguridad.

video:video.video:title: Get involved with the security community at Elastic
video:video.video:description: Explore ways to engage with your local (or virtual) Elastic security community virtual meetups, hosted and organized events, Slack, forums, and more. Whether you want to showcase your project, learn from others, hear expert opinions and guidance, or simply get connected, we can help. We'll share the latest and greatest in community efforts, including our new community rules repo, EQL, ECS, and more!

video:video.video:title: Elastic Enterprise Search keynote
video:video.video:description: To kick off a day packed with informative sessions, well take a look back at all the leaps forward for Elastic Enterprise Search in 2020. Then get a sneak peek at what the future holds for our search roadmap.

video:video.video:title: Getting help from the Elastic community
video:video.video:description: We've all been stuck and the Elastic community is an invaluable resource for getting back on track. Learn how to make the most of the community and how to help others. We'll cover where you can go to get help, how to ask better questions and make it easier to get an answer, and what to expect from the community.

video:video.video:title: Twenty years of Apache Lucene
video:video.video:description: After beginning to develop Lucene in 1998, Doug Cutting released a first version on Sourceforge more than 20 years ago in April 2000. Come learn more about the story of Apache Lucene and find out how it went from a single-person project on Sourceforge to one of the most successful projects of the Apache Software Foundation that powers most of the world's search engines.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Saiba como o Elastic Security evoluiu para ajudar as equipes de operaes de segurana a adotar uma abordagem mais ampla e inclusiva segurana e preparar sua organizao para o sucesso.

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Veja como a Elastic fornece sua equipe de segurana visualizaes customizadas e os fluxos de trabalho necessrios para melhorar a eficincia, otimizar a colaborao e operacionalizar verdadeiramente seus insights de segurana.

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (ES)
video:video.video:description: El xito de las iniciativas de observabilidad suele depender de los equipos de plataforma que definen, estandarizan y regulan las herramientas y marcos de trabajo centralizados. Descubre la forma en la que Elastic Observability impulsa a estos equipos con caractersticas como la gestin centralizada para los agentes, la categorizacin de logs automatizada (basada en Machine Learning), gestin de ciclo de vida y los snapshot buscables. Juntos, podemos ayudarte a crear centros de excelencia y a ofrecer la observabilidad como servicio a los agentes internos.

video:video.video:title: Civir: Observability solutions with Elastic as a service
video:video.video:description: La automatizacin en el despliegue de soluciones de Observabilidad, es la clave para disponer de una infraestructura capaz de responder, con rapidez, a las diferentes necesidades de los clientes. Aprenda cmo Civir usa Elastic para integrar todo tipo de fuentes y proporcionar una visin completa, no solo de los sistemas, tambin de los datos de negocio. Vea cmo el stack de Elastic ayuda a resolver los requerimientos demandados en los entornos ms crticos.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight (Latin America)
video:video.video:description: Descubre como simplificar los datos con integraciones preconstruidas, insumos automatizados con alertamiento y machine learning y adems herramientas de visualizacin para el caso de uso de monitoreo.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture (Latin America)
video:video.video:description: No importa dnde se encuentre en su viaje a la nube nativa, Elastic APM ayuda a ofrecer mejores experiencias al cliente al detectar los cuellos de botella en el rendimiento e identificar ms rpidamente las regresiones de las nuevas implementaciones.

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (Latin America)
video:video.video:description: Vea cmo Elastic Observability permite a los equipos encargados de la plataforma crear centros de excelencia con caractersticas como la gestin central de agentes, la gestin del ciclo de vida de los ndices y snapshots buscables.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Security evolution and vision (JP)
video:video.video:description: Elastic

video:video.video:title: Innovating at speed and scale with implicit security
video:video.video:description: Growth depends on continuous innovation with emerging technology at speed and scale. How can you do it securely? And why is the timing so vital, as businesses emerge from economic uncertainty?

video:video.video:title: Large-Scale Threat Intelligence Platform Use Case & Elastic Security Case Study (JP)
video:video.video:description: JSOC24Elastic StackElastic Security

video:video.video:title: Security monitoring with Elastic Cloud at Yokogawa Electric
video:video.video:description: Elastic CloudYSOCElasticsearch

video:video.video:title: Operationalize with alerting, custom dashboards, and timelines (JP)
video:video.video:description: Elastic

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives (JP)
video:video.video:description: Elastic

video:video.video:title: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security ofrece prevencin de amenazas para datos globales, as como caractersticas de prevencin, recopilacin, deteccin y respuesta. Descubre cmo marcar la diferencia frente a la competencia mediante el uso de tecnologa multinivel, examina demostraciones en directo y resuelve tus dudas.

video:video.video:title: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre cmo Elasticsearch combina de forma eficiente los datos en un solo almacn y cmo los analiza Kibana. Adems, podrs comprobar la forma en la que los desarrollos ms recientes facilitan la tarea de identificacin, solucin de problemas y resolucin de incidencias operativas con mayor rapidez.

video:video.video:title: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre cmo reinventamos la bsqueda en el trabajo para acceder rpidamente a la informacin con una bsqueda unificada, conectores de datos instantneos e interfaces de gestin de bsquedas sencillas.

video:video.video:title: Free and open cloud security posture monitoring
video:video.video:description: As organizations migrate to the cloud, attackers have diversified to operate in cloud environments. Learn about the challenges faced by security teams in the cloud and why attacks against cloud environments often succeed. Well demonstrate how to ship event data from platforms like AWS, Okta, and Azure to the Elastic Stack, and how security teams can monitor attacker behavior using Elastic Security and Elastics free and open detection rules.

video:video.video:title: Using Elastic @ Elastic: InfoSec and Elastic Security
video:video.video:description: Learn how the Elastic InfoSec team is using Elastic Cloud to further enhance the Elastic Security solution. We'll show off how we use telemetry data to help with model development for data scientists, provide feedback for security analysts, enable support engineers, and more!

video:video.video:title: Breaking silos between DevOps and SecOps with Elastic
video:video.video:description: What is better: 99.999% uptime, continuous delivery, or a secure environment? Yeah, we had the same reaction: "Why do I need to pick one?" With Elastic, your operations and security teams can work together on a single platform, and help drive mean time to detect/resolve to zero for both operational and security issues. Hear how we are helping customers break down artificial silos between teams and use cases, and move towards a DevSecOps culture.

video:video.video:title: The Elastic clients: Recent developments
video:video.video:description: The clients for Elasticsearch and Elastic Workplace Search are the front door to Elastic for many developers. Get up to speed with recent developments, including Workplace Search and App Search in one Elastic Enterprise Search umbrella client, plus a continuous stream of improvements in the Elasticsearch clients for JavaScript, Go, and Perl. Well also cover some best practices like cluster sniffing and using API keys and client helpers.

video:video.video:title: From secure VPC links to SSO with Elastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: Have you ever wondered how you can use the technologies built into Elastic Cloud to improve your deployment's security posture? Learn about security best practices for built-in security features such as encryption by default for data in transit or at rest, and also the tools you can use to enhance security such as IP filtering and our AWS PrivateLink integration.

video:video.video:title: Automate threat detections and avoid false positives (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Detecte ameaas e evite falsos positivos com o mecanismo de deteco no Elastic Security. Automatize a deteco de ameaas por meio de correlaes e machine learning com exemplos do reais.

video:video.video:title: Incident management with Elastic SIEM (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: A Eleven Paths, uma companhia da Telefnica, falar sobre o projeto de gesto de incidente de segurana da informao com o Elastic SIEM. Esse projeto se baseia nos pilares de preparao, deteco, triagem e priorizao, anlise, conteno, erradicao, recuperao e ps-incidente; E tem como objetivo restaurar a operao rapidamente quando algum incidente ocorre, garantindo assim o melhor nvel de servio e disponibilidade aos seus clientes.

video:video.video:title: Get full visibility and find hidden security issues (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Conhea as principais prticas de coleta e normalizao de dados para expandir a visibilidade no seu ambiente. Veja como voc pode usar o Elastic Security para triagem, verificao e escopo de problemas com rapidez e preciso.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture (ES)
video:video.video:description: Las aplicaciones suelen ser la interfaz de cliente principal en las organizaciones modernas, lo que tiene un impacto directo sobre resultados como los ingresos y prdidas de clientes. Elastic APM puede ayudarte a ofrecer mejores prcticas mediante la rpida deteccin de los cuellos de botella en materia de rendimiento y de las regresiones en los nuevos despliegues . Descubre cmo obtener una visin completa sobre los servicios en los que se basan tus aplicaciones, del frontend al backend, para optimizar su rendimiento.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight (ES)
video:video.video:description: La visibilidad sobre la infraestructura es un elemento esencial, independientemente de que sea en tus propias mquinas o en la nube, virtualizada, en contenedores, o en un entorno hbrido. El Elastic (ELK) Stack, histricamente conocido por sus capacidades de logging, permite tambin monitorear tus mtricas con el mismo rendimiento Descubre cmo facilitamos la ingesta de datos mediante cientos de integraciones prediseadas, mejoramos tu da a da con alertas y machine learning, y mejoramos tus visualizaciones con nuevas herramientas desarrolladas para los casos de uso de monitoreo.

video:video.video:title: Tenedis: Office 365 observability with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Ladoption doffice 365 par les entreprises ne cesse de sacclrer. Mais ladoption des utilisateurs ne peut tre un succs que si lexprience utilisateur est la hauteur des promesses. Les directions informatiques et mtiers doivent sans cesse se poser la question de la qualit du service dlivr ses utilisateurs et en cas de dgradation de service, tre en capacit de dterminer quel est le segment de la chane daccs la source de limpact (LAN, WAN, CASB, INTERNET, Tenant Microsoft,). Tenedis propose de partager un cas client de mise en place dune mto des services Office 365 dvelopp grce Elastic en consolidant de multiples source dinformation.

video:video.video:title: Orange: Unifying logs, events and metrics with Elastic
video:video.video:description: Descubre como Orange se apoya en Elastic para unificar logs, eventos y mtricas, maximizar la observabilidad de todos esos datos y poder actuar gil y eficazmente de la forma ms autnoma posible.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision (Latin America)
video:video.video:description: Elastic Observability ayuda a conducir el tiempo medio de resolucin hacia cero con una visibilidad de extremo a extremo en una sola plataforma. Escuche las ltimas caractersticas y capacidades, y dele un vistazo al futuro.

video:video.video:title: Keynote - Spain 3+1 2020
video:video.video:description: Conoce el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash de la mano de los creadores de Elastic Stack, as como las nuevas caractersticas y soluciones, las opciones de despliegue y la evolucin de las soluciones.

video:video.video:description: NRIwiki"Confluence"chat"mattermost"KibanaNRILogstash, Elasticsearch, Kibana

video:video.video:description: Elastic Google Cloud Anthos Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) Anthos Elastic Stack SRE

video:video.video:title: Building a centralized observability platform (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Veja como o Elastic Observability capacita equipes de plataforma a criar centros de excelncia com recursos como gerenciamento central para agentes, gerenciamento de ciclo de vida de ndice e instantneos pesquisveis.

video:video.video:title: Elastic APM: Amping up your logs and metrics for the full picture (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: No importa onde voc esteja em sua jornada rumo nuvem, o Elastic APM ajuda a oferecer melhores experincias ao cliente, identificando gargalos de desempenho e identificando regresses de novas implantaes com mais rapidez.

video:video.video:title: Infrastructure monitoring made easy, from ingest to insight (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: Descubra como a integrao simplificada de dados com integraes predefinidas, insights automatizados com alertas e aprendizado de mquina e novas ferramentas visuais esto otimizando o caso de uso de monitoramento de infraestrutura.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Elastic Observability evolution and vision (Brazil)
video:video.video:description: O caso de uso de Observability ajuda a conduzir o tempo mdio de resoluo a zero com visibilidade de ponta a ponta em uma nica plataforma. Oua sobre os recursos e capacidades mais recentes e tenha uma viso do futuro.

video:video.video:title: What's Evolving in Elasticsearch? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Clinton Gormley and Simon Willnauer present breaking news and big developments for Elasticsearch at Elastic{ON} 2016 on February 17, 2016, in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: OpenSource Connections: The Ghost in the Search Machine
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch is much more than a full-text search engine it can be taught to detect at-risk students, predict the weather, and find similar images at high scale. Attend this session to learn how you can turn Elasticsearch into a smart comparison powerhouse for your organization.

video:video.video:title: Get the Lay of the Lucene Land (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Adrien Grand presents all the news you need to know about Apache Lucene at Elastic{ON}16 in February 18, 2016 in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: Resiliency in Elasticsearch and Lucene
video:video.video:description: As Elasticsearch clusters grow larger, their resilience to hardware and network failure becomes increasingly important. At Elasticsearch, we invest a LOT in making both Elasticsearch and Apache Lucene both detect and cope with increasingly complex failures.In this talk we will go through recent highlights and some of the future directions we plan to follow. We will touch all aspects of Elasticsearch, ranging from the lowest level of a single file, through network connection of a single node, and all the way up distributed failures on the cluster level. Even though the talk is about possible failures and various coping strategies, you will also learn about the inner workings of Elasticsearch - an interesting peek under the hood.

video:video.video:title: Canal Plus at the Elastic Paris Meetup in June 2016 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Meetup Elastic Paris - 22 juin 2016 David et Marc prsentent l'architecture des moteurs de recommandations de Canal+ et comment Elastic aide Canal+ a amliorer l'exprience de ses clients. David DeschampsResponsable de lquipe programme, usage et recommandation Marc Cina En charge du dveloppement du moteur de recommandation http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/ElasticFR/events/230864501/

video:video.video:title: Get the Lay of the Lucene Land
video:video.video:description: Despite being close to 20 years old (thats almost 150 in dev years), the Lucene project keeps pushing limits. With origins rooted in full-text search, the scope of Lucene has expanded to drive improvements for Elasticsearch, most notably with doc values to make it a competitive engine to run analytics and multi-dimensional points to better handle structured data.Hear the stories behind the latest features in Lucene 7, learn how they impact Elasticsearch, and see what to expect in Lucene 8.

video:video.video:title: Divide & Conquer - Logging Architecture in Distributed Ecosystems with Elastic Cloud Enterprise at Otto
video:video.video:description: The Logging & Monitoring team of Otto.de is directly responsible for each aspect of the logging platform based on Elasticsearch, Kibana and Logstash. They provide an internal SaaS for about 25 development teams with Elastic Cloud Enterprise at the core of their setup. During their journey they have learned how to deal with challenges such as scaling Logstash, housekeeping for Elasticsearch and collecting usage metrics for analytics and billing. Learn how they built a scalable and resilient logging solution for their development teams on AWS, processing up to 350.000 events per second at peak times in a single Elasticsearch cluster.

video:video.video:title: Handling Exponential Growth With Elastic's Elasticsearch Service
video:video.video:description: Voxpopme are the market leader in video insight market research. See how they moved from Compose.io to AWS to Elasticsearch Service (formerly known as Elastic Cloud) in order to tackle their growing data ingest needs, up to nearly 1 million records this year alone. Learn how they revamped their entire system, including combining and indexing all of their data into a new Elasticsearch cluster, to improve speed by 10X and ensure continued success as they scale for exponential growth.

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Machine Learning (French)
video:video.video:description: Lance officiellement dans la version 5.5, machine learning (ML) vous permet de tirer parti de vos donnes automatiquement. Cette session vous montrera comment utiliser la Suite Elastic pour ingrer, enrichir, visualiser, analyser et crer des alertes sur des logs NGINX pour dtecter, et ventuellement prdire, les anomalies au sein de vos donnes.

video:video.video:title: Item Based Search - Paris Meetup June 2014 (FR)
video:video.video:description: This talk will introduce the concept of querying by examples. It covers a couple of features used for multimedia search, and some matching procedures such as kNN and Bayesian Sets. Finally, it will conclude with Lucene More Like This and show how it relates to the concepts previously exposed.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch in Anger: Stories from the GitHub Search Clusters
video:video.video:description: Over the past two years GitHub's source code search product has grown from a small research project into a very large index containing nearly 4 billion documents. This is an ever changing and continuously growing data set that has presented us with some interesting scaling problems. This talk will cover how they have tackled these scaling problems - from monitoring and alerting, application changes, growing clusters, and tuning Lucene parameters.

video:video.video:title: Wikimedia: Navigating the World's Encyclopedia
video:video.video:description: Over the last year and a half, Wikimedia has switched from a home-grown search solution based on Lucene 2 to a highly redundant Elasticsearch cluster powering billions of user prefix and full-text searches. This talk will outline the brief history of search at Wikimedia, why we went with Elasticsearch, how we have scaled it and what we have built, and finally touch on the integration and features we have provided to users of our platform.

video:video.video:title: Customer Panel Featuring E*Trade, kCura, and GuideStar
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, sits down with Chris O'Keefe, E*Trade Senior Vice President of Engineering, Andrew Sieja, kCura CEO and Founder, and Shane Ward, GuideStar Data Architect, for a fireside chat about using Elastic solutions across a variety of use cases.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ BAI Communications (Melbourne)
video:video.video:description: BAI Canada, a subsidiary of Australia-based BAI Communications, has built a public Wi-Fi offering in both the Toronto and NYC subway systems, where roughly 2 million unique devices totaling 14 million log-ons per month use the service. Their implementation of the Elastic Stack handles around 10 million new records per day and growing. Learn how BAI Canada has designed, architected, and run the Elastic Stack to help report on and monitor usage in one of the largest types of Wi-Fi deployments. See their plans for the future, including upcoming work in Australia.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020 - Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Oua os criadores do Elastic Stack falarem sobre o futuro do Elasticsearch, do Kibana, do Beats e do Logstash, bem como sobre novos recursos e solues, a expanso das opes de implantao e a evoluo do panorama das solues.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cloud.(next)
video:video.video:description: Learn about all the things coming in Elastic Cloud and Elastic Cloud Enterprise, like support for mixed clusters and how to mix and match hardware for hot and warm data, machine learning, and more in a single cluster. You will also hear about our planned Kubernetes integration, security features, and more.

video:video.video:title: Logs, mtricas y APM: El tro de operaciones
video:video.video:description: Combina tus logs, mtricas y, desde ahora, datos de APM, y mejora tu visibilidad operativa. Descubre la forma en la que Elasticsearch combina con eficiencia estos tipos de datos en un nico almacn y cmo se utiliza Kibana para buscar logs, analizar mtricas y sacar partido a APM para disfrutar de una supervisin del rendimiento mejorada y una resolucin de problemas ms rpida.Esta presentacin ser en Espaol.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack
Tokyo 2017: Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: CEOShay BanonElastic StackAPM

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cause Award: Refugee Datathon Munich
video:video.video:description:
The Refugee Datathon started in 2015, when thousands of refugees were welcomed in Munich. Hear how Suny Kim and Maxi Richt used the Elastic Stack and the power of open data to help activists get reliable, recent data on refugee movement, and make an impact on the pro-refugee movement.
Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: NSHC: Security in the Age of the Dark Web (Korean)
video:video.video:description: In this session, NSHC demonstrates the process of how they collect, analyze, and secure data using Elasticsearch in the age of the Dark Web, a part of the World Wide Web that is only accessible by means of special software, allowing users and website operators to remain anonymous or untraceable.

video:video.video:title: What's the Latest in Logstash? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Jordan Sissel and Suyog Rao present the latest and greatest Logstash news and previews at Elastic{ON}16 in San Francisco, February 18, 2016.

video:video.video:title: What's the Latest in Logstash
video:video.video:description: Much has happened since 5.0. Persistent queues, pipeline viewer (x-ray vision, basically) and the ability to run multiple pipelines at the same time for different use cases, and a move to the latest version of JRuby it's all laying the foundation for even more goodness to come.See where the Logstash roadmap is headed and what to expect next.

video:video.video:title: Leboncoin - Retour d'Experience sur le Dploiement d'ELK (FR)
video:video.video:description: Prsentation d'un retour d'exprience sur la mise en place de la stack ELK chez Leboncoin pour le monitoring des logs. Nous parlerons de l'architecture, des problmes rencontrs, de l'utilisation de respec pour tester la configuration de logstash.

video:video.video:title: DigitalGov Search: Search & Anaytics at the U.S. General Services Administration
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, sits down with Loren Siebert, Tech Lead at DigitalGov Search, for a fireside chat about the evolution of search and analytics at the United States General Services Administration and how Elastic solutions have helped along the way.

video:video.video:title: A Consistent Search Experience in No Time
video:video.video:description: One main objective of the Goldman Sachs Search project was to minimise programming effort when onboarding new data sets, providing a fast and responsive way to search for data with a consistent user experience. Reuben Tonna, lead architect for Goldman Sachs Search, highlights how engineering has used Elasticsearch to achieve this.

video:video.video:title: Opower(ing) Energy Efficiency
video:video.video:description: The challenge and success of using Elasticsearch to provide data visualization and targeting for personalizing utility customer messaging intended to maximize energy savings.

video:video.video:title: Customer Story(Posco): Life after Google Search Appliances
video:video.video:description: Enterprise Search Google Search Appliance Elastic . , , , X-Pack .

video:video.video:title: Search amlior en utilisant le NLP (French)
video:video.video:description: Le NLP aide les ordinateurs comprendre un peu mieux ce que les utilisateurs recherchent. Le NLP va permettre aux applications de recherche de retourner de meilleurs rsultats en enrichissant les documents passs Elasticsearch. Mais comment implmenter ces solutions ? Dans cette prsentation, nous verrons comment utiliser Elasticsearch en addition de solutions NLP.

video:video.video:title: Seoul 2017: Ingest and the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Walk through all things ingest for Logstash 5.x, from dead letter and persistent queues to the Grok Debugger and new monitoring APIs. Then get caught up on new lightweight data shipper additions like Heartbeat and Metricbeat, as well as new modules that simplify the getting started process.

video:video.video:title: Whats Evolving in the Elastic Stack - Boston 2018
video:video.video:description: See product roadmaps for Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash with demos and announcements for everything from rollups to Elasticsearch SQL.

video:video.video:title: Managing Elasticsearch Clusters with Elastic Cloud Enterprise
video:video.video:description: Learn how to easily deploy and manage secure Elasticsearch clusters at scale and on the infrastructure of your choice using Elastic Cloud Enterprise.

video:video.video:title: Powering a BI application with Elasticsearch at Yodle
video:video.video:description: Yodle recently transitioned from using Hadoop/Scalding to Elasticsearch to power a tailored BI product for franchises. This talk will detail the impact this transition has had on the product, our customers, and engineer efficiency.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cause Award Honoree: Using Elasticsearch to Augment Community Healthcare at Dimagi
video:video.video:description:
Dimagi uses Elasticsearch to help power key workflows in fighting India's tuberculosis epidemic. Hear how they generalized this solution in their platform to deal with migration and drug adherence of HIV/AIDS patients in South Africa, Lesotho, Swaziland, Uganda, and Cameroon.
Download presentation slides

video:video.video:title: Nori: The Official Elasticsearch Plugin for Korean Language Analysis
video:video.video:description: . Lucene , Elasticsearch 6.4 .

video:video.video:title: Optimizing The Design of New Microbes Using Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Zymergen has developed a new, industrialized process to create microbes capable of fermenting chemicals, pharmaceuticals and more. Success depends on insights gleaned from large volumes of possible DNA modifications. This talk will cover how Elasticsearch powers this revolution in scientific data analysis.

video:video.video:title: Migration dun cluster de 130 TB dElasticsearch 2 5 sans coupure (French)
video:video.video:description: Ce talk explique comment Synthesio a migr un cluster de 130TB et 50 milliards de documents dElasticsearch 2 vers la version 5 sans coupure de service et avec la possibilit de rollbacker tout moment.Il sattache notamment dcrire lopration mise en place et les diffrents piges viter pour une migration sans douleur.

video:video.video:title: _Search? Made Simple: Elastic + App Search
video:video.video:description: Get an in-depth look at Elastic App Search, the fastest and simplest way to add search to your internal or external application. Learn how to quickly deploy highly relevant and performant search in your app.

video:video.video:title: Ingest and the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Walk through all things ingest for Logstash 5.x, from dead letter and persistent queues to the Grok Debugger and new monitoring APIs. Then get caught up on new lightweight data shipper additions like Heartbeat and Metricbeat, as well as new modules that simplify the getting started process.

video:video.video:title: Finding Cars and Hunting Down Logs: Elasticsearch @ AutoScout24
video:video.video:description: As an early adopter of Elasticsearch, AutoScout24 has tried it all. In this talk, we'll take you on a journey through both our failures and successes. We'll show how our different use cases required different approaches in how best to use the Elastic Stack and how our current implementation in AWS is based on the immutable infrastructure principle.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack (ELK)
video:video.video:description: ElasticsearchKibanaBeats Logstash rollup Elastic SQL

video:video.video:title: The Evolution of Log Insight at MZ Games
video:video.video:description: Machine Zone is the company behind massively-multiplayer online games Game of War, Fire Age, and Mobile Strike. Real-time operation of these games is essential to provide a great user experience. As a result, the engineering team at MZ evolved from using grep with pssh to the Elastic Stack as the critical engine behind their operational intelligence. In this talk, Eric and Reggie will walk through how they optimized the Elastic Stack over time to maximize their insight, touch upon their infrastructure set up, go over their most commonly used dashboards, share case studies on debugging, as well as provide details on how they established a system to track player activity to support customer service.

video:video.video:title: Seoul 2017: Kibana Deep Dive (Korean)
video:video.video:description: It's the grand tour of new visualizations and exciting updates in Kibana, including time series visual builder, heatmaps, Timelion, tag clouds, Watcher UI, and cluster alerts. Plus, a look at what's to come in 6.x.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ BAI Canada: Analyzing a Football Stadium Worth of Wi-Fi Data Every Hour
video:video.video:description: BAI Canada/Transit Wireless has built a public Wi-Fi offering in both the Toronto and NYC subway systems, where roughly 2 million unique devices totaling 14 million log-ons per month use the service. Their implementation of the Elastic Stack handles around 10 million new records per day and growing. Learn how BAI Canada/Transit Wireless has designed, architected, and run the Elastic Stack to help report on and monitor usage in one of the largest types of Wi-Fi deployments.

video:video.video:title: RICH IT: Manejando mil millones de registros diarios en el sector financiero Mexicano
video:video.video:description: Los clientes de RICH IT generan ms de mil millones de logs de seguridad y registros transaccionales al da. Conozca cmo Elastic permite a sus clientes dar sentido a los ms de 1.000.000.000 de registros que capturan diariamente.

video:video.video:title: Insoftar: Optimizando los tiempos de respuesta con Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Insoftar es una empresa de arquitectura de software inteligente. Vea cmo Insoftar mejor la informacin entregada a los clientes y cmo consiguieron un ahorro del 35% en infraestructura al migrar a Elastic Cloud.

video:video.video:title: Anlisis a fondo de roadmap del Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Obtn informacin sobre las caractersticas mediante demostraciones y anuncios, desde replicacin entre clusters e ndices congelados en Elasticsearch hasta Kibana Spaces y el conjunto de integraciones de datos en constante crecimiento en Beats y Logstash.

video:video.video:title: Bsqueda para todos con Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Ve cmo reimaginamos la bsqueda empresarial para que puedas llegar rpido a la informacin que necesitas en tu trabajo, mediante una experiencia de bsqueda unificada, conectores de datos listos para usar e interfaces de administracin de bsqueda simples.

video:video.video:title: Combinacin de logs, mtricas y rastreos para observabilidad unificada
video:video.video:description: Conoce cmo Elasticsearch combina los datos con eficiencia en un solo repositorio de datos y cmo se usa Kibana para analizarlos. Adems, podrs ver cmo los desarrollos recientes ayudan a identificar, solucionar y resolver problemas operativos ms rpido.

video:video.video:title: Comment Elasticsearch a permis Orange de mettre en place leur moteur de recherche
video:video.video:description: Orange amliore la performance de son moteur de recherche franais en combinant Elasticsearch et Kibana, pour un filtrage plus efficace et interactif des documents Web apparaissant dans les listes de rsultats de son moteur de recherche.

video:video.video:title: Die perfekte Feriensuche mit Elasticsearch (DE)
video:video.video:description: Wie man eine vorhandene Suchapplikation ersetzt. Holidaycheck erzhlt von der Implementierung von Elasticsearch, der Verbesserung des Sucherlebnisses und der Kommunikation mit den Stakeholdern.

video:video.video:title: Between Two Ferns with XO Group
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, chats with Irina Krechmer and Emad Saghir of the XO Group the fine folks behind theKnot, theBumb, & theNest for a fireside chat about how switching to Elasticsearch dramatically improved the user experience across theKnot.com. Plus a look into what's next for the XO Group and how Elasticsearch is coming along for the ride.

video:video.video:title: Between Two Ferns with TrueCar
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, chats with Russ Foltz-Smith, GM of Data Products, about the growth and innovation around search and analytics at TrueCar.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} Tour Keynote - Shay Banon
Second Annual Elastic{ON} Women's Breakfast
video:video.video:description: We assembled a panel of executives and engineers to talk about their experiences in the software and technology space. They discussed approaches to growing their careers, navigated key challenges and difficult decisions, and how they have promoted diversity and equality in tech.

video:video.video:title: Intgration de la Suite Elastic la plateforme interne dAmadeus (French)
video:video.video:description: Aymeric Gerardin, Manager SRE for Data Management & Monitoring Division et Luca Belluccini, Elastic Stack Lead Developer for Queueing & Data Store Department chez Amadeus, partageront leur exprience en revenant sur les dfis relevs et les leons retenues pour finalement aboutir au succs de leur projet Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Being Elastic: The Who, The Where, The How
video:video.video:description: A distributed system...built by a distributed team...in a company committed to distributed work. Join this session to learn more about Elastic the company. Who we are. Where we are. How we work.What is it that makes Elastic well elastic? What are some characteristics of an Elastician? What are the actual things that we care about and the aspirational statements we make to chart our course into the future?

video:video.video:title: Security Starts at the Endpoint
video:video.video:description: The job of protecting the enterprise has become increasingly complex. We make it simple. Elastic Endpoint Security will be the only endpoint protection product to fully combine prevention, detection, and response into a single autonomous agent. It's easy to use, built for speed, and stops exploits at the earliest stages of attack. Join this session to see a live demo and get all your questions about endpoint protection answered.

video:video.video:title: Data Hero: Legends of Analytics
video:video.video:description: Activision knows that social media platform Twitter is a critically important channel for interacting with Activision's players. Learn how Activision uses the Elastic Stack, natural language processing, and event detection algorithms to turn tweet streams into information that supports the operations of its games.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: ElasticsearchQASSPusna-RS

video:video.video:title: Logging, indicateurs et APM : le trio gagnant pour des oprations russies
video:video.video:description: Pour une meilleure visibilit oprationnelle, centralisez les logs, les indicateurs et, dsormais, les donnes APM. Dcouvrez comment Elasticsearch regroupe efficacement ces types de donnes au mme endroit. De mme, dcouvrez comment utiliser Kibana pour rechercher des logs, analyser des indicateurs et exploiter les fonctionnalits APM afin de mieux surveiller les performances et de rsoudre les problmes plus rapidement.Cette session sera prsente en franais.

video:video.video:title: Running the Elastic Stack on Kubernetes - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubra la mejor forma de ejecutar el Elastic Stack en Kubernetes usando Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK), integrada en el panel del operador. Descubre cmo puedes empezar a usar ECK para actualizar fcilmente las versiones y aplicar cambios de configuracin, disfrutar de una alta disponibilidad y seguridad, adems de otras muchas ventajas.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre la visin que hay tras los cambios en los productos de Elastic, desde las nuevas caractersticas y soluciones, hasta las mayores opciones de despliegue. Escucha qu tienen que decir los creadores del Elastic Stack sobre el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash, adems de la evolucin del panorama de soluciones.

video:video.video:title: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: La visibilidad operativa de tus servicios y aplicaciones puede alcanzar un nuevo nivel si centralizas los datos de tus logs, mtricas de infraestructuras, APM y monitoreo de tiempo de actividad. Descubre cmo Elasticsearch combina de forma eficiente estos tipos de datos en un solo almacn y cmo los usa Kibana para analizarlos. Vers cmo identificar, diagnosticar y resolver problemas operativos ms rpidamente gracias a los ltimos desarrollos, como Metrics Explorer, el streaming de cola de logs, la compatibilidad para el seguimiento distribuido en APM y la integracin con Prometheus.

video:video.video:title: Americas East (Virtual) 2020: Elasticsearch on Azure
video:video.video:description: Search, Observe, Protect with native Elasticsearch capabilities on Azure, regardless of whether youre targeting Azure as your cloud, hybrid, or multi-cloud. Join the creators of the Elastic Stack and Microsoft product experts to learn best practices around deployment, scaling, and security and get a sneak peek at what's next for Elastic on Microsoft Azure.

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Learn how we reimagined search in the workplace so you can get to the information you need quickly with a unified search experience, out-of-the-box data connectors, and simple search management interfaces.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: O Elastic Security fornece preveno, coleta, deteco e resposta globais em situaes de ameaa aos dados. Saiba como superar os adversrios com tecnologia de vrias camadas, veja demonstraes ao vivo e obtenha respostas para todas as suas dvidas.

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Elastic Cloud Deep Dive (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: Elastic Cloud EnterpriseElasticsearch

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Keynote
video:video.video:description: Les crateurs de la Suite Elastic vous parleront de l'avenir d'Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats et Logstash, des nouvelles solutions, fonctionnalits et options de dploiement, ainsi que d'un paysage en pleine volution.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Nous avons repens la recherche pour les entreprises, afin d'acclrer l'accs aux informations : dcouvrez une exprience de recherche unifie, des connecteurs de donnes immdiatement oprationnels et des interfaces de gestion simplissimes.

video:video.video:title: Customer Story(11): Order monitoring and anomaly detection with Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: 11 2 MSA(Micro Service Architecture) MSA Kafka .Elasticsearch , Elasticsearch .

video:video.video:title: REX : classification de courriers postaux avec Elasticsearch (FR)
video:video.video:description: Ce soir, je vous parle d'un cas d'utilisation un peu atypique d'Elasticsearch : la classification de courriers postaux pour dterminer le service destinataire. On parlera classification par moteur de rgles, classification par apprentissage supervis, structure de document "nested", et chane d'analyse pour dtecter le code postal de l'metteur. Enfin, je terminerai avec quelques stats montrant la performance de l'ensemble... avec Kibana bien sr :)

video:video.video:title: Au cur du Machine Learning
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez la prvision de sries temporelles et la catgorisation automatique des donnes de log. Les fonctions de Machine Learning dElastic se sont considrablement dveloppes pour crer un outil puissant qui automatise les notifications en cas danomalies et simplifie les tches, comme la prconfiguration de lanalyse des logs NGINX lchelle. Dcouvrez comment appliquer cette solution pour vos donnes.

video:video.video:title: What's Next for Elastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: Elastic Cloud is Elastics official Elasticsearch hosted offering, allowing you to provision and use clusters on AWS at a click of a button. More recently, we've been working on Elastic Cloud Enterprise, which allows users to setup an Elastic Cloud environment on their own infrastructure and manage tens, hundreds even thousands of clusters with ease. In this session, Alex and Chris will cover past, present, and future for Elastic Cloud and Elastic Cloud Enterprise. They'll touch on how it works, as well as give a live demo of Elastic Cloud Enterprise, where theyll provision, secure, scale, and upgrade an Elasticsearch cluster with just a few clicks.

video:video.video:title: London 2017 - Elasticsearch Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Dive in with Clinton to learn how to use the latest features in Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Cyber Hunting at Perched with the Elastic Stack & X-Pack
video:video.video:description: Perched is using Elastic's X-Pack to analyze intrusions as they progress through a campaign and exploring methods to push them back through the kill-chain.

video:video.video:title: Keynote
video:video.video:description: ElasticsearchKibanaBeatLogstash

video:video.video:title: Keynote - Europe 2020
video:video.video:description: Hear directly from the creators of the stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash, new features and solutions, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Europe (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cloud
video:video.video:description: Elastic StackKibanaElastic CloudElastic Cloud

video:video.video:title: Accelerating Elastic on Microsoft Azure
video:video.video:description: Microsoft and Elastic have partnered to bring the ELK Stack to Microsoft Azure, letting developers uncover the value and insights buried in their data by deploying search and visualization services on demand.

video:video.video:title: State of the Community
video:video.video:description: In this presentation, you'll hear from our Director of Developer Relations on all things community & the ELK Stack. You'll learn where your fellow users are, how they are contributing and and plans for the community's future. Plus, we'll show some amazing stats using our community metrics ELK dashboards. You'll leave this session with a solid understanding of how you can contribute to the ELK community and how you - and your company - can benefit from doing so.

video:video.video:title: What's Brewing in Beats? (2016)
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Monica Sarbu and Tudor Golubenco present the latest and greatest news about Beats at Elastic{ON}16 on February 17, 2016, in San Francisco.

video:video.video:title: Seoul 2017: Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Get the update from Shay on where the Elastic Stack is headed, from logging to metrics to the APM solution that's brewing.

video:video.video:title: Quit Yammer(ing) Away & Start Analyzing Your Log Data!
