video:video.video:description: Hear how Yammer ships logs from over 4,000 servers to Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana for production on-call support, monitoring, and analytics, accelerating incident detection and helping to identify trends over time.

video:video.video:title: Prcticas recomendadas en materia de arquitectura y errores que debes evitar
video:video.video:description: Crece con confianza. Desde la implementacin de un pequeo nodo de desarrollo para la bsqueda de aplicaciones hasta la gestin de una gran implementacin de cientos de nodos, nuestros expertos en Elastic te contarn todo lo que necesites saber.Esta presentacin ser en Espaol.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - Munich 2017
video:video.video:description: Get the update from Shay on where the Elastic Stack is headed, from logging to metrics to the APM solution that's brewing.

video:video.video:title: Unleashing Elasticsearch: Taking the Reins Off @ Atlassian
video:video.video:description: Atlassian is using Elasticsearch to power its internal logging platform, depended on by dozens of internal product teams. Find out how a small team is delivering big wins by choosing to build on top of Elasticsearch and AWS, and where they're taking Elasticsearch next.

video:video.video:title: Upgrade to 6.0: Leading with Empathy
video:video.video:description: This is the story of how we built an Elastic upgrade experience that spans products, versions, and users. It begins with relationships, is sustained by empathy, and is challenged by the unknown.The complexity of the project from the cross-product integration level should not be underestimated, nor should the difficulty of supporting users beset with different scenarios. Hear about the surprises we experienced along the journey that impacted release dates and see what to expect in the 7.0 upgrade.

video:video.video:title: Anlisis de seguridad integral con Elastic
video:video.video:description: Te interesa mantener una posicin de ventaja frente a posibles ataques en el cambiante panorama de seguridad actual? Descubre cmo crear una plataforma de anlisis de seguridad centralizada con la velocidad y escala que necesitas y disfruta de anlisis personalizados durante los ejercicios de deteccin de amenazas.Esta presentacin ser en Espaol.

video:video.video:title: Ingestion de donnes avec la Suite Elastic (French)
video:video.video:description: Entrez dans le monde de lingestion de donnes avec Logstash 5.x qui inclut des nouvelles fonctionnalits tels que dead letter, persistent queues, Grok Debugger et les nouvelles API de monitoring. Puis familiarisez-vous avec les agents lgers pour le transfert de donnes : Heartbeat et Metricbeat.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ The Ministry of Health/Datasus
video:video.video:description: A Asper ajuda o Ministrio da Sade no Brasil a indexar dados atravs da utilizao de API REST, tornando-os acessves a qualquer aplicao e garantindo busca textual e fontica de forma rpida e eficiente.A Elastic Stack utilizada com o Elasticsearch como uma ponte entre as bases de dados e as aplicaes, o Logstash para ingesto de dados e o Kibana para criao de painis com visualizaes grficas atualizadas em tempo real.Saiba como a equipe da ASPER projeta, arquiteta e implementa projetos utilizando o Elastic Cloud Enterprise.

video:video.video:title: Graduating with Honors: How Quizlet is Scaling Elasticsearch to Help Children Learn
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch is powering a generation of learning on Quizlet -  a tool used by millions of students to study for classes and assessments. With over 60 million study sets, finding the right content is essential to user experience, making Elasticsearch a key piece of user experience and infrastructure. This talk will focus on how Quizlet scaled their cluster for the yearly ramp-up in traffic as students returned to school this past fall as well as touching on the benefits of working directly with Elastic's support team in the process.

video:video.video:title: Q&A about Open Source Technology at Goldman Sachs
video:video.video:description: Aaron Katz, Elastic VP of Worldwide Field Operations, sat down with Don Duet, Goldman Sachs Co-Head of Technology, to discuss using open source technology like Elasticsearch across the organization.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2015 Highlights Reel
video:video.video:description: Elastic{ON} 2015 was the first-ever user conference that brought together Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana experts and fans from all over the world face to face. It was held at Pier 27 in San Francisco, CA and hosted over 1,200 attendees. The speakers were fantastic. The attendees were top-notch. And the food was great. We had a blast. Heres a taste of all the goodness that transpired.
IT Elastic Stack Elasticsearch

video:video.video:title: Elastic como solucin herramienta de Gestin de Logs en plataforma PaaS Privada
video:video.video:description: Conoce el testimonio de usuarios locales que han sacado partido a Elastic para llevar a cabo anlisis de negocio, analtica de ciberseguridad, moniorizacin, etc.

video:video.video:title: Metrics As a Service au Groupe La Poste : un monitoring autonome dOpenShift / Kubernetes avec la suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: Ds linstallation de leur premire infrastructure, lquipe ITaaS sest concentre sur la centralisation des logs et une remonte de mtriques pour visualiser et analyser les containers : cpu, mmoire, disques etc... Au fil des mois, lquipe a ajout les mtriques APACHE puis JMX et fournit une visualisation des logs et mtriques grce aux fonctionnalits dauto-discovery des Beats. A prsent, linfrastructure constitue le backbone de gestion des mtriques la fois dans Elasticsearch et Graphite mais aussi avec leurs outils de visualisation: Kibana et Grafana.

video:video.video:title: From Apache to Solr to Elasticsearch: The Evolution of Zendesk's Search Experience
video:video.video:description: Zendesk manages terabytes of customer data in the form of support ticket comments, user data, knowledge base content, etc. In Zendesk's previous search architecture based on Apache Solr 3.6 (pre-cloud), manual sharding, operational overhead, difficulty of schema updates, and lack of near-real time indexing was limiting scalability, performance and development velocity. This talk will provide insights into the reasons Zendesk migrated from Apache Solr to Elasticsearch, the journey, and the lessons learned while building their new search and indexing architecture.

video:video.video:title: Opening keynote - Denver 2020
video:video.video:description: See the vision behind changes coming to Elastic products, from new features and solutions to whats to come after joining forces with endpoint security company Endgame. Hear directly from the creators of the Elastic Stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Le cas d'usage de Elasticsearch chez Logmatic.io - Elasticsearch Meetup Paris November 2014 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Logmatic.io est un systme SaaS d'analyse de logs bas sur un cluster Elasticsearch. Encore en bta-prive, cette technologie rvolutionne la vision de valeur porte par les donnes machines. Ceci en poussant des usages la fois simples de configuration et extrmement puissants s'adressant tous les corps de mtier de l'entreprise.

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Elasticsearch (French)
video:video.video:description: Cross-cluster search, ingest node, rollover API, shrink API, field collapsing, unified highlighter tant de nouvelles fonctionnalits qui vous feront aimer Elasticsearch. Mettez-vous niveau sur 5.x et dcouvrez comment 6.x rsout les problmes de scaling, mise niveau, recovery, sparse data et lutilisation de disque.

video:video.video:title: Une plateforme Data 360 au Ministre des Armements avec la Suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: Le ministre des Armes gnre un grand nombre de donnes dans les domaines administratifs et oprationnels. Afin doptimiser lexploitation de ces donnes pour une prise de dcision plus aise, le LABO BI et Big data a mis en place une plateforme Big Data/IA dnomme Data360 qui permet de croiser des donnes de diverses sources (financires, ressources humaines, des IoT) et galement dutiliser lintelligence artificielle sur ces donnes. Cette plateforme utilise en partie des composants de la Suite Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch au coeur du projet Data Lake de Renault (French)
video:video.video:description: Kamlia Benchekroun, Responsable Data Lake IT Squad chez Renault, prsentera la cration et la mise en place dune plateforme Elasticsearch pour leur data lake et donnera un aperu de leur nouveau projet Elastic Cloud Entreprise, actuellement en cours.

video:video.video:title: The Contributor's Guide to the Kibana Galaxy
video:video.video:description: Don't Panic! Exploring the expanses of the Kibana galaxy alone can be daunting, but join us to discover the answer to the greatest question - how does it all work? We will venture into the belly of the beast to discover how Kibana works, and how you can modify and extend it.In this presentation, we'll cover: Setting up Kibana for Development Under the Hood: Dependency Management to Server Architecture Major Components : Apps to Aggregation TypesContributing : Enhancing KibanaWe'll conclude the presentation with a live demo. Attendees will leave this presentation with a deep understanding of how Kibana works, why it works that way and how to use Kibana to get deep insights into their datasets.

video:video.video:title: IBM Logging and Monitoring Service in IBM Bluemix
video:video.video:description: The Logging and Monitoring Service in IBM Bluemix provides Elasticsearch capability to containers and VMs in IBM Bluemix. We'll show the current service, talk about our experience scaling Elasticsearch to support cloud level scale, and show where we're headed in the future.

video:video.video:title: "Its all in the {find} yknow @ the BBC
video:video.video:description: In this presentation Michael outlines how the Elastic Stack has been deployed to meet the challenges of maximising value from the BBCs archives. Using real world examples see how todays technology is unlocking yesterdays content and a vision for the future of media search.

video:video.video:title: Analyse de scurit de bout en bout avec la Suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: Vous voulez prendre une longueur davance sur la concurrence, dans lunivers en constante volution des solutions de scurit ? Dcouvrez comment crer une plateforme centralise danalyse de la scurit qui rponde vos exigences de volumtrie et de rapidit dinvestigation.Cette session sera prsente en franais.

video:video.video:title: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: La observabilidad operativa de tus servicios y aplicaciones puede alcanzar un nuevo nivel si centralizas los datos de tus logs, mtricas de infraestructuras, APM y monitoreo de tiempo de actividad. Descubre cmo Elasticsearch combina de forma eficiente estos  datos en un solo almacn y cmo los combina KibanaVers cmo identificar, diagnosticar y resolver problemas operativos de manera ms rpida y eficiente gracias a los ltimos desarrollos, como Metrics Explorer, el streaming de cola de logs, la compatibilidad para el seguimiento distribuido en APM y la integracin con Prometheus.

video:video.video:title: Logging and Metrics in Elastic Cloud: Drinking Our Own Champagne
video:video.video:description: In Elastic Cloud, we've migrated from a polyglot logging solution to one based entirely on the Elastic Stack. Hear members of the Cloud SRE team talk about making the switch and cover architectural and implementation concerns, care, and feeding, as well as lessons learned. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2017 Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Say "heya" to Elastic{ON} 2017, the largest single gathering of Elastic Stack users around the world. Hear from Shay on exciting product announcements with live demos from key people in our engineering and product teams - Tudor Golubenco on Beats, Chris Cowan on timeseries in Kibana, Steve Dodson on machine learning, Uri Cohen on Elastic Cloud, Costin Leau on Elasticsearch SQL, and Rashid Khan on Canvas in Kibana. Steven introduces the three winners of the Elastic Cause Awards, highlighting how the Elastic Stack is used to help solve global problems.

video:video.video:title: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre cmo hemos reinventado la bsqueda en el entorno de trabajo para que t y tu equipo podis acceder rpidamente a la informacin que necesitis con una experiencia de bsqueda idntica, conectores de datos instantneos e interfaces de gestin de bsquedas sencillas. Busca en documentos, datos empresariales e informacin de las cuentas de la forma ms rpida y natural que jams pudiste imaginar. As es la bsqueda empresarial, as es el mtodo Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Big Data in Mixed Reality (MxR)
video:video.video:description: Stormfish uses the Elastic Stack to support the development of a number of MxR environments using big data, including several for the Army Research Lab. Their cutting-edge research and development team attempts to analyze, understand, and contextualize insights from big data in real time to aid decision-making in rapidly evolving, fast-paced environments. Hear how they use the Elastic Stack to ingest data from disparate sources, run real-time analytics, and export the insights to an operational MxR environment. See a demo of an example MxR analytic environment with a simulated game environment showcasing the safe navigation of forces and the identification of priority targets in dense, urban terrains. Plus, hear about about lessons learned and get insights on where use cases for analytic MxR environments might go next. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: ElasticsearchKibana

video:video.video:title: Comment Natixis Financement a enrichi sa vision client avec Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Natixis Financement obtient une vision complte de sa clientle grce aux capacits de collecte de donnes multi-source en temps rel et au systme de requtes d'Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Canvas for Building Real-time Infographics
video:video.video:description: Go behind the scenes and learn how Canvas helps you create pixel-perfect, infographic-inspired, living visualizations in Kibana. Plus, see how the new Elasticsearch SQL language plugs into Canvas.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - Barcelona 2019
video:video.video:description: Descubre la visin que hay tras los cambios en los productos de Elastic, desde las nuevas caractersticas y soluciones, hasta el desarrollo de las opciones de despliegue. Escucha la opinin de los creadores del Elastic Stack sobre el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash, adems de la evolucin del panorama de soluciones.

video:video.video:title: ERDF: Centralisation de grands volumes de logs
video:video.video:description: ERDF centralise et surveille de grands volumes de logs grce une architecture associant les capacits de Logstash et d'Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Architecture at Scale
video:video.video:description: Crece con confianza. Desde tu porttil hasta numerosos nodos o despliegues para diversos casos de uso y clsteres, nuestros expertos de Elastic compartiran las prcticas a seguir y los obstculos que hay que evitar para escalar con xito.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Tenedis: Deploying a unified monitoring base
video:video.video:description: Au cours de cette prsentation Denis LIARD, le CTO de la socit Tenedis (partenaire Elastic Advanced spcialis dans lObservabilit, leader franais avec 30M de CA et 80 collaborateurs), prsente les enjeux et retours dexprience de Tenedis autour du dploiement dun Socle de Monitoring Unifi bas sur Elastic, chez des grandes comptes franais. Il y dcrit notamment les raisons du choix technologique port sur Elastic, les constats raliss au cours des premiers projets et certains points cls qui peuvent contribuer au succs dun tel projet.

video:video.video:title: Logging, Mtricas e APM: O Trio de Operaes
video:video.video:description: Eleve o nvel da sua visibilidade operacional com Logging , Mtricas e dados APM, agora tudo no mesmo lugar. Saiba como a Elasticsearch combina de maneira eficiente esses tipos de dados em um local nico e veja como o Kibana usado para buscar logs, analisar mtricas e aproveitar recursos do APM para otimizar o monitoramento de performance e a resoluo de problemas.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security assure la prvention, la collecte et la dtection globales des menaces qui psent sur les donnes, ainsi que la rponse globale ces menaces. Dcouvrez comment prendre une longueur d'avance sur les utilisateurs malveillants grce une technologie multicouches, regardez des dmos en direct et obtenez des rponses vos questions.

video:video.video:title: _search? Simplifique: Elastic App Search
video:video.video:description: Conhea a fundo o Elastic App Search, a forma mais simples e rpida de adicionar busca ao seus aplicativos internos ou externos. Saiba como implantar rapidamente buscas relevantes e de alto desempenho no seu aplicativo.

video:video.video:title: Geo exploration simplified with Elastic Maps
video:video.video:description: The Elastic Stack has supported geospatial analysis since its early days, and the latest versions of Elasticsearch and Kibana deliver significant enhancements to geo capabilities. Learn how to capitalize on these new features to take your location data further, from ingest to insight, with Elastic Maps.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Descubre las nuevas caractersticas en las que estamos trabajando. Vers demostraciones y tendrs acceso a informacin sobre la replicacin entre clsteres y los ndices bloqueados de Elasticsearch, los espacios de Kibana y el creciente conjunto de datos de integraciones en Beats y Logstash.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Informatique CDC & the Elastic Stack: Tackling multiple use cases with one stack
video:video.video:description: Informatique CDC (ICDC), filiale IT de la Caisse des Dpts, dveloppe, hberge et scurise les applications IT de ltablissement public. Pour remplir cette mission, lICDC se repose sur une approche globale et des solutions sur mesure. Dcouvrez comment ICDC utilise la Suite Elastic pour rpondre diffrents besoins avec une seule suite technologique. Que ce soit pour rsoudre des problmatiques business analytics, search ou dobservabilit, ICDC a fait dElastic la cl de vote de ces catgories de cas dusage.

video:video.video:title: Keynote d'Ouverture
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez les nouveauts qui se prparent pour la Suite Elastic ; que ce soit pour les cas dusage allant du logging aux metrics ou encore la toute nouvelle solution dAPM.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020 - Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Saiba como o Elasticsearch combina com eficincia dados em um nico armazenamento e como o Kibana usado para analis-los. Alm disso, veja como os desenvolvimentos recentes ajudam a identificar e resolver problemas operacionais mais rapidamente.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez les dernires fonctionnalits grce nos dmos et annonces : rplication inter-clusters, indices gels d'Elasticsearch, Kibana Spaces, et toujours plus d'intgrations de donnes dans Beats et Logstash.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Elastic Machine Learning

video:video.video:title: Boas Prticas de Arquitetura + O Que Evitar
video:video.video:description: Escale com confiana, seja implantando um pequeno cluster de desenvolvimento para busca em aplicativo ou gerenciando a implantao de centenas de nodes. Nossos especialistas da Elastic j viram de tudo um pouco e vo compartilhar tudo que voc precisa colocar em prtica e tudo que se deve evitar.

video:video.video:title: Comment Elastic sintgre la plateforme de recherche en mdecine personnalise au sein du CARPEM
video:video.video:description: Le CARPEM (Cancer Research and Personalised Medicine) explique comment la suite Elastic sintgre avec dautres solutions leur plateforme de recherche translationnelle (PRT). Le CARPEM utilise en effet Elastic pour rassembler un volume important de donnes et automatiser des reprsentations automatiques adaptes aux diffrents profils dutilisateurs. De cette manire il devient possible daborder les technologies de Big Data dans un contexte de recherche mdicale associant de nombreuses bases de donnes aux donnes trs htrognes et larchitecture complexe.

video:video.video:title: Elastic at Procter & Gamble: A Network Story
video:video.video:description: The network team at Procter & Gamble inherited infrastructure from years of outsourcing different solutions for small problems. A central repository for data analysis was needed to churn through the high amount of data (nearly 6TB a day) coming from disparate software sources. Procter & Gamble chose Elastic, and Elastic Cloud Enterprise specifically, to unify their data. Learn how the Elastic Stack has offered speed, resiliency, and high availability to help Procter & Gamble achieve a greater understanding of their data, as well as introducing observability to their toolkit to help them be more proactive and provide better services.

video:video.video:title: Stories from Support: Top Problems and Solutions
video:video.video:description: Youre not alone when it comes to certain challenges with your Elasticsearch deployment. Come learn about solutions to some of the most common issues our users face from a few of our support engineers. Youll be sure to leave with learnings you can apply to our own clusters when you get home!

video:video.video:title: What's Evolving in Elasticsearch? (2017)
video:video.video:description: The 5.0 release of Elasticsearch took advantage of the cleanups in 2.0 to add a slew of new features on top of a rock-solid foundation. Clint and Simon will give an overview of the changes already released in the 5.x series, and a taste of the big new features coming in 6.0.

video:video.video:title: Keynote - Asia Pacific 2020
video:video.video:description: Hear directly from the creators of the stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash, new features and solutions, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Replacing Systems of Record with Engagement at Royal Bank of Canada
video:video.video:description: Today, almost every single major decision that drives revenue, controls costs, or reduces risk can be powered with data and analytics. Search analytics are being used to help companies react faster and smarter through insight into everything from marketing to consumer trends and beyond. See how the Royal Bank of Canada leverages a powerful event-driven microservices architecture in order to evolve from a systems-of-record way of working to systems-of-engagement. Learn how Canada's leading financial institution utilized Elastic Cloud Enterprise to accomplish mainframe offload through data analytics and drive tremendous cost savings. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Analyse des sentiments sur Twitter avec Elastic Machine Learning (FR)
video:video.video:description: Les rseaux sociaux ont chang le web jamais et ils ont chang beaucoup dautres choses. La manire dont nous collectons les avis de nos clients, dont nous surveillons certains secteurs dactivits, tout ceci a chang. Comment peut-on utiliser l'option Machine learning d'Elastic pour amliorer et automatiser nos diffrents processus de monitoring ? Durant cette prsentation, je montrerai concrtement comment intgrer les donnes et les enrichir avec Logstash puis nous ferons une analyse en profondeur de nos donnes indexes en utilisant le plugin Machine Learning delastic.

video:video.video:title: Kibana 5 : la fentre de la Suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: La nouvelle interface de la version 5.0 de Kibana est plus simple et commence intgrer des lments de la Suite Elastic : installation, configuration, gestion, visualisation et bien plus encore.

video:video.video:title: Transformational Search Performance with EnergyIQ
video:video.video:description: EnergyIQ manages multiple data types and sources across the full well lifecycle for oil and gas companies. Several years ago, EnergyIQ experienced query performance issues with their traditional PPDM-based relational model approach due to an explosion in data volume and complexity. They pivoted to Elasticsearch and the impact on end-user search performance, functionality, and flexibility was immediate. Learn how EnergyIQ implemented Elasticsearch and how they extended their search platform to combine the advanced spatial search capability of Elastic with industry leading GIS visualization tools.

video:video.video:title: Asia Pacific (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: ElasticsearchKibana SpacesBeatsLogstash

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Descubre las nuevas caractersticas en las que estamos trabajando. Vers demostraciones e informacin sobre la replicacin entre clsteres y los ndices bloqueados de Elasticsearch, los espacios de Kibana y el creciente conjunto de datos de integraciones en Beats y Logstash.

video:video.video:title: What's new in 6.0 (French)
video:video.video:description: Afin daider notre formidable communaut se prparer au grand changement, Camilo Sierra, Elastic, vous expliquera les changements majeurs de la Suite Elastic 6.0. Nous parlerons de choses comme les mises jour de versions majeures sans interruptions, des optimisations des structures de donnes Lucene, des Sequence IDs, de nos adieux au _type, des nouveaux modes dans les tableaux de bord, des alertes automatises sur vos clusters Elastic, des pipelines Logstash et de leur gestion depuis Kibana, de lintgration Beats avec Kubernetes et de tous les nouveaux modules Beats.

video:video.video:title: Security Operation Center with the Elastic Stack, what else?
video:video.video:description: The presentation will focus on the problems encountered when using the Elastic Stack for the creation of a SOC, and found solutions. These problems can be encountered in many cases of use. The topics of project preparation and Kibana plugin creation will be discussed.

video:video.video:title: Running the Elastic Stack on Kubernetes
video:video.video:description: Conocela mejor forma de ejecutar el Elastic Stack en Kubernetes usando Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes (ECK), integrado en el panel del operador. Descubre cmo puedes empezar a usar ECK para actualizar fcilmente las versiones y aplicar cambios de configuracin, disfrutar de una alta disponibilidad y seguridad, adems de otras muchas ventajas.

video:video.video:title: Kibana and Geo Update: Canvas, Elastic Maps, and More
video:video.video:description: Las nuevas caractersticas de Kibana te ayudan a explorar y presentar los datos con mtodos innovadores, como nuevas visualizaciones y dashboards para Canvas, y mejoras en las funcionalidades de datos geoespaciales. Descubre cmo sacar el mximo partido a estas funcionalidades para poder trazar planes de accin con tus datos y as trabajar con los datos de ubicacin, desde su entrada hasta anlisis posterior.

video:video.video:title: Search for All with Elastic Enterprise Search
video:video.video:description: Descubre cmo hemos reinventado la bsqueda en el entorno de trabajo para que t y tu equipo podis acceder rpidamente a la informacin que necesitis con una experiencia de bsqueda idntica, conectores de datos instantneos e interfaces de gestin de bsquedas sencillas. Busca en documentos, datos empresariales e informacin de las cuentas de la forma ms rpida y natural que jams pudiste imaginar. As es la bsqueda empresarial, as es el mtodo Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2017 - The Official Elasticsearch User Conference
video:video.video:description: Our 3rd annual Elasticsearch user conference took place on March 7-9, 2017 at Pier 48 in San Francisco. Last year, Elastic{ON} was a huge success, but dont take our word for it. Check out what attendees had to say about the user conference and get in {ON} it this year. Learn about the next Elastic{ON}

video:video.video:title: Cyber Security Log Analytics at Decision Lab
video:video.video:description: Buiding a seamless Cyber Security analytics tool starts by choosing the right stack. The team at Decision Lab shares how they've deployed Kibana, Logstash, Elasticsearch, Angular, and Node to replace Hadoop and Splunk. Other insights include architecture, automation, and deployment best practices.

video:video.video:title: Whats Evolving in the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, Logstash , .

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning avec Elastic (French)
video:video.video:description: Comment fonctionne le machine learning d'Elastic, et comment l'utiliser pour traquer des donnes anormales dans votre SI.

video:video.video:title: Mise en place dun produit Log as a service avec Elasticsearch (French)
video:video.video:description: Nicolas explique dans cette vido la plateforme Log as a service opre en interne chez Orange et base sur Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Lyft's Wild Ride from Amazon ES to Self-Managed Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: From October 2016 to May 2017, Lyft was Amazon's biggest hosted Elasticsearch customer and most frequent support headache. After quickly scaling to the maximum supported size and then beyond Lyft found themselves keeping one big support ticket open to address daily (and sometimes hourly) incidents. It was clearly time for a change. After two intense weeks of migration, Lyft became self-hosted, and both companies breathed a sigh of relief. How did Lyft get there from here? What are the pros and cons of cloud versus self-hosted Elasticsearch deployments? And what has Lyft learned from almost a year of operating their own cluster? Michael Goldsby of Lyft's observability team talks you through the joys and sorrows of scaling a logging cluster from 300,000 to 3 million events per minute. Want to learn more about the differences between the Amazon Elasticsearch Service and our official Elasticsearch Service? Visit our AWS Elasticsearch comparison page.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch SQL (2017)
video:video.video:description: Do you find yourself pointing new Elasticsearch users every which way to various reference guides, language documentations, and example console snippets? Are you onboarding new Elasticsearch users to your company/organization and trying to get them up to speed? Come see what Costin's been cookin'! In this session, you'll get a taste of a new Elastic {Re}search project and some of the recipes behind it. Costin will discuss how Elastic is working to make Elasticsearch more accessible to users, applications, and systems. Join us and bring your own ideas and an open mind.
Elasticsearch Elasticsearch Elasticsearch

video:video.video:title: Fantastic, Bombastic, Elastic: You Know, for Amazing New Experiences at R+V Versicherung (in German)
video:video.video:description: In this talk Markus and Bernd will describe how Elasticsearch was introduced as a new technology at R+V for Log Monitoring and Customer Search. They will also speak to the amazing new experiences they've had with the entire Elastic Stack in combination with other solutions such as Apache Spark. Excited to share their road map, Markus and Bernd will present their ideas on some interesting Elasticsearch use cases they R & V are exploring for the near future.

video:video.video:title: Ship Your Own Data: Tailoring Beats to Your Use Case
video:video.video:description: Beats is a little bit like LEGO: You can use each Beat itself as a building block to cover your needs, but at the same time each Beat consists of different reusable and extendable elements. This makes it possible for developers and operators to combine and extend Beats in different ways.In this talk, Nicolas and Steffen will introduce developers, operators, and Beats users to the internals of the Elastic Beats. The knowledge gained will help with making informed decisions on how to extend Beats to deal with your particular use case if its not fully-covered by the existing Beats features.

video:video.video:title: Conferencia principal
video:video.video:description: Escucha hablar directamente a los creadores del stack sobre el futuro de Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats y Logstash, las caractersticas y soluciones nuevas, las opciones de despliegue que se amplan y el panorama de soluciones en evolucin.

video:video.video:title: REX on the implementation of elastic at Vente Prive (French)
video:video.video:description: Comment nous avons mont au fil des annes une architecture multi-cluster Elastic pour les quipes Back Office de vente-privee et quels ont t les problmes techniques et organisationnels rencontrs.

video:video.video:title: Architecture at Scale - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Crece con confianza. Desde tu porttil hasta numerosos nodos o despliegues para diversos casos de uso y clsteres, nuestros expertos de Elastic comparten las mejores prcticas que hay que saber dominar y los obstculos que hay que evitar para escalar Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Ingestion 5.0 : Beats et Logstash (French)
video:video.video:description: Logstash, Filebeat, Packetbeat, Winlogbeat avez-vous entendu parler de Metricbeat ? Et oui, il y a beaucoup de choses connatre propos de l'ingestion de donnes dans la Suite Elastic. Mettez-vous niveau !

video:video.video:title: Customer Story(Builton): Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Scale-up , , , ... Downtime ... , , , ? ?ElasticSearch RDBMS Cluster, CouchBase, HDFS ... . 3 , . . . ElasticSearch 3 3 .

video:video.video:title: Est Buscando Un Doctor? Kyruus' Guide to Find a Doctor in Spanish
video:video.video:description: Kyruus believes every patient has a right to access medical care. However, most provider searches at hospitals fail to serve a large population: Spanish speakers. That's why Kyruus is developing solutions to help the 40 million Spanish speakers in the US search for and find the most clinically relevant medical providers.Software engineer Michelle Chen explains how Kyruus uses certain Elasticsearch features to create a better Spanish-language search experience. She discusses the differences between Spanish and English text searches and how Kyruus adds medical jargon search capabilities to both languages.You will learn tips for better serving Spanish speakers in all search-based applications so you can start your own multilingual search project.

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Ingest and the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Logstash 5.xBeatsHeartbeatMetricbeat

video:video.video:title: End-to-End Security Analytics with the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Interested in staying ahead of the adversary in a shifting security landscape? Learn how to create a centralized security analytics platform with the speed and scale you need for ad hoc analysis during threat detection and hunting exercises.

video:video.video:title: Canvas para Criar Infogrficos em Tempo Real
video:video.video:description: Conhea os bastidores e descubra como o Canvas lhe ajudar a criar visualizaes em tempo real com perfeio e inspiradas em infogrficos no Kibana. Alm disso, veja como a nova linguagem Elasticsearch SQL se conecta com o Canvas.

video:video.video:title: Electric{Search} de 0 400 volts chez Polyconseil
video:video.video:description: Chez Blue-Solutions by Polyconseil, nous utilisons Elasticsearch pour stocker et indexer des donnes de tlmtrie provenant de milliers de blue devices (vhicules lectriques, points de recharge, batteries, etc.) afin de gnrer des alertes, d'analyser et de mieux comprendre leurs comportements. Dans cette prsentation nous montrerons comment nous avons entirement automatis le dploiement de clusters Elasticsearch (on-premise) en utilisant Ansible et comment nous comptons, lavenir avec Elasticsearch, en apprendre encore plus sur nos blue devices .

video:video.video:title: Welcome to Elastic{ON}17 Tour London
video:video.video:description: Get an update from Shay on the latest Elastic Stack innovations.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: Elastic Machine Learning2Elastic

video:video.video:title: Expanding Elasticsearch: Learn How to Leverage Heterogeneous Compute to Extend and Accelerate Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Search-based analytics are a critical function for any organization, so its no surprise that Elasticsearch is the go-to engine to power these queries. However, the limitations of todays traditional x86-based data analytics infrastructures often hinder or delay companies from getting the immediate insights they need to run a smart, data-driven business.To solve this, Al and Pat will show you how Ryft leverages FPGA/x86 heterogeneous compute technology to eliminate indexing and transformation, in addition to providing enhanced Elasticsearch functionality that accelerates workflows, increases the speed of search and analysis, and enhances wildcard searches.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: ElasticsearchKibanaBeatsLogstashElasticsearch SQL

video:video.video:title: Seeing a Better World with Big & Heavy GeoSpatial Data at DigitalGlobe
video:video.video:description: DigitalGlobe is an industry leader in GeoSpatial Search and Analytics Handling data at a ludicrous scale. They utilize Elasticsearch to drill down on their 90PB data archive of vector imagery. This talk focuses on how and why DigitalGlobe chose Elasticsearch and how they've architected and deployed it to give their clients - including aid organizations in Nepal - instant access to their full geospatial database in order to deliver life-saving services.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote - IBM
video:video.video:description: IBM discusses the Bluemix platform and how it enables logging with the Elastic Stack. Take your interconnected, cloud-hosted micro services and bring them together quickly and simply so you spend less time instrumenting your app for logging applications and more time enhancing it. The Bluemix platform uses multitenant systems to offer a large scale, personalized Elastic Stack logging experience.

video:video.video:title: B-b-b-b-b-beats! How to Build Your Own
video:video.video:description: The Beats project has evolved from just one Beat Packetbeat to several Beats, many of which are written by users like you. In this talk, join Beats core developers Nicolas and Steffen in their whirlwind attempt at creating a new Beat, live, from scratch!

video:video.video:title: Partner Story(IMGURU): : ( Vega )
Surfacing the Products You Love on Spring
video:video.video:description: Spring is a digital shopping destination that helps customers quickly find the products they love. Theyre using Elasticsearch to return more relevant search results on their catalog of more than 300,000 products.Learn how the Spring team builds a product catalog with Elasticsearch. Hear how they ensure product data is synced with information from external vendors including product-specific metadata. Take a closer look at their Elasticsearch ingestion process, where they use cron jobs and NSQ to update products at least once every 12 hours. Plus, learn about projects the Spring team has tackled to improve their index and better understand their users' intent, including text search improvements with natural language processing (NLP) and refining products by color.

video:video.video:title: Otto: Das Echtzeit Elastic (DE)
video:video.video:description: Wie die Otto Gruppe mit Hilfe des Elastic Technologie Stacks bis zu 5000 Dokumente pro Sekunde prozessiert und dabei versucht, Kundenwnsche besser zu identifizieren und schneller auf die Marktnachfrage zu reagieren.

video:video.video:title: Kibana: The Visualization Engine for Elasticsearch (with French subtitles)
video:video.video:description: Kibana give shape to your data. Whether it's machine logs or the complete works of Shakespeare, Kibana helps visualize data indexed into Elasticsearch. Architected to be as friendly to the people making data-driven decisions as it is to the developers making it all work, Kibana helps you explore and make sense of your data.

video:video.video:title: ENdoSnipe Elasticsearch ~~
video:video.video:description: ENdoSnipe 7 ENdoSnipe RDB Elasticsearch Elasticsearch

video:video.video:title: Verizon is Managing Security 700M Events at a Time
video:video.video:description: Verizon Managed Security Services (MSS) manages security for our customers dealing with security data collected from firewalls, IDs/IPs, proxy, and network/backbone. This presentation focuses on lessons learned, problems solved, and solutions implemented while running one of largest Elasticsearch clusters out there. Topics include architecture, investigation of various use cases, and best practices while dealing with 1M events per second and 20B events a day.

video:video.video:title: Nexios and Fast and Flexible Donor Segmentation at Red Cross Using Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Christiaan Stoffer, CTO at Nexios.com, talks about how they implemented tools for volunteers, a platform for the administration of all 30000 volunteers of the Dutch Red Cross. The platform, built on top of Elasticsearch, will evolve into a new version in which quick and responsive build-as-you-go donor segmentation will be possible. This will provide the Red Cross with a tool to target their nearly 2 million contacts via marketing campaigns in a much more user-friendly and more responsive way. By using Elasticsearch, Nexios helps the Red Cross to work more efficiently, and at reduced costs.

video:video.video:title: Faonner l'infrastructure de la plateforme de BNP CIB avec la Suite Elastic
video:video.video:description: BNP Parisbas Corporate & Institutional Banking (CIB), la filiale d'investissement mondiale du Groupe BNP, mne le chantier dunification de linfrastructure pour offrir la meilleure exprience possible leurs utilisateurs. Dans cette prsentation, Alex Afflerbach et Emmanuel Salzard montreront comment la Suite Elastic a permis de concevoir une plateforme stratgique qui gre les donnes des quipes techniques et mtiers. Ils dcriront l'architecture de cette plateforme de logging multi-tenante et discuteront des moyens mis en place pour relever des dfis comme la sgrgation des ressources ou encore la topologie l'chelle des ptabytes.

video:video.video:title: What's Brewing in Beats
video:video.video:description: What started with one lightweight method for shipping network data has since expanded to a family of Beats for files, metrics, Windows event logs, uptime data, and audit data. The Beats ecosystem is growing a lot. And we haven't even gotten to the community growth yet. Or how Beats modules streamline the data-source-to-data-visualization experience.Get the grand tour of recent Beats developments and work-in-progress features.

video:video.video:title: Partner Story(Ezfarm):
Walgreens' Journey To Creating an End-to-End Search Platform
video:video.video:description: Walgreens is on a journey towards creating an end-to-end search platform for its website powered by Elasticsearch. In this talk, Syed will walk through the various steps along the way, including a look at why their old Endeca-based search platform was no longer viable, how and why Elasticsearch became their new engine, and the technical and architectural lessons and successes they learned along the way. You'll also hear how Walgreens continues to expand its use of Elasticsearch to the Elastic Stack and X-Pack to power log management and analysis, including the use of Kibana to visualize technical and business metrics.

video:video.video:title: All the Data Thats Fit to Find: Search @ The New York Times
video:video.video:description: Hear how The New York Times put all 15 million of its articles published over the last 160 years into Elasticsearch. From article archives and the ingestion pipeline, to cluster setup and the APIs provided to the organization, Boerge will show what search really means at this world-renown news outlet.

video:video.video:title: Bringing Healthcare Analytics to the Point-of-Care @ Mayo Clinic
video:video.video:description: Mayo Clinic is bringing real-time clinical decision making to the point of care with a vertical application they built using the cloud, Elasticsearch, and D3 widgets. Hear how this application allows physicians to find similar patients and explore what-if scenarios using outcome and intervention parameters.

video:video.video:title: Operational Intelligence-as-a-Service to fuel SWIFTs Digital Transformation
video:video.video:description: SWIFT is the worlds leading provider in secure financial messaging services. To fuel SWIFTs Digital Transformation, they are bringing data analytics to the CORE of their Operations. Using the Elastic Stack to power their Operational Intelligence-as-a-Service, SWIFT brings full visibility to operations & applications telemetry data. Discover how SWIFT expanded the scope of their use cases from monitoring logging information, to having a 360 observability approach for customer support, and empowered their DevOps team to capture analytics & feedback to improve product development using the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch on Azure
video:video.video:description: Search, Observe, Protect with native Elasticsearch capabilities on Azure, regardless of whether youre targeting Azure as your cloud, hybrid, or multi-cloud. Join the creators of the Elastic Stack and Microsoft product experts to learn best practices around deployment, scaling, and security from self-hosted VMs to using the fully managed Elasticsearch Service in this demo-heavy session. Also, get a sneak peek at what's next for Elastic on Microsoft Azure.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cloud Inside Out
video:video.video:description: Elastic Cloud runs thousands of clusters and is growing rapidly, while maintaining solid SLAs and allowing users to scale out, upgrade, and reliably monitor their clusters. Ever wonder how it works?This session will go under the hood into how Elastic Cloud is built, how it handles complex tasks like efficient placement, zero-downtime upgrades, and host failures, as well as how the Elastic Cloud team uses it to orchestrate and manage thousands of clusters for Elastic Cloud customers.

video:video.video:title: arRESTful Development: How Netflix Uses Elasticsearch to Better Understand
video:video.video:description: With 700-800 production nodes spread across 100 Elasticsearch clusters, Netflix is pushing the envelope when it comes to extracting real-time insights on a massive scale. This talk will highlight how they deploy and manage an environment of that scale and touch on Raigad - their internally-built open source sidecar management tool for Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: K8s Monitoring
video:video.video:description: La stack Elastic permet nativement de monitorer les environnements k8s au travers de ses beats et sans composant supplmentaire. Avec La stack Elastic, au travers de ses fonctions dauto-discovery permettant de suivre la volatilit des containers et de ses dashboards, linformation rcupre par les commandes kubectl get, top, describe.... vous est dsormais plus accessible. Come and see . Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #36 chez Aircall.

video:video.video:title: Security, Alerting, Monitoring & More With the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Jay Modi, Alexander Reelsen, Joe Fleming, Tanguy Leroux, and Tim Sullivan present X-Pack and all the cool features it brings to the Elastic Stack at Elastic{ON}16 in San Francisco on February 18, 2016.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring de la Suite Elastic (FR)
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana et Beats continuent voluer... Ainsi nous avons rcemment repens notre produit de monitoring. Cette vido, adapte en franais partir d'une prsentation donne lors du Elastic{ON}1616, dvoile les caractristiques actuelles et futures de la fonctionnalit Monitoring du X-Pack associ la Suite Elastic.

video:video.video:title: Liferay, Search & Customization
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch est le moteur de recherche par dfaut dans Liferay depuis la version 7.0 sortie en 2016. Auparavant, Liferay utilisait Solr un moteur aussi bas sur Lucene et qui est toujours compatible avec Liferay. Dans cette prsentation, nous allons voir comment Liferay est construit afin dtre agnostique de la solution de recherche, et comment Elasticsearch est utilis au sein de cette DXP. Nous allons galement voir comment il est possible de construire sa propre application de recherche dans Liferay au travers dun exemple open-source Liferay GSearch qui permet davoir une exprience de recherche la Google.Enregistrement ralis lors du Meetup ElasticFR Paris #38 chez Liferay.

video:video.video:title: If It Moves, Measure It: Logging IoT with ELK
video:video.video:description: Logs are everywhere! Join Chris as he explores using ELK to collect and analyze time-series data gathered from networked sensors. He tracked temperature, humidity, motion, power, and other metrics around his home for a month. How did he do it? What did he learn?This talk will show you all about some of the fun sensor devices he used, as well as showing how he used ELK to collect and analyze the data.

video:video.video:title: Comment faire des analyses prdictives performantes avec Prelert et Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Elastic Paris Meetup - 22 septembre 2016Baha Azarmi montre comment effectuer des analyses prdictives performantes avec Prelert et Elasticsearch.http://www.meetup.com/ElasticFR/events/234202774/

video:video.video:title: Monitoring Docker with Metricbeat
video:video.video:description: Over the past couple years, Docker environments have become more and more common. It is critical to monitor these environments. Metricbeat offers two different possibilities to monitor Docker containers: cgroups and Docker API. In this talk, Andrew will discuss the differences and similarities between the two approaches with the pros and cons of each. He will also give a live demo to show how to set up Metricbeat for Docker monitoring and get insights.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ BAI Canada: Analyzing a Full Football Stadium Worth of WiFi Data Every Hour
video:video.video:description: BAI Canada has built a public Wi-Fi offering in both the Toronto and NYC subway systems, where there are roughly 2 million unique devices totaling 14 million logons per month using the service. BAI's implementation of the Elastic Stack handles around 10 million new records a day and growing. Learn how BAI Canada has designed, architected, and runs the Elastic Stack to help report on and monitor usage in one of the largest types of Wi-Fi deployments.

video:video.video:title: GDPR Compliance and Elasticsearch - French
video:video.video:description:
Le Rglement Gnral sur la Protection des Donnes de lUnion Europenne (RGPD) entre en vigueur le 25 mai 2018. La Suite Elastic (aussi connue sous le nom de Suite ELK) Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats et Logstash vous permet dacclrer le processus de conformit et veiller ce que les processus de gestion des donnes soient adapts la tche sur le long terme. Dans ce webinar David Sztykman, Solutions Architect, fait une prsentation du RGPD et montre comment la Suite Elastic peut tre utilise pour rpondre aux exigences du RGPD. Points abords :
Gestion des donnes caractre personnel dans le cadre du RGPD Utilisation de la Suite Elastic pour rpondre aux exigence du RGPD Comment scuriser et rendre vos donnes Elasticsearch conformes au RGPD Ressources ComplmentairesGDPR Landing pageGDPR Whitepaper

video:video.video:title: Geospatial Data Structures in Elasticsearch and Apache Lucene
video:video.video:description: This talk will cover everything you ever wanted to know about geo and Elasticsearch! Get advice on field mapping strategies, learn about geo aggregations and visualizations for exploratory spatial data analysis, as well as get insights into new spatial data structures being added to Lucene and Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Elastic at NARA for Search
video:video.video:description: The National Archives and Records Administration is building the next generation of electronic records archives. See how they're planning to use Elasticsearch to power discovery for millions of archived records from federal agencies, judicial proceedings, congressional work, and presidential administrations.

video:video.video:title: Creating Canvas for Real-Time Infographics in Kibana
video:video.video:description: It started with a plane ride. No, wait, that was Timelion. Canvas was born out of a desire to create pixel-perfect, infographic-inspired, living visualizations inside of Kibana that get viewers to do a double take and then look closer.Watch Rashid go from concept to creation with the Canvas expression language and UI. In this demo-driven presentation, he'll cover the basics and show off some neat tricks, too.

video:video.video:title: University of Washington: Don't Be Afraid of Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: From proof of concept to implementation in a minimal amount of time, here is a story of how a small team of engineers at the University of Washington introduced Elasticsearch in its development stack to replace the Oracle WebCenter content search engine, how it made their life easier, and how it improved the user experience.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cause Award: Ideas Box - How Libraries Without Borders Provides Access to Information
video:video.video:description: To aid those in need, Libraries Without Borders (LWB) developed the Ideas Box, a portable multimedia toolkit that's easy to transport, has minimal energy needs, and supplies its own power. Learn how LWB uses the Elastic Stack to improve digital content, and to develop search for offline digital libraries. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: ELK (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: Elastic

video:video.video:title: Visualizing Content Performance with Elastic at Canadian Broadcasting Corporation (CBC)
video:video.video:description: As Canada's public broadcaster, the CBC shares massive amounts of radio, television, and news content each day. With the Elastic Stack they're gaining new insights into how that content is performing, whether it's by surfacing usage statistics to the public, performing complex content performance analysis, or creating easy-to-understand visualizations for senior management.You'll learn how the CBC started ingesting data into Elastic Cloud and a few configurations before quickly scaling to handle a rapidly expanding database. You'll also see how they are currently leveraging the Elastic Stack for content performance analysis, using Kibana to quickly visualize data, and planning to bring in new data sources like Facebook's Open Graph and YouTube's analytics API to create a 360-degree view of how content is performing across platforms.

video:video.video:title: Water Business Cloud
video:video.video:description: 2011ICTWater Business CloudWBCWBC2016WBC-IoTElasticserch2IoTWBCIoTSLABeatKibanaAIElasticserch

video:video.video:title: What's Happening in Hadoop & Spark
video:video.video:description: An overview of the Elastic Hadoop ecosystem with a focus on what has happened over the last year with Elasticsearch for Apache Hadoop. You can expect to hear about Apache Storm, Apache Spark, DataFrames, and other Hadoop goodies.

video:video.video:title: Open Source in the Enterprise: A Conversation with Ciscos CTO
video:video.video:description: Having worked on supercomputers in the 1980s, as an evangelist for Java development in the 1990s, and today, as an OpenStack board member and leader for Ciscos open source initiatives, this conversation between Shay and Lew will surface perspectives on the future of open source for developers and enterprises.

video:video.video:title: Using Elasticsearch to drive car2go's realtime business insights from their connected cars
video:video.video:description: Car2go is an always-on business offering mobility service with cars to customers living in urban areas. Customers and cars constitute an IoT service generating data which must be processed and analyzed in real-time. E.g. vehicle connectivity and condition, position data, reservation and payment, registration and validation. Elasticsearch was introduced to all development teams as an offering, and as a result high quality data analysis can be generated based on systems inside status to all parts of the organization. Using DevOps methods each team is able to implement, modify and visualize data effectively. This gives a fast understanding of capacity, errors and business opportunities in real-time.

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning in the Elastic Stack (2017)
video:video.video:description: Machine learning now in beta. Register now for the upcoming webinar, overview demo, and live Q&A. Data stored in Elasticsearch contains valuable insights into the behavior and performance of your business and systems. However, questions such as "are users exfiltrating data unusually?" and "is the response time of my website unusual?" can be difficult to answer. The good news is that machine learning technologies, from the recently acquired Prelert team, can easily answer these questions. These technologies are becoming part of X-Pack and will integrate tightly into the Elastic Stack. Attend this session to learn how to apply machine learning capabilities to the Elastic Stack and what problems they will help you solve in your business.

video:video.video:title: Introduction to supervised machine learning in Elastic
video:video.video:description: Dans ce webinaire, nous allons explorer l'utilisation des transformations de donnes pour le machine learning supervis avec Elastic. Les transformations de donnes vous permettent de crer vos propres modles en se basant sur diffrents types danalyse que sont la rgression, la classification et la dtection d'anomalies nativement intgres dans la suite Elastic. La version 7.6 dElastic a introduit un nouveau moteur d'infrence grce auquel, vous pouvez dsormais tirer profit de vos modles danalyse pour enrichir vos donnes en temps rel et en continue. Il est donc maintenant possible avec la suite Elastic de construire des pipelines de machine learning supervis de bout en bout et cest ce que nous allons vous montrer aujourdhui.Vous dcouvrirez notamment:Limplmentation dun pipeline de rgressionlimplmentation dun pipeline de classificationL'utilisation du modle de dtection automatique de la langueIntgration entre Elastic et Jupyter notebooksAller plus loin :Training: Elastic Machine Learning pour la CybersecurityVidos:Introduction au Elastic Machine Learning Data frameOptimiser vos job Machine Learning avec Elasticsearch (Anglais)Web Access Logs dans Elasticsearch avec Machine Learning (Anglais)L'upload d'un fichier dans Elasticsearch l'aide de Machine Learning et Ingest Node (Anglais)Blog: Machine learning pour la cybersecurity: a ne peut qutre aussi efficace que votre implmentation (Anglais)Voulez-vous essayer vous mme? Tester les nouvelles fonctionnalits avec cet essai gratuit Elasticsearch Service.

video:video.video:title: Cisco: IoE - Using Elasticsearch to Unlock an Analytical Goldmine
video:video.video:description: The true value of IoE starts to be realized not when you connect things, but when you are best able to use the data generated by those things. Not only is the final impact of a device event important, but the ability to analyze the cascading effects felt throughout the device ecosystem and different layers of the business is paramount. The Cisco Analytics Incubation Center developed a real time, data-driven, and rules-based framework to identify these cause-effect relationships. This talk will showcase how Elasticsearch has helped make it easy to utilize IoE data in real-time, and how critical it is to do so given the flood of IoE device data expected in the future.

video:video.video:title: Small Team/Big Data: Three Devs Wrangle 45M Energy Docs at Advanced Energy Economy
video:video.video:description: Advanced Energy Economys team of three engineers uses Elastic Cloud to support a flexible and scalable, full-text search platform with 45M pages of unstructured energy policy text. Learn key lessons from a non-profit team tackling huge energy policy challenges with limited resources.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: As Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana, and Beats continue to evolve, we recently went back to the drawing board to rethink our monitoring product. This session will take you on our journey of redefining what monitoring means for the Elastic Stack, as well as explore current features and unveil some of our future roadmap.

video:video.video:title: Elastic at Paylocity: Analyzing 800GB a Day
video:video.video:description: Chicago-based SaaS provider Paylocity underwent massive growth over the past several years, and keeping track of all their logs became a real challenge. Learn how they went from poring through individual logs to indexing and analyzing over 500 million logs per day with the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Data Hero: Legends of Analytics @ Activision
video:video.video:description: Activision knows that Twitter is a critically important channel for interacting with Activision's players. Learn how they use the Elastic Stack, natural language processing, and event detection algorithms to turn Tweet streams into information that supports the operations of its games.

video:video.video:title: How Warner Bros. is Using Elastic to Solve Entertainment and Media Problems at Scale
video:video.video:description: Warner Bros. processes billions of records each day globally between its web assets, digital content distribution, OTT streaming services, online and mobile games, technical operations, anti-piracy programs, social media, and retail point of sale transactions. Despite having large MPP clusters, a significant amount of dark data remained trapped in Web Logs. In this presentation, we will discuss how Warner Bros. and Decision Lab leveraged the new Elastic Stack 5.x coupled with Apache Spark, to deliver scalable insights and new capabilities to support business needs.

video:video.video:title: Industrial production process visualization with the Elastic Stack in real-time at MM Karton
video:video.video:description: The Mayr-Melnhof Group is the worlds largest producer of coated, recycled, fiber-based cartonboard, an important manufacturer of virgin fiber-based cartonboard, and the largest producer of folding cartons in Europe and a number of countries outside Europe. Their aim is to establish the best possible standards and technologies over the long term, in all areas of the business. See how they implemented production process visualization in a highly automated and fragmented industrial, process-control environment. Hear about Industry 4.0 marketing and their real-world implementation using the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Munich 2017 - Elasticsearch Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Cross-cluster search, ingest node, rollover API, shrink API, field collapsing, unified highlighter . . . there's lots to love in Elasticsearch these days. Get up to speed on all things 5.x and see how 6.x will address pain points around scale, upgrading, recovery, and sparse data and disk usage.

video:video.video:title: Extended Custom Scripting at Groupon
video:video.video:description: To use Elastic to deliver the best, most relevant deal to every customer, Groupon's team had to extend custom scripting in a new way, allowing any developer with or without Elasticsearch know-how to write a custom scoring function to rank deals.

video:video.video:title: What's the Scoop on ES-Hadoop? Spark, Streaming & More
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch is an industry-leading solution for search and real-time analytics at scale. Apache Spark has shaped into a powerhouse for processing massive data, both in batch and streaming contexts. Elasticsearch for Apache Hadoop (ES-Hadoop) is a two-way connector that provides the tools needed to marry these two together in perfect data harmony. This talk aims to introduce the audience to the basics of ES-Hadoops native Spark Integration, touch upon the other features that the connector brings to the table (including native integrations with Hive, Storm, Pig, Cascading, and MapReduce), shed some light on the internals of how it works, as well as highlight whats to come.

video:video.video:title: Revolutionizing the Fan Experience with Search at Ticketmaster
video:video.video:description: Helping fans find the perfect seat is a top priority for Ticketmaster. It's also a considerable challenge for their data system. In this presentation, Ticketmaster will demonstrate how they use search technology to solve for the difficult problem of helping users find seats, a volatile commodity as inventory changes. They will also highlight other areas, including marketing and abuse prevention, where they are leveraging search technology to help fans get tickets to the events they want to see.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ Vimeo: Elasticsearch for...SEARCH?
video:video.video:description: Vimeo engineers Chris Simpson and Khurshid Fayzullaev discuss the unique considerations required to build a scalable search product using Elasticsearch. They will explore some specific considerations vimeo.com has encountered when designing their new soon-to-launch search service, as well as themes relating to Elasticsearch's heritage as a scalable distributed search engine using Apache Lucene.

video:video.video:title: Elastic on a Hyper-Converged Infrastructure for Operational Log Analytics
video:video.video:description: Intercontinental Hotel Group was one of the first companies to run Elastic on a hyper-converged infrastructure. Hear how they made the transition and addressed challenges that arose along the way. Then see how theyre processing more than 8 TB of data every day for operational log analytics, maintaining Kibana dashboards for more than 300 applications, and using machine learning to track transactional metrics for real-time visibility into anomalies in their environment.

video:video.video:title: Engine Scoring & Predictive Analytics to Boost Search Accuracy
video:video.video:description: With Big Data, it is possible to harvest user event data, such as search and click logs, for the purpose of computing user-based search accuracy metrics. Learn about the algorithms and processes for computing these metrics which are vital for comparing search engine accuracy before a deployment.

video:video.video:title: Kibana Visualizations Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Have you noticed Kibana has been looking mighty fine lately? Attend this session to dive deeper into Kibanas latest visualizations. Youll get a detailed walkthrough of Tagcloud and Heatmap, new visualizations in Kibana 5.2, as well as insight into where were taking visualizations next. From a roadmap perspective, well focus in particular on new geospatial visualizations we are working to bring out in 5.x. As a developer, youll also get a behind-the-scenes perspective on the evolving world of visualizations and how it may affect your custom visualization plugins. Finally, well discuss dedicated UIs for time-series visualizations, from Timelion to a new visual builder for pipeline aggregations.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring and Securing a Geo-Dispersed Data Center at Hill AFB
video:video.video:description: The HEDC provides a hosting service for more than 100 information systems supporting the USAF. However, the team at HEDC had a problem how to collect, monitor, and analyze the logs from these diverse information systems and its supporting infrastructure and provide near real-time continuous RMF compliance monitoring at the scale of a multi-tenant hosting platform. The answer: innovate to deliver logging and DoD compliance monitoring for the life-cycle of hosted information systems as an integrated service within the HEDC PaaS using Elastic Cloud Enterprise.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring Personal Customer Experiences at T-Mobile
video:video.video:description: When T-mobile launched a mobile app that delivers personalized experiences and 1:1 customer care messaging, they turned to the Elastic Stack for help monitoring speed, effectiveness, and user behavior.

video:video.video:title: Improving Customer Experience with Geo Capabilities at the UKs Biggest Property Portal
video:video.video:description: With nearly 55 million requests per day to their website, Rightmove is the UK's most visited property portal that helps connect potential renters and buyers with their next domestic investment. And they're using the Elastic Stack to deliver a quality search experience for users. Hear how Rightmove uses Elasticsearch geo capabilities to return more relevant search results for their users, how features like percolation allow them to alert users to properties they might be interested in, and how aggregations are used for reporting. Plus, see how Elasticsearch and Kibana have improved the overall developer support process for applications as they monitor 17 TB worth of log data on an ongoing basis and enabled the creation of innovative new tools like the Where I Live tool.

video:video.video:title: Improving search at Wellcome Collection
video:video.video:description: Wellcome Collection, a part of the Wellcome Trust, is a free museum and library that aims to challenge how we all think and feel about health, and to encourage people to think deeper about the connections between science, medicine, life, and art. Learn how they're improving access to their collections using the Elasticsearch Service as part of a new discovery platform that aggregates descriptive data and provides unified search, empowering researchers to make new discoveries that add meaning to our understanding of life, death, and everything in between.

video:video.video:title: Cigna Life Insurance NZ Ltds Elastic-Fantastic Journey so far
video:video.video:description: A look into the the adoption of the Elastic-stack by Cigna Life Insurance NZ as part of their Business Intelligence solution and the global impact thereof.

video:video.video:title: The Math Behind Elastic Machine Learning
video:video.video:description: Machine learning functionality is being added to our products in the form of shrink-wrapped applications. We began by focusing on time series anomaly detection, which required the ability to predict what the time series might do next. It wasn't such a large step to go from this to forecasting what the time series might do over the next day, week, or month. This capability was added in 6.2. To automate this process, an ML system needs expressive modeling, which can adapt to different data characteristics, relearn its parameters (or select a new model as things change), seamlessly deal with abnormal periods to minimize their impact on the modeling, and much more. Dig into the details of some of the modeling techniques weve used for these features and some of the key ways we have addressed these requirements. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Sustainable Harvesting: How a Few Geeks Learned to Elastic Stack Logs
video:video.video:description: How do you build a network of devices and log taps that monitor security at the worlds largest conservation non-profit? Can it be done at low budget scale across over 100 offices effectively? Can defending against attacks on a laptop in Pennsylvania help to influence river flow metric collection?Nick and Daniel have begun a journey to answer these types of questions, and would like to share how they are leveraging the Elastic Stack and other open source tools to generate, pull, and aggregate data from remote offices and better manage their security risk. Theyll also look at how a small group of geeks are working to set an example for broader data collection at their organization.

video:video.video:title: Scaling Log Aggregation at Fitbit
video:video.video:description: Over the course of their logging aggregation journey, Fitbit has scaled from 35,000 to 225,000 logs per second, increased data storage from 5 to 30 days, and upgraded from Elasticsearch 1.5.x to 5.5.x. This talk covers the challenges of scaling a log aggregation pipeline to process approximately 19 billion messages per day representing 35 TB of data and utilizing every part of the Elastic Stack, from log queuing to field mappings.Learn how Fitbit scaled their deployment and find out how their team uses extensive operational analysis to validate failures as well as enhance disaster recovery and archive the data for each part of the Elastic Stack. See how Fitbit meets the diverse business needs of internal customers from software developers to customer support personnel and how they deliver useful, cost-effective information while maintaining performance, integrity, and data security.

video:video.video:title: Contributing to Elasticsearch: How to Get Started
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch has infinitely more potential in the hands of someone who knows how it works inside. Community-contributor-turned-employee Nik Everett will help you take your first step inside. Youll learn how to run from source, debug, read stack traces, write plugins, and send pull requests.

video:video.video:title: ECS: Delivering Better Cyber Intelligence and Compliance
video:video.video:description: ECS, a leading provider of cyber systems development and integration, is using Elastic to deliver continuous monitoring and mitigation of cyber threats for agency networks. Come learn about their unique approach to cyber intelligence, why they chose to migrate from legacy government risk and compliance systems to Elastic, and what theyve learned about enterprise application development and deployment.

video:video.video:title: Cloud Updates: Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes and Road to FedRAMP
video:video.video:description: Hear updates on Elastic Cloud Enterprise, Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes, our efforts to streamline government use of Elastic in the public cloud, and the road to FedRAMP.

video:video.video:title: How to build a fast website on top of Elasticsearch and PHP by Yvann Boucher and Hamdi Laadhari (FR)
video:video.video:description: Elastic Paris Meetup - 7 dcembre 2016Chez Prisma Media, nous utilisons Elasticsearch comme stockage de documents dnormalis pour atteindre de hautes performances en page web et en API. La prsentation expose leur cas d'utilisation et montre quelques astuces concernant l'utilisation de Elasticsearch avec PHP.https://www.meetup.com/ElasticFR/events/235507243/

video:video.video:title: Using Elasticsearch to Help Generate New Insights from Census Data
video:video.video:description: The Census Bureau has large amounts of rich and complex data sets that are retrieved and used each day by the public. This data reveals insights into our economy, demographic characteristics of states, and helps communities make infrastructural decisions such as where and when to plan public transportation systems and the location of new housing. Given the criticality of Census data, a team at the Bureau has built a prototype that leverages Elasticsearch to make data more accessible and relevant to users. This talk explores our key challenges, successes, and how we used Elasticsearch to build the prototype

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Hear from the creators of the Elastic Stack on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash, new features and solutions, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ SAP Concur: Driving the Journey to DevOps and End-to-End Ownership
video:video.video:description: The world's leading provider of integrated travel and expense management services and solutions is using the Elastic Stack to provide a turnkey logging as a service solution in cloud environments across the organization. It's all part of their plan to move to a DevOps culture and cultivate end-to-end ownership.Learn how the Elastic logging service drives SAP Concurs logging, alerting, monitoring, and analytics strategy in teams across the company from dev/test engineers to site reliability engineers and executive leadership. Then see how SAP Concur centrally collects all application and system logs, why Kibana is widely used across the company, and how their site reliability teams use machine learning and alerting features to ensure services are at peak performance 24/7.

video:video.video:title: Grid Computing and Trade Analytics with Elastic
video:video.video:description: How Elastic was integrated into Excelian's grid computing stack to meet complex financial computation and data intensive processing requirements.

video:video.video:title: Geospatial Advancements in Elasticsearch and Apache Lucene
video:video.video:description: Geospatial data structures in Elasticsearch and Apache Lucene have been evolving and improving at a rapid pace. Learn how Elastic has simplified the geospatial indexing, search, and analytics use case by advancing the state of geo in Apache Lucene and Elasticsearch. From new spatial indexing strategies and performance improvements in Lucene to changes in geospatial field mappings in Elasticsearch, take a journey through the world of spatial and multi-dimensional indexing and search in the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: PSCU: Harnessing Elastic to Attack Fraud for Credit Unions
video:video.video:description: With its legacy logging solution PSCU, the United States largest credit union service organization, could only ingest a few data sources to detect insider fraud threats. That siloed data, held in spreadsheets and other tools, was difficult to comprehend. So a contractor for PSCU suggested migrating financial and credit union member activity logs into Elasticsearch for its ability to handle any amount or type of data. Learn how PSCU harnessed the Elastic Stack to block millions of dollars in fraud, as well as providing operational insights into customer contact center operations to increase success.
