video:video.video:title: Europe (Virtual) 2020: Elastic@Colruyt: Ensuring business continuity and improving efficiency
video:video.video:description: Discover how Colruyt Group, a supermarket retailer that represents 40+ brands (Spar, OKay, Bio-Planet NV, DeamLand, Collishop), ensures business continuity for more than 30,000 employees by using the Elastic Stack and Elastic Observability to monitor events and logs coming from core infrastructure and application components used by internal and external end users. With Elastic, the group reduces cost and increases productivity of the IT team, allowing them to provide excellent customer service both inside and outside the company.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch Training Preview: Understanding Multi-fields in Elasticsearch Mappings
video:video.video:description: Join our team of expert instructors and explore multi-fields, a concept discussed in the Elasticsearch Engineer I training course. Youll get a firsthand look at how to configure Elasticsearch to create multiple inverted indices for the same field by indexing a field different ways.

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} 2018 Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic CEO Shay Banon kicked off the conference with big announcements and updates on Elastic App Search, Elastic APM, SQL for Elasticsearch, the infographic-tastic Canvas, rollups in Elasticsearch, and the decision to open the code of X-Pack.

video:video.video:title: Lessons Learned from Workday's Search Application Journey from POC to Production
video:video.video:description: In 2014, the Workday team realized their Lucene-based custom search would not scale or provide world-class relevance for end users. After extensive research and prototyping, Elasticsearch came out on top as a solution.Three years later, Workday's highest-volume, most critical search use cases Recruiting - Find Jobs and Find Candidates are in production on Elasticsearch. With this change, indexing time has gone from more than 10 hours to less than a few minutes. Query results are being served in subseconds instead of timing out at the 20 minute threshold. Also, Workday has gone from lacking relevance in results to leveraging out-of-the-box relevance capabilities in Elasticsearch. Happier end users equals a happier team!

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning in the Elastic Stack (2018)
video:video.video:description: Machine learning for the Elastic Stack empowers you with simple tools to understand the behavior of your Elasticsearch data. What started with simple single- and multi-metrics anomaly detection jobs has grown into a powerful tool that automates notifications for anomalies and simplifies tasks like pre-configuring NGINX log analysis at scale. And there's more to show, including new features such as time series forecasting, which will allow you to predict system capacity and pre-empt issues, and automatic log data categorization. Learn how to apply machine learning to your Elasticsearch data and see new features in action firsthand. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Autocomplete: The Tale of the First Few Keystrokes
video:video.video:description: Autocomplete is a key feature of search applications. Good autocomplete solutions get users to the right content in a few keystrokes while bad ones frustrate and confuse. This talk will explore technical considerations in designing such systems, what Elasticsearch has to offer, and whats to come next.

video:video.video:title: The Workshop: Towards Unified Observability with Elastic APM - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: El rendimiento es algo crtico cuando los aplicaciones alcanzan picos de 100 mil peticiones por minuto, y es por eso que The Workshop utiliza Elastic APM: la instrumentacin de las aplicaciones, las visualizaciones en Kibana y las integraciones en el data warehouse para utilizar otras herramientas de BI como Tableau. Aprende cmo Elastic APM permite a The Workshop recolectar informacin de Real User Monitoring (RUM) a travs de mltiples CPDs, analizarlas de una forma centralizada para detectar y resolver cuellos de botella y solucionarlos.

video:video.video:title: Cost Transparency at Credit Suisse
video:video.video:description: Credit Suisse needed to be able to process and store more than 30 million rows of data per month, plus make that data accessible to end-users for ad-hoc analysis through a web-based interface. Today they're doing all that and more with the Elastic Stack.Learn how the team uses R to extract, transform, and enrich data from various raw data sources. Also, see how the resulting dataset is indexed in Elasticsearch and visualized in Kibana. Hear how the the team has evolved their approach and which improvements they've made with Elastic Stack updates, as well as lessons learned.

video:video.video:title: Adding Context to Queries: The Story Behind Adobes API and UI
video:video.video:description: Adobe uses Elasticsearch to power its API & UI with realtime, high-traffic business queries involving user-specific values. Marko will share the past, current, and future Elasticsearch implementation plans at Adobe which includes millions of indexes with user-specific documents of prepared responses.

video:video.video:title: Instrumenting Node.js Apps with Elastic APM
video:video.video:description: Identifying, debugging, and fixing Node.js production performance issues is difficult. Learn about Node.js instrumentation and how Elastic APM can help. See how to improve error monitoring and how to automatically instrument incoming HTTP requests, database queries, etc. We'll also cover more advanced topics like how to minimize instrumentation overhead, how to add valuable metadata to the collected metrics to ease debugging, and how to add custom watchers to instrument any part of your codebase. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Search for all with Elastic Enterprise Search
video:video.video:description: Learn how we reimagined search in the workplace so you and your team can get to the information you need quickly with a unified search experience, out-of-the-box data connectors, and simple search management interfaces. Search across documents, business data, and account information faster and more naturally than ever before. Thats enterprise search, the Elastic way.

video:video.video:title: Marketing Can Kibana
video:video.video:description: How many Tweets do we send a day? Who are our top blog authors? How frequently do we publish content with specific tags over a given period of time? The Elastic marketing team collaborates with the Elastic Infrastructure and Developer Relations teams to build out, modify, and utilize dashboards that offer insight into content and community engagement.Hear how the mere mortals of the marketing team derive value from the Elastic Stack by creating and exploring visualizations in Kibana.

video:video.video:title: Countering Threats with the Elastic Stack at CERDEC/ARL
video:video.video:description: The CERDEC/ARL CSSP (Cyber Security Service Provider) performs network and system monitoring for DoD entities. We leverage the Elastic Stack to efficiently navigate our data and gain critical insights into activities and trends among the networks we cover. The open nature of the APIs in the Elastic Stack gives us easy access to our data so that we can perform analysis and enable research into new methods of protecting our nation's defenses. The intuitive and extendable interfaces allow our analysts to visualize and share data supporting better collaboration and investigative capabilities.

video:video.video:title: US Geological Survey: Tectonic Shifts, Tweets, & Tactical Data Analysis
video:video.video:description: The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) operates a real-time system that detects earthquakes using only tweets. The main benefit of the tweet-based detections is speed, with most detections occurring between 20 and 120 seconds after the origin time. This timeframe is significantly faster than seismically-derived detections in poorly instrumented regions of the world. This talk will present a technical overview of the Elasticsearch and Kibana-based system and describe the potential for rapid characterization of earthquake damage via the added real-time search and visualization tools combined with analysis of the 32 million 'earthquake' tweets the system has so far amassed.

video:video.video:title: How REA Group Uses Elasticsearch to Power Real Estate Searches
video:video.video:description: REA Group's realestate.com.au has been slowly migrating its search function to Elasticsearch. Its millions of listings, plus millions of sales histories and thousands of realtors and agencies, mean thousands of updates at once and more than 100 queries per second.

video:video.video:title: Kubernetes, Docker, and Containers at Elastic: Monitoring, Logging, and More
video:video.video:description: Tasks such as log collection and metrics aggregation can be daunting within Kubernetes and Docker deployments. Fortunately, the Elastic Stack provides effective methods to collect and store a wide variety of operational data to simplify these and similar problems.Learn how leveraging the latest features in Beats (including add metadata processors, modules, and new autodiscovery features), Elasticsearch, and Kibana can make managing containerized, scheduled, and otherwise automated environments a great experience.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ NEHGS
video:video.video:description: AmericanAncestors.org provides one of the leading online genealogical research sites in the industry. They offer users real-time search and access across more than 1.4 billion names to their 250,000 members around the world. Learn how the team at the New England Historic Genealogical Society have evolved from a very early on-premise Elastic implementation to taking full advantage of Elasticsearch Service. Hear about the challenges they encountered and design changes they made to maximize performance, as well as how they leveraged the skills of the Elastic support team to deliver a highly scalable service with minimal overhead.

video:video.video:title: Let's Talk Windows & Azure
video:video.video:description: If youre using Elasticsearch on Windows or Azure, this session is a must-attend. Our .NET team will demo our Azure Marketplace offering & give a sneak preview of the MSI-based installer. In closing we'll give an overview of everything new in NEST and Elasticsearch.NET 2.0, the official .NET clients.

video:video.video:title: eDreams - Powering Security Monitoring with the Elastic Stack - Madrid 2020
video:video.video:description: Si conoces al enemigo y te conoces a ti, no debes temer el resultado de cientos de batallas. Este es un dicho que el equipo de seguridad de eDreams, una agencia de viajes en lnea, decidi seguir al redisear su estrategia de ciberseguridad. La prioridad del equipo era mantener una comprensin y visin general claras de sus sistemas, en vez de limitarse a aplicar estrategias de seguridad genricas o basadas en elementos de cumplimiento normativo. Descubre cmo utilizan Elastic Stack para obtener informacin sobre los usuarios, y cmo estn implementando Elastic SIEM y el Machine Learning para agilizar la supervisin de la seguridad.

video:video.video:title: Advancing Earth Science with Elasticsearch at Terradue
video:video.video:description: Terradue's mission is to make Earth Science move forward. The company develops and operates large cloud solutions for indexing, querying, accessing, and processing millions of data from Earth Observation satellites, and utilizes Elasticsearch to empower users to expound it. In this talk, Emmanuel will highlight how Terradue uses Elasticsearch in conjunction with the Elasticsearch.Net client to tackle scientific challenges in several domains, such as geohazards for rapid response monitoring of volcanoes or earthquakes, hydrology by mapping flood extent, and urban by detecting settlement footprint.

video:video.video:title: Monitorizacin del rendimiento y de la seguridad con Elastic - El caso de Orange Espaa
video:video.video:description: Orange Espaa presentar dos proyectos que confan en Elastic Stack para cubrir sus necesidades de monitorizacin. BENDER es un sistema de gestin del rendimiento que permite recoger todos los KPIs y las mtricas de la red en un mismo lugar, utilizando la funcionalidad de Machine Learning para predecir comportamientos anmalos. ZHT (Zero Human Touch) es una herramienta de ciberseguridad que permite la deteccin preventiva de eventos, chequeos y escalados automticos.

video:video.video:title: Supporting DevOps: From Dev to Cloud to Delivery to Logging
video:video.video:description: Walmart Labs Sr. Director Brian Johnson and Avalon Consulting's Chad Chatfield discuss DevOps with Elastic at Elastic{ON} 2016 in San Francisco, February 18, 2016.

video:video.video:title: Goldman Sachs (with Japanese subtitles)
video:video.video:description: ElasticsearchElasticsearch

video:video.video:title: Securing Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Elastic's Jay Modi and Igor Motov discuss securing Elasticsearch at Elastic{ON}16 in San Francisco, February 18, 2016.

video:video.video:title: Europe (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Stack Roadmap Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: Learn about features with demos and announcements, from cross-cluster replication and frozen indices in Elasticsearch to Kibana Spaces and the ever-growing set of data integrations in Beats and Logstash.

video:video.video:title: Between Two Ferns with CSG International
video:video.video:description: Marty Messer, Elastic VP of Customer Care, sits down with Geoff Preston, VP of Development and Operations at CSG International, for a fireside chat about the evolution of search and analytics at CSG International and how Elastic solutions have helped Geoff's team go from simply analyzing key information about customers to having content and analysis readily available (24/7/365) to meet all transactional needs for customers across their portfolio.

video:video.video:title: Europe (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Learn how we reimagined search in the workplace so you can get to the information you need quickly with a unified search experience, out-of-the-box data connectors, and simple search management interfaces.

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Kibana (French)
video:video.video:description: Obtenez un aperu des nouvelles visualisations et mises jours de Kibana dont time series visual builder, heatmaps, Timelion, tag clouds, Watcher UI, et les alertes sur les clusters. Nous vous montrerons galement ce qui se prpare dans la version 6.x.

video:video.video:title: Data Intelligence with the Elastic Stack @ Scale: NVIDIA's User Experience Streaming Analytics
video:video.video:description: NVIDIA collects metrics for every frame streamed, every second spent on GeForce NOW, its streaming video game platform, using the Elastic Stack enabling business, engineering, operations, and quality assurance teams to assess quality and debug issues in real time.In this talk, Satish and Niranjan will provide an overview of the GeForce NOW data platform, built on Kafka, Spark, the Elastic Stack, and X-Pack, which handles billions of events every day, as well as give a demo-driven walk-through of their two main use cases: analyzing and enhancing user experience metrics for pre- & post- product launches, and visual logging providing automated {log}-to-dashboard functionality.

video:video.video:title: Panel de Discussion avec AXA
video:video.video:description: AXA utilise Elasticsearch pour mettre jour et enrichir les donnes de son "data lake" tout en facilitant leur visualisation et leur utilisation pour ses utilisateurs finaux.

video:video.video:title: Kibana l'efficience PSA
video:video.video:description: Kibana, lfficience chez PSA: de la centralisation des logs applicatifs, lamlioration de la qualit de services des sites web B2C vers lamlioration de la qualit des processus et des vhicules.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch SQL Deep Dive Session
video:video.video:description: Get an in-depth walkthrough of how to use Elasticsearch SQL, a SQL-based query DSL that will help you open the door to new data and new Elasticsearch users in your organization.

video:video.video:title: How to Build Your Own Kibana Plugins
video:video.video:description: Meet the Kibana of the future. Its the Kibana you know and love, but with extension points for you to add your own, custom functionality. In this talk Tanya and Spencer from the Kibana team will walk you through building your first Kibana plugin.

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Cloud and FedRAMP
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch Service on Elastic Cloud is a simple, secure, and fast way to deploy enterprise search, security, and observability solutions. Learn how to get started in our new GovCloud region in a live demo, hear about our In Process FedRAMP designation, and get updates on the journey to authorization to operate.

video:video.video:title: "Here, Hold My Beer." Customer Stories to Learn from As Told by Support
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch gives you so many different options and configurations to support a variety of use cases. However, just because you can tweak so many settings within Elasticsearch, doesn't mean you should.Members of the Elastic support team discuss the top three common customer mistakes and misconfigurations along with best practices and recommendations so you can avoid those issues yourself.

video:video.video:title: Node Discovery in Cloud Environment (FR)
video:video.video:description: Dans Elasticsearch , il y a Elastic . Dmarrer des nouveaux noeuds pour augmenter la capacit du cluster est trs simple avec le mode multicast par dfaut.Les plates-formes cloud interdisent videmment le multicast. Aussi, comment garder cette lasticit simple en environnement cloud ?Venez dcouvrir ce qui se cache derrire les plugins cloud pour Amazon, Google et bien sr Azure !

video:video.video:title: On Distributed Systems and Distributed Teams
video:video.video:description: A wall clock that ran backward and a skull and crossbones flag. Fictional parliamentary systems of ancient civilizations. @all threads that run into the several hundred replies. All are interesting stories and illustrate concepts that make Elastic...elastic?The distributed systems movement, and open source more broadly, is fueled by solving a series of complex problems: consensus, leader election, failure semantics, among others. Our reasoning about distributed concepts influences system design and implementation. Our understanding impacts that which we build...particularly when we build distributed companies. How does a distributed team building distributed systems, at Elastic, function?

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020: Customer Success Case Rappi, a Latin America Unicorn
video:video.video:description: Venha conhecer como a empresa fundada em 2015 na Colmbia, se tornou a plataforma lder em entregas sob demanda na Amrica Latina. medida que a Rappi se expandia de uma cidade para outra e de pas para pas, era essencial que eles prestassem o melhor servio ao pblico consumidor para fideliz-lo. Vejam como eles alcanaram essa excelncia utilizando as solues da Elastic & Semantix.

video:video.video:title: Customer Story(Devsisters): Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: , , . Elastic Stack . , Filebeat Kubernetes AWS EC2 , Elasticsearch , , .

video:video.video:title: Security @ Slack
video:video.video:description: Monitoring for malicious activity and handling the resulting alerts is vital to the success of a defensive security program. Powerful, centralized logging is available to all of us, but it is only useful if we understand and take action on the data collected. This talk will discuss tools everyone should consider using to monitor their infrastructure, including Elasticsearch, and the process by which users can create a reliable logging pipeline to handle data from thousands of hosts. Ryan and Nate will demonstrate how to scale these efforts by integrating security into a communication platform that helps users look at more data by delegating event management to the affected individuals directly.

video:video.video:title: Powering Uber Marketplaces Real-Time Data Needs with Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch plays a key role in Ubers Marketplace Dynamics core data system, aggregating business metrics to control critical marketplace behaviors like dynamic (surge) pricing, supply positioning, and assess overall marketplace diagnostics all in real time. In this talk, Jae and Isaac will share how Uber uses Elasticsearch to support multiple use cases at the company, handling more than 1,000 QPS at peak. They will not only address why they ultimately chose Elasticsearch, but will also delve into key technical challenges theyre solving, such as how to model Ubers marketplace data to express aggregated metrics efficiently, and how to run multiple layers of Elasticsearch clusters depending on criticality, among others.

video:video.video:title: Dive Deep with Logstash From Pipelines to Persistent Queues
video:video.video:description: Last year at Elastic{ON} you heard about whats coming in Logstash. Core developers Andrew and Colin have been busy making this future a reality. Come see them demonstrate the work theyve done so far to make Logstash more resilient and even easier to use!

video:video.video:title: TAP(ping) Out Security Threats at FireEye
video:video.video:description: FireEye's Threat Analytics Platform (TAP) leverages Elasticsearch to index hundreds of thousands of events per second and maintain more than a petabyte of data. Learn what the security hunting use case is and how FireEye built a platform to allow its enterprise customers to find evil in their organizations.

video:video.video:title: Zero Latency: Building a Telemetry Platform on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Zero Latency is focused on creating the greatest free-roam, multiplayer, virtual reality experiences in the world. In ZeroLatency games, players are isolated from the real world and are fully immersed in a virtual experience. With 45 venues around the world, ZeroLatency needs to constantly monitor their systems to detect potential problems that prevent players from having the immersive, uninterrupted experience they desire. ZeroLatency chose the Elastic Stack for their telemetry platform to collect real-time logs, metrics, and analytics data from their systems to reduce performance issue. Learn how they did it.

video:video.video:title: Detecting Insider Threats with Elastic
video:video.video:description: RedOwl combines sentiment analysis with user behavioral analytics to detect unwanted behavior within the enterprise, and Elasticsearch is at the heart of all of it. We'll talk architecture, data modeling, and aggregations in a brief overview of some of our applications's core functions

video:video.video:title: Installing the Flux Capacitor: Search at the Internet Archive
video:video.video:description: The Internet Archives Wayback Machine has collections that range in size from billions of archived web pages, to millions of scanned books, down to 10,000 quite-popular Grateful Dead concert recordings. See how Elasticsearch glues everything together and hear some lessons learned along the way.

video:video.video:title: Mozilla: Tackling Security Logs with the ELK Stack
video:video.video:description: From the brains behind MozDef: The Mozilla Defense Platform, this talk will focus on their SIEM overlay on top of Elasticsearch. Highlight will include security incident response, alerting, and operations integrations.

video:video.video:title: Ballerina
video:video.video:description: How do you take lessons from ballet and performance into distributed systems, and how do you take lessons from distributed systems into biometric and kinetic sensing wearables? We are going to explore the ballet performance from the keynote from a technological point of view. Issac Kelly will be presenting how we did it and why it works. A team of experts started with an idea, lots of off-the-shelf sensors, and open source code.

video:video.video:title: Observabilidad Global en Entel Per con Elastic
video:video.video:description: Al transformar las operaciones de TI impulsadas por Elastic Stack, Entel tiene ahora la capacidad de aumentar su ingesta de datos y proporcionar una visibilidad 24/7 de los servicios crticos para los equipos de tecnologa y de negocio en Chile y Per. Conoce cmo Entel construy un sistema de clase mundial para fomentar la transformacin digital y cmo viene trasladando toda su infraestructura a Elastic Cloud.

video:video.video:title: Managing the Elastic Stack in Production
video:video.video:description: There are many things to consider and many tools and techniques at your disposal when you begin running and managing the Elastic Stack in production. This talk will highlight new management features of Kibana and cover the most important elements for running and managing the Elastic Stack in production.We'll walk the new administrator through key questions, like how to plan for long-term retention and how to know when it's time to add more nodes. You'll also learn how to use monitoring to proactively detect issues with your cluster and identify the root causes. Plus, see how you can use alerting to notify you if there are issues with specific data sources or if your users change their usage patterns.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch SQL
video:video.video:description: If you (or others you know) are versed in SQL statements and newer to the Elasticsearch query syntax but want to benefit from the power Elasticsearch, this is the talk for you. After making its debut at last year's conference, Elasticsearch SQL is a project designed to bridge these two worlds. From converting SQL statements into Elasticsearch queries to a console experience for exploring data using "SELECT x FROM y WHERE z > 1000" type queries, there's a lot on the horizon.Join Costin to get the full rundown on where we are one year later.

video:video.video:title: The State of Geo in Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Data structures that enable geospatial indexing and search, field mapping strategies, geo aggregations for spatial data analysis this talk has everything you need to know about the latest geo capabilities in Elasticsearch and Apache Lucene.

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: GA'ed in 5.5, machine learning can uncover insights from your data automatically. This session walks you through using the Elastic Stack to ingest, enrich, visualize, analyze, and alert on NGINX logs to detect and eventually predict anomalies in your data.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Stack (ELK)
video:video.video:description: Elastic

video:video.video:title: Improved Text Scoring with BM25
video:video.video:description: Today the default scoring algorithm in Elasticsearch is TF/IDF. This default will change to BM25 once Elasticsearch switches to Lucene 6. In this talk, Britta will tell you all about BM25 what it is, how it differs from TF/IDF and other scoring techniques, and why it might be the better default going forward.

video:video.video:title: All About Elasticsearch Algorithms and Data Structures
video:video.video:description: Fast search usually boils down to data organization, which is why Elasticsearch is based on an inverted index. But sometimes speed comes from clever algorithms. Last year we looked at four such algorithms, but there are dozens more. In this talk we'll explore a new set of interesting algorithms in Elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Architectural Best Practices to Master + Pitfalls to Avoid
video:video.video:description: Scale with confidence. From deploying a small dev cluster for app search to managing a prod deployment of hundreds of nodes, our Elastic experts have seen it all and theyre sharing everything you need to know.

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ General Mills: The Journey Continues
video:video.video:description: The journey of Elastic at General Mills began as they replaced the public-facing, Endeca-based search and service-oriented architecture on their various core website properties, including Pillsbury.com, BettyCrocker.com, BoxTops for Education, Tablespoon.com, and the bilingual QueRicaVida.com, with Elasticsearch. The adventure continues now with using those successes and lessons learned to expand their Elastic use cases in order to move away from a relational database model to a flexible, document-based model across their data. This talk will cover all the tasty details behind that delicious journey.

video:video.video:title: Testcontainers pour de vrais tests d'intgration d'Elasticsearch (French)
video:video.video:description:
Les tests d'intgration peuvent devenir un cauchemar lorsqu'ils sont lancs depuis la mme JVM que votre code: Conflit de JARs (JAR Hell)
Security Manager
Effets de bord
De plus, tester avec un produit qui est lanc de faon diffrente de la faon dont il est lanc en production, ne garantira jamais que les tests d'intgration sont sincres. Aussi, aprs avoir dcouvert le projet TestContainers (https://www.testcontainers.org/) qui lance des conteneurs Docker, j'ai dcid d'crire une implmentation pour Elasticsearch: https://github.com/dadoonet/testcontainers-java-module-elasticsearch.

video:video.video:title: Orchestration de clusters Elasticsearch avec Elastic Cloud Enterprise (French)
video:video.video:description: Apprenez comment facilement dployer et grer des clusters Elasticsearch scuriss lchelle et sur linfrastructure de votre choix en utilisant Elastic Cloud Enterprise (ECE).

video:video.video:title: The Evolution of (Elastic)Search at Yelp
video:video.video:description: There was a time when Yelp was a local search company with one search engine and a single 'search' team. Now, Yelp has hundreds of search applications that rely on tens of search clusters run by tens of teams. Whether we use it for real time full text searches, or offline batch analysis jobs, Elasticsearch remains fundamental to the way Yelp scales search. In this talk, we will tell you the story of this transformation, highlighting the reason we chose Elasticsearch, the infrastructure we have built around Elasticsearch, and some of the applications that our engineers are using our search platform to achieve.

video:video.video:title: Partner Story(Funzin): IPTV Set-Top Box
video:video.video:description: IPTV Set-Top Box VOD , VOD , , , , 1 1 document , /VOD , , VOD , Set-Top Box elastic .

video:video.video:title: Hewlett Packard: elastic-Recheck Yourself Before You Wreck Yourself: How Elasticsearch Helps OpenStack QA
video:video.video:description: The OpenStack QA team uses the ELK stack for their test failure aggregation and classification system, elastic-recheck. This talk will cover the history of the elastic-recheck system and how it's been refined and grown to include other organizations seeking to use similar solutions for their own QA systems.

video:video.video:title: ElasticIT
video:video.video:description: ITSIEMIT20152018ElasticITSIEM

video:video.video:title: Timelion: Magic, Math, and Everything in the Middle
video:video.video:description: Timelion is a simple expression-based pluggable time series interface for everything. Whether you're brand new to Timelion, or have been using it since day 0, you'll learn something new in this session. Rashid will go over Timelion's expression syntax including data sources, chaining, and grouping, and then apply those concepts, along with a few neat tricks, to some real data.He'll also cover multiple manners of munging data and get into the methods Timelion uses to automatically fit abnormal sources, allowing you to compare and combine sparse and incomplete datasets. Finally, we'll take a brief look at plugins and how you can extend Timelion to do so much more.

video:video.video:title: Ingest Node: Enriching Documents within Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: When ingesting data into Elasticsearch, sometimes only simple transforms need to be performed on the data prior to indexing. Enter Ingest Node: a new node type that will allow you to do just that! This talk will introduce you to Ingest Node and how to integrate it with the rest of the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Browse Raw Logs in One Place: Open Source Plug-in for Kibana
video:video.video:description: Kibana lets you visualize your Elasticsearch log data, but being able to effectively browse, scroll, and sift through the raw log files is critical for IT teams and developers to identify errors, perform root cause analysis, and troubleshoot. A new open source Kibana plug-in from Search Technologies lets you do just this. Originally created for one of the United States largest retailers, Paul Nelson will discuss and demo the advantage of this open source plug-in that improves security and performance, and enables log browsing across multiple machines in a single view.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch Consensus: The Past, the Present, and the Future
video:video.video:description: Take a journey through the evolution of consensus within the distributed system we call Elasticsearch. See the overarching strategy over the years and learn how (and why) the Elasticsearch team improved things iteratively while still shipping software.We'll backtrack to the 0.90 days and explain the challenges we were facing. Then we'll discuss the big 1.4 improvements to ZenDiscovery and choosing our current strategy to be open to our users with the resiliency page. We'll also explain why we chose working on our high throughput data replication first (seq# ftw) and provide a glimpse into the future as well as the current ZenDiscovery rewrite. Learn about the effort that went into this area, get insights into our thought process, and see how were continuing to increase user confidence in our future as a primary datastore.

video:video.video:title: Partner Story(DIREA):
video:video.video:description: . . (FEP, MCI, EAI, ESB) . , . ? . .

video:video.video:title: Making Journalism Better With Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: The Guardian uses Elastic in projects delivering better journalism experiences: Content API; real-time analytics; and rapid photo search.

video:video.video:title: The ELK & The Eagle: Search & Analytics for the US Government
video:video.video:description: An ELK Journey in Two Parts. In the first act, the story will highlight how they built a search engine to power 1,500 government websites. The second act is all about analytics or put another way where the search engine leaves off...at the logs. Loren will discuss how they migrated their entire Hadoop & MySQL-based data warehouse to ELK. Come hear the stories and find out how they were able to replace the complicated batch pipeline with a near-real-time system that is intuitive to use for exploration, discovery, reporting, and visualization.

video:video.video:title: Europe (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security provides global data threat prevention, collection, detection, and response. Learn how to outpace the adversaries with multi-layered technology, see live demos, and get answers to all your questions.

video:video.video:title: Conhea fundo o Machine Learning
video:video.video:description: Veja previses de sries de tempo e categorizao de dados de registro automtica em ao. Os recursos de Machine Learning da Elastic se transformaram em uma ferramenta poderosa que automatiza as notificaes de anomalias e simplifica tarefas como pr-configurao de anlise de registros NGINX em escala. Saiba como coloc-lo para trabalhar com os seus dados.

video:video.video:title: Powering Real-Time Search at Microsoft
video:video.video:description: Pablo Castro, Director of Engineering at Microsoft, shares how Microsoft is leveraging Elasticsearch to power search and analytics across various products, including MSN, Microsoft Social Listening, and Azure Search.

video:video.video:title: Cas d'usage Elasticsearch chez BlablaCar - Paris Meetup September 2014 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Nicolas et Olivier vont parler du parcours technique de la socit BlaBlaCar qui a confi toute sa recherche ElasticSearch, de la version 0.19.12 avec un index et 2 noeuds, la version 1.3.1 avec 6 index et 5 noeuds.

video:video.video:title: From Raw Data to Critical Decisions: Analyzing Data with Kibana
video:video.video:description: You might have used the Elastic Stack to derive insights from your log data or perhaps "you know, for search." But it is also a wonderful data analytics platform. See a showcase of Elastic Stack data analytics capabilities by exploring and analyzing real-world data with time and space components. Learn how to bring in tabular data using Logstash, set up Kibana to query and explore the data, and use Kibana visualizations and dashboards to make meaningful presentations. Youll also see how to use X-Pack to enhance the default capabilities of the Elastic Stack by generating reports, detecting anomalies in the data, and securing enterprise deployments. Download presentation slides.
ElasticsearchKibana

video:video.video:title: Building a Firm Wide Single Task List
video:video.video:description: Stephen Coster explains how Elastic is used by Goldman Sachs to distribute and aggregate tasks for the whole banking and investment firm.

video:video.video:title: The Digital Transformation for Argos Search and Browse
video:video.video:description: Argos, one of the UK's leading digital retailers, serves millions of customers and boasts a catalogue of more than 70,000 products. In the past 18 months they have transitioned from a WebSphere Commerce + Solr monolith environment to an Elasticsearch-powered microservice-based infrastructure. This change improved search relevancy and performance, provided new features, and led to higher customer satisfaction. Find out how they were able to get through Black Friday 2016 with zero downtime across search and how their plans to beat that achievement in 2017 turned out. Plus see how Elasticsearch helps them deliver a consistent search experience across all channels. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Learn how Elasticsearch efficiently combines data in a single store and how Kibana is used to analyze it. Plus, see how recent developments help identify, troubleshoot, and resolve operational issues faster.

video:video.video:title: Inside Elastic Engineering
video:video.video:description: Get insights and ask questions about the ever-evolving journey of Elastic engineering. This talk will cover what changed as we grew from 15 to 150+, how we operate as a global distributed team and communicate effectively, as well as what guides us in developing the software you know and (hopefully) love.

video:video.video:title: What's Evolving in Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: 2,236 pull requests by 333 committers that's what it took to go from 5.0 to 6.0. Built on top of Lucene 7.0, the latest version of Elasticsearch includes faster restarts with sequence IDs, support for sparse data, and index sorting, with many new features still to come. Learn where the Elasticsearch roadmap is headed with new features and prepare for what's next.

video:video.video:title: Graph Capabilities in the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: If you've ever wanted to provide recommendations or identify the behavior of malicious actors, this is the session for you. Come learn about how Elasticsearch can power graph exploration at scale by collecting signals like clicks or purchases to identify meaningful connections between subjects on-the-fly.

video:video.video:title: Security Analytics Webinar French Episode 2
video:video.video:description:
Avant d'analyser, apprenons centraliser des donnes trafic rseau, vnements systme, logs applicatifs en les enrichissant qualitativement dinformations de scurit ! Nous verrons lutilit de capter et normaliser les informations du SI des fins de Security Analytics, en particulier lusage complmentaire des logs et autres donnes permettant dinvestiguer en partant des anomalies dtectes. L'enrichissement qualitatif de ces informations avec des bases de connaissance externes (type threat intelligence), signatures d'IDS, AD, CMDB et autres permet ainsi un classement en amont des activits suspicieuses Durant ce webinar, nous apprendrons :
Quelles donnes capturer et comment les capter : usage des Beats et modules ad hoc. Comment enrichir les donnes avec Logstash, en combinant les plugins internes et sources externes. Comment utiliser le schma de donnes Elastic (ECS) pour partager les modules dingestion, visualisations ou jobs de Machine LearningBonne nouvelle ! Les principales fonctionnalits de scurit de la Suite Elastic sont dsormais gratuites. En savoir plus. Elastic SIEM : dcouvrez un nouvel ensemble d'intgration de donnes pour les cas d'usage en scurit. Avec notre nouvelle application ddie sur Kibana, les professionnels de la scurit peuvent plus efficacement analyser et trier les flux provenant de serveurs communs ainsi que ceux provenant du rseaux de scurit. Essayez notre nouvel outil.

video:video.video:title: Security Analytics Webinar French Episode 1
video:video.video:description:
Dcouvrez comment utiliser Elastic et ses fonctionnalits danalytique avances pour construire une plateforme de Security Analytics pouvant rpondre vos exigences de volumtrie et de rapidit dinvestigation. Aprs un bref rappel des composants de la Suite Elastic, nous montrerons des cas concrets de dtection dattaque comme laspiration robotise (scraping), lexfiltration de donnes, le scan de ports ou encore llvation de privilges.  En combinant un ensemble doutils - de la capture rseau la modlisation applicative comportementale, nous illustrerons les fonctionnalits qui font de la Suite Elastic le choix dorganisations comme Slack, Vente Prive ou USAA. Ce webinar vous montrera :
Pourquoi Elastic est une solution idale pour raliser des analyses de scurit, par ses qualits de rapidit et danalytique. Comment concrtement mettre en oeuvre Elastic dans le primtre de votre infrastructure au travers dexemples darchitecture type. Comment utiliser Elastic en remplacement ou en complment dun SIEM traditionnel. Ceci est le premier pisode dans une srie de trois sur L'Analyse de Scurit avec Elasticsearch, voir les prochains pisodes :
Episode 2 Episode 3 Bonne nouvelle ! Les principales fonctionnalits de scurit de la Suite Elastic sont dsormais gratuites. En savoir plus. Elastic SIEM : dcouvrez un nouvel ensemble d'intgration de donnes pour les cas d'usage en scurit. Avec notre nouvelle application ddie sur Kibana, les professionnels de la scurit peuvent plus efficacement analyser et trier les flux provenant de serveurs communs ainsi que ceux provenant du rseaux de scurit. Essayez notre nouvel outil.

video:video.video:title: Performance Monitoring with the ELK Stack: collectd
video:video.video:description: Logstash isn't just for logs! Did you know that Logstash can translate all kind of data into metrics you can use to monitor and track system performance? One of these plugins allows Logstash to collect data from collectd. collectd is a metric collecting and delivery program with dozens of plugins which range from Apache to ZFS, databases, hardware performance metrics and so much more.Learn how Logstash can help you start to keep track of your performance metric data!

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Machine Learning Deep Dive
video:video.video:description: 5.5Machine LearningNGINXElastic Stack

video:video.video:title: Powering Postbank Groups Data-driven Strategy
video:video.video:description: Postbank Systems is a full-service IT provider that centrally bundles the IT expertise of the Postbank Group. They offer stable, secure, and high-quality IT systems and services that are the backbone of the Group. Postbank Systems uses the Elastic Stack to power Big Data opportunities and support the bank in their effort to adopt a scalable, data-driven approach. See how the Elastic Stack enables Postbank Systems to drive the digital transformation  from monitoring bank branches and ATMs and creating an antifraud system, to ensuring that the Postbank Group is GDPR compliant.

video:video.video:title: Tokyo 2017: Elasticsearch Deep Dive (Japanese)
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch 5.x6.x

video:video.video:title: Elastic{ON} Tour New York Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Elastic CEO Shay Banon kicked off the conference with big announcements and updates on Elastic App Search, Elastic APM, SQL for Elasticsearch, the infographic-tastic Canvas, rollups in Elasticsearch, and the decision to open the code of X-Pack.

video:video.video:title: Elasticon 2018 Roadmap Recap
video:video.video:description:
Elastic{ON} 2018, la confrence utilisateurs Elasticsearch officielle, vient de se terminer et vous avez peut tre dj entendu parler de nos nombreuses annonces produits et roadmaps, ainsi que des avancements de machine learning, APM, site search et plus encore. Ce webinar vous donnera un aperu des faits saillants de la confrence et vous permettra de poser toutes vos questions nos experts. Les sujets abords seront :
Elasticsearch : Configuration de tche priodiques qui roll-up ou pr-agrgent les donnes stockes dans un index et le rendent disponible la recherche. Kibana : Nouvelles visualisations avec Canvas et amlioration des capacits de golocalisation pour intgrer les cartes dans vos tableaux de bord. APM : Suivre et optimiser la performance de vos applications. Elastic Cloud et Elastic Cloud Enterprise : Flexibilit augmente dans lhbergement et la gestion des clusters Ouverture du code de X-Pack : Comprendre pourquoi et comment nous rendons le code de X-Pack public.

video:video.video:title: NASA: Unlocking Interplanetary Datasets with Real-Time Search
video:video.video:description: JPL is using Elasticsearch in many areas of its business and currently have two main areas they would like to show. One application is flight telemetry and system dashboards from Curiosity and SMAP. The application takes production data and gives an easy way for engineers to monitor and measure instruments given back from our spacecraft. The other application is one that affects all employees at JPL as Elasticsearch now powers JPL's internal search engine including a powerful video and people search.

video:video.video:title: Tsunamis, Drones, Refugee Camps and STACK (French)
video:video.video:description:
Prsentation des utilisations de STACK par LONG HAND (Hackers Against Natural Disasters).
Contrle de lespace arien et archivage des trajectoires de drones automatiss. Optimisation et monitoring de la distribution deau dans le camp de rfugies de Zaatari en Jordanie.

video:video.video:title: What's Cooking in Kibana? (2017)
video:video.video:description: Much has happened in Kibana since 5.0, as we've doubled down on new stack management and data visualization capabilities like never before.Court and Jim will go through some rad features that have been released since 5.0, and will then highlight some of the most exciting changes that will be shipping in upcoming releases.Heatmap, log context, pipeline aggregations, CSV export . . . and that's just the start!

video:video.video:title: Elastic @ Adobe: Making Search Smarter with Machine Learning at Scale
video:video.video:description: Hear how Adobe scales, manages multiple use cases, and puts machine learning features to work with Elastic. Learn about extensions to Elasticsearch that allow them to search at scale and see how these extensions have allowed the teams at Adobe to support novel applications like multi-image similarity, semantic querying, face similarity, visual clustering, auto tagging, and more. Plus, hear how they migrated away from Amazon's Elasticsearch Service to a self-managed Elasticsearch cluster for Adobe Lightroom.

video:video.video:title: Deep Learning & Accelerating the NLP Journey in the Unstructured World at Credit Suisse
video:video.video:description: Credit Suisse is looking for a needle in a haystack, and they're using the Elastic Stack to find it. Their deep learning solution is used in the eCommunications surveillance space, operates in the unstructured data space, and leverages GPU technology. The underlying data platform is built on Elastic.Hear how the Credit Suisse team is leveraging cutting-edge natural language processing (NLP) techniques to surface potential malicious activity by reducing noise and false positives. You'll also see how they're using this deep learning solution to provide emotional and sentiment context.

video:video.video:title: Elastic as a Fundamental Core to Pfizers Scientific Data Cloud
video:video.video:description: In 2015, Pfizer Digital began building out a data lake called the Scientific Data Cloud (SDC). Earlier implementations of this were strictly Hadoop-based, but indexing content in the lake became a necessity, requiring other solutions. Pfizer turned to Elastic, which quickly became a key part of their infrastructure. Hear Kimberly Butler and Jim Silva discuss how Pfizer Digital uses Elastic in a good manufacturing practice (GMP) environment for indexing, audit reporting, and near real-time metric dashboarding, and how the Elastic Stack has become an integral part of the data lake solution at Pfizer.

video:video.video:title: Small, Medium, or Large: Evolve Your Elastic Stack to Fit
video:video.video:description: The few thousands operations per second indexing requirement has changed to few millions; the single use case has grown to multiple; the one user group has become tens of user groups. In this talk, Sherry will take you through the Elastic Stack topologies from small to large to meet your evolving use case(s). She will examine deployment patterns for projects of various sizes, using Beats, Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash, X-Pack, and others.

video:video.video:title: Managing Elasticsearch Clusters with Elastic Cloud Enterprise (Korean)
video:video.video:description: Learn how to easily deploy and manage secure Elasticsearch clusters at scale and on the infrastructure of your choice using Elastic Cloud Enterprise.

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning Deep Dive Session
video:video.video:description: Complex, fast-moving datasets make it nearly impossible to spot infrastructure problems, intruders, or business issues as they happen. See how machine learning can uncover insights from your data, all by itself.

video:video.video:title: Partner Story(Megazone): DeepDive
video:video.video:description: Elastic Audit, ES-Hadoop ,Watcher Trigger , .

video:video.video:title: Writing Logstash Plugins in the 5.X Era
video:video.video:description: Learn how to write plugins for Logstash and what goodies the 5.X version line will bring to the plugin developer. Joo will cover the basics, as well as how to write a Java-based plugin, how to instrument your plugin with metrics, and more!

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning: Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: X-PackMachine Learning

video:video.video:title: Get the Lay of the Lucene Land (2017)
video:video.video:description: In spite of being close to 20 years old, the Lucene project keeps innovating. While the project was initially focused on full-text search, recent releases expanded its scope, most notably with doc values which made Lucene a competitive engine to run analytics, and multi-dimensional points which made Lucene better at handling structured data. In this session, Adrien will share the stories between the latest features in Lucene 6, how they impacted Elasticsearch, as well as what to expect in Lucene 7.

video:video.video:title: Opening Keynote 2018
video:video.video:description: Hear the Elastic vision for new products, features, solutions, and deployment options straight from Elasticsearch creator Shay Banon.

video:video.video:title: The Quick Starter Stack for Robotics, IoT, and Big Data
video:video.video:description: OTTO Motors, a division of Clearpath Inc., designs, manufactures, and operates self-driving vehicles with the ultimate goal of making factory and warehouse environments, safe, efficient, and agile. OTTO Motors has been using the Elastic Stack to ramp up and deliver their technology to customers for the past year at scale fast discovery and action on results! In this presentation, the OTTO Motors team shares their tips, tricks, and lessons learned along the way as well as some of the real-world benefits theyve seen using Elastic to power their global Internet of Things (IoT) starter stack. Learn why they call Logstash the best-kept secret in rapid turnkey, edge-computing data collection. See how Elastic transformed labor intensive workflows into real-time insights, and how HAProxy, RunDeck, Curator and many other tools all became best friends, keeping things secure and easily manageable. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: Cas d'usage d'Elasticsearch pour un panel de statistiques by Pricing Assistant - Paris Meetup February 2016 (FR)
video:video.video:description: Pricing Assistant crawle tous les prix du web et les prsente dans une interface ses clients e-commerants pour qu'ils ajustent leurs prix par rapport la concurrence. Je dtaillerais dans ce retour d'exprience comment nous avons migr notre API REST de MongoDB Elasticsearch, notre faon d'utiliser des indexes "jetables" pour chaque client et un post-mortem sur un downtime caus par cette approche il y a 2 mois.

video:video.video:title: Optimisation des flux physiques grce Elasticsearch by DCbrain - Paris Meetup February 2016 (French)
video:video.video:description: La prsentation montrera comment les capacits d'indexation et de traitement des sries temporelles d'Elasticsearch peuvent tre utilises conjointement une base de graphe pour optimiser des rseaux de flux physiques. Les uses cases types sont les flux physiques des datacenters ou les smartgrids. DCbrain est laurat du concours Rseaux lectriques intelligents d'ERDF grce cette approche.

video:video.video:title: Brazil (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Saiba como reinventamos a busca no local de trabalho para que voc possa acessar rapidamente as informaes necessrias com uma experincia de busca unificada, conectores de dados prontos para uso e interfaces simples de gerenciamento de busca.

video:video.video:title: US Public Sector (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security provides global data threat prevention, collection, detection, and response. Learn how to outpace the adversaries with multi-layered technology, see live demos, and get answers to all your questions.

video:video.video:title: France (Virtual) 2020: Combining Logs, Metrics, and Traces for Unified Observability
video:video.video:description: Dcouvrez comment Elasticsearch centralise le stockage des donnes et comment exploiter Kibana pour les analyser. Sans oublier l'acclration de l'identification, du diagnostic et de la rsolution des problmes.

video:video.video:title: Asia Pacific (Virtual) 2020: Search for All with Elastic Workplace Search
video:video.video:description: Learn how we reimagined search in the workplace so you can get to the information you need quickly with a unified search experience, out-of-the-box data connectors, and simple search management interfaces.

video:video.video:title: Asia Pacific (Virtual) 2020: Elastic Security: Enterprise Protection Built on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: Elastic Security provides global data threat prevention, collection, detection, and response. Learn how to outpace the adversaries with multi-layered technology, see live demos, and get answers to all your questions.

video:video.video:title: ElasticFR Meetup Rennes #1 : The Beats Family (French)
video:video.video:description: Maxime Odye vous prsente la famille Beats et leurs intrts. Dcouvrez la mise en place 'out of the box', les dashboards Kibana cls en main mais aussi un exemple d'architecture plus compliqu avec un broker (type RabbitMQ ou Kafka) et l'intgration Jolokia pour le monitoring de logs JVM. Maxime fait un focus particulier sur Metricbeat et voque galement l'intgration avec Docker.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch: Search & Analyze Data in Real Time (with French subtitles)
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch is a distributed, open source search and analytics engine, designed for horizontal scalability, reliability, and easy management. It combines the speed of search with the power of analytics via a sophisticated, developer-friendly query language covering structured, unstructured, and time-series data.

video:video.video:title: Cancer Risk Factors Analysis from Open Data
video:video.video:description: Olivier de Fresnoye prsente Epidemium et son programme de data challenge initiant de nouvelles approches autour de la recherche contre le cancer avec lopen data. Grand Prix de ce programme, l'organisation OpenCancer a dvelopp un outil d'aide la prvention partir de modles prdictifs ainsi qu'une plateforme associe dont le coeur est la suite Elastic pour rassembler et visualiser les donnes. Les quatre protagonistes de ce projet sont Benjamin SCHANNES, Martin MICALEF, Benot ROLLAND et Lino GALIANA. Trois dentre eux prsentent ces travaux.

video:video.video:title: Elasticsearch 5.0 : tout ce que vous devez savoir
video:video.video:description: Dans cette prsentation, vous dcouvrirez tout ce qu'il y a savoir sur les nouveauts d'Elasticsearch : Ingest Node, les agrgations instantanes, la prise en charge d'IPv6 ou encore les amliorations apportes aux types de donnes champs, aux suggestions de remplissage automatique et la rsilience.

video:video.video:title: Un plugin qui coute pour mieux comprendre (French)
video:video.video:description: Je dcrirai ce qui m'a amen crer un nouveau plugin d'analyse de texte et pourquoi l'utilisation des plugins d'analyses existants n'a pas aboutie.Ensuite j'expliquerai le fonctionnement du plugin et donnerai la marche suivre pour l'utiliser dans son projet avec une version d'Elasticsearch spcifie.Je finirai en expliquant les volutions venir.

video:video.video:title: Build Your Own Filebeat Module
video:video.video:description: Filebeat is a single-purpose data shipper designed to forward events from any text file containing log messages to Elasticsearch. It comes with internal modules (Apache, NGINX, System, and MySQL) that simplify the collection, parsing, and visualization of common log formats down to a single command. But what if you're working with an unsupported log format? First, don't panic! Second, create your own module.Learn how to tailor existing modules to meet your logging needs. Get a complete walkthrough of building a new module from scratch using the tools provided by Filebeat.

video:video.video:title: The Path to Intelligent Operation with NetApp OnCommand Insight
video:video.video:description: OnCommand Insight is a sophisticated management and monitoring product for hybrid IT infrastructures on public clouds, private clouds, and on-premises environments. The platform collects telemetry from applications and systems, network, and storage infrastructure, and the analytics are built on Elasticsearch and use X-Pack machine learning features to alert on anomalous system behavior.Learn about the technical architecture of the product, including the tradeoffs and design decisions that led to replacing Cassandra with Elasticsearch, optimizing Elasticsearch for an embedded use-case, and the move from alerting based on static thresholds to using X-Pack machine learning features. Plus, hear about lessons learned and insights from running Elasticsearch embedded in our product at hundreds of customers.

video:video.video:title: Monitoring with Elastic Machine Learning at Sky
video:video.video:description: The dynamic nature and the complex viewing patterns across Skys over-the-top (OTT) propositions makes threshold alerting unsuitable except for detecting the most extreme of outages.In this talk, Simon Quain and Jamie Lynch will explain how Sky leveraged the power of Elastic machine learning features, processing over seven billion documents to help discover trends, learn from real-time data, and generate alerts when anomalies occur. This solution has unearthed issues generating alerts down to device and proposition level, which may have been detected much later or not at all using previous techniques.

video:video.video:title: Turning Evidence into Insights: How NCIS Leverages Elastic
video:video.video:description: In the fight against online crime, time is of the essence. Many criminal investigators don't have a degree in Computer Science, creating a  need for tools that quickly and easily produce actionable insights. The NCIS Cyber Directorate leverages the descriptive power and scalability of Elasticsearch to create customized tools and turn evidence into insights that a Special Agent can integrate into their investigation. Learn how NCIS data analysis uses Elasticsearch to process evidence in the form of log files, its impact on efficient law enforcement, and some lessons learned along the way.

video:video.video:title: Machine Learning and Statistical Methods for Time Series Analysis
video:video.video:description: Machine learning now in beta. Register now for the upcoming webinar, overview demo, and live Q&A. In this talk, Steve and Tom will present a deep algorithmic dive into the new machine learning technologies available in the Elastic Stack and how they can be applied to real datasets. Specifically, they will focus on some of the unsupervised machine learning techniques Elastic uses, and the challenges and constraints which exist in order to provide operationally useful insight when applying these technologies to real time series data.

video:video.video:title: Elastic Cloud Enterprise @ Cisco
video:video.video:description: Sujith Joseph was one of the earliest adopters of Elastic Cloud Enterprise (ECE). Hear his experiences running ECE in production as Cisco UCS Integrated Infrastructure and learn about the design and configurations that help Cisco index over 3 billion documents each day at a rate of ~400K docs per second using Apache Spark. Plus, see how Elasticsearch machine learning helps Cisco discover custom entities within queries on Cisco.com and how ECE has helped Cisco foster innovation and increase agility for search-based solutions and enabled faster realization of business goals.

video:video.video:title: Finding the Right Tool for the Job: Elastic at The Home Depot
video:video.video:description: Elasticsearch has become the most trusted tool in the arsenal of The Home Depot, as the company has moved to Elastic solutions for product search, event logging/visualization, percolation for discounting rules management, etc.

video:video.video:title: Will County Sheriffs Office: Solving Crime with Data
video:video.video:description: The Will County Sheriffs Office found Elastic through a bit of curiosity. Testing the Elastic Stack during free time, the Sheriff's Office learned the basic concepts of what comprises Elasticsearch, Kibana and Logstash. That discovery sparked a major paradigm shift that continues to grow as they implement three major use cases with version 7.2. Learn how the Elastic Stack gave a flexible foundation for the Sheriff's Office to build solutions for Network Monitoring and Security, Operational Analysis at the Will County Adult Detention Facility, and for Crime Analysis in their area.

video:video.video:title: Stories from the Trenches at GoDaddy: How Big Data Insights Equal Big Money
video:video.video:description: GoDaddy is ingesting and analyzing more than 200,000 data points per second to improve customer experience and operations. They're using the Elastic Stack along with X-Pack and technologies like Kafka, Spark, and Hadoop to perform real-time anomaly detection, log analysis, and auto-remediation daily on over 10 TB of new data across their products and systems. Take a journey through their transformation from a farm of data silos to a centralized platform that ingests, analyzes, and visualizes data throughout the enterprise. Learn how they collect and use data from products like Hosting and Domains to analyze infrastructure events across their fleet of 85,000 servers and network devices. Plus, see how they leverage data in real time to answer key business questions. Download presentation slides.

video:video.video:title: This Paper Has Been Plagiarized: How Blackboard Curbs Cheating with Elasticsearch
video:video.video:description: Blackboard leverages Elasticsearch to power SafeAssign, its plagiarism detection software. In this talk, Slavomir will walk through some aspects of the service, show how their internal web search engine was born, as well as walk through Blackboards journey from a small scale Solr deployment to a multi-terabyte, full-text search engine powered by Elasticsearch. Attendees will also learn from Blackboards experiences, challenges, solutions, and best practices from running their infrastructure on AWS.

video:video.video:title: Americas East (Virtual) 2020: Opening Keynote
video:video.video:description: Hear from Elastic CEO Shay Banon on the future of Elasticsearch, Kibana, Beats, and Logstash, new features and solutions, expanding deployment options, and the evolving solutions landscape.

video:video.video:title: What's the Latest in Logstash? (2017)
video:video.video:description: This session attempts to address one of lifes ultimate questions: how many logs can a Logstash stash? Suyog and Jordan will answer this and other burning Logstash questions, like: can we go faster? What is this persistent queue thing? Any cool new plugin developments? How do I monitor Logstash? What is in the future for the Logstash configuration? How does the Logstash team keep sysadmins and DevOps in mind when working on the product? Is Logstash ever going to get a UI?Expect to leave with a clear vision of where Logstash is headed and how it fits in as a critical part of your infrastructure.

video:video.video:title: The Book on Genesis Media: Analyzing Data, and It Was Good!
video:video.video:description: From simple grepping Apache logs to full-fledged analysis, the evolution of log analytics at Genesis Media has allowed them to grow, to meet the demands of their publishers, and to provide a great and targeted ad delivery product. In this talk, VP of Technology Rob Schwartzberg walks through the lessons learned and the steps along the way to their current success, including a look at why the Elastic stack served their needs better than Splunk could.

video:video.video:title: Between Two Ferns with Huddle
video:video.video:description: A chat with Richard Owens, Senior Systems Engineer at Huddle, about using the Elastic stack to overcome a scalability issue and high maintenance costs.
